1.content: Which branch will it be?
1.title: Choices

11.content: Which Series do you choose?
11.title: Anime

111.content: Alright, ninja time, select who will be growing.
111.title: Naruto

1111.content: Okay, now who will be the main character?
1111.title: females

1111112.content: Alright, let's choose which era of Sakura we're dealing with!
1111112.title: Sakura Haruno

11111121.content:
"SAKURA!" Naruto's obnoxious voice rang in the pinkette's ears. However, the normally boisterous and happy-go-lucky voice that grated on her nerves so often...sounded scared and worried.

"Urgh...." Sakura groaned as she pulled herself up from the remains of the wall she'd flown into. It all came flooding back to her, she'd reached out to grab that damn stolen trinket that these religious freaks were pouring some kind of unknown chakra into. Then the stupid thing blew up in her face and sent her flying back through a wall!

Strangely though, she felt totally fine! What should've resulted in at least some broken bones...and she felt not only painless but better than she did before this whole fiasco started!

"Are you alright, Sakura?" Naruto inquired worriedly.

Sakura finally opened her eyes and looked to see Sasuke and Naruto looking at her concerned.

"I don't know how...but I feel fine." Sakura sat up in the pile of rubble. "How long have I been out?"

"Uh....two hours." Naruto said with a nervous chuckle.

There was a pause and then... "WHAAAAAT?!" Sakura's voice screamed, causing some crows to flee the scene.

Naruto backed up as Sakura was menacingly approaching him. "Wh-what's wrong, Sakura? We didn't know what to do!"

"I told you she'd be mad, dope." Sasuke scoffed.

Naruto was too focused on Sakura approaching him with killing intent to retort...wait...was she getting bigger?

Sakura cracked her knuckles menacingly, she felt pretty good right now...almost like she could take over the world!

"Hey wait...are you getting bigger, Sakura?" Naruto asked...unfortunately the pinkette took it VERY wrong.

"WHAT?!" Sakura roared, thinking this blond idiot was making some crude comment about her figure.

Sasuke's eyes widened as for some reason Sakura seemed to be towering over Naruto. He wasn't sure if it was a trick of the light...but he wasn't going to interrupt a good beatdown of the dopey blond.

"N-No that's not what I meant!" Naruto wailed as Sakura was looking....
11111121.title: Sakura Haruno: Goddess

choices: Sakura decides to take Sasuke's advice and head back to the Village.
Sakura wants to test her new strength first and wants to fight them both!
111111212.content:
"Is that so?" She asked with a scowl on her face as it slowly dawned on her as Sakura got closer to her teammates that the fact that they looked much smaller than she remembered.

"You guys are looking awfully small." She remarked with a bit of amusement, the sight of Naruto and Sasuke barely coming up to her knees as they looked up at her with awe and surprise on their faces.

"Well not exactly our idea, I guess this is the cultist's idea to use this power, but didn't think its just more than you growing bigger." Sasuke mused about the situation as Naruto looked a bit curious at Sakura who frowned slightly.

"What are you looking at Naruto?" She asked annoyed by the staring, "Its just that I never really noticed that tattoo on your forehead before." He said nervously scratching the back of his head chuckling.

Sakura raised an eyebrow in interest, before she took a few steps over to the nearest water source in the area, making the ground lightly tremor from her footsteps as she found a pond nearby, as she gasped at the sight of the diamond-like tattoo on her forehead, "Woah, it kinda reminds me of Lady Tsunade's." She said in surprise as Naruto and Sasuke followed behind her.

"We should probably head back to the village and report this back to the Hokage, see if we can fix you." Sasuke proposed to her as Sakura got up from her crouching as she looked down at her teammates and friends as she contemplates the idea, on one hand she can certainly understand the need, but on the other hand, she has so much power now, it can't hurt to test out a little bit, decisions, decisions...
111111212.title: 20 Ft. Tall!

choices: Sakura is PISSED and Grows EVEN MORE! (Uh oh!)
The Clones Somehow Manage to Get the Upper Hand?!
1111112122.content:
Naruto and Sasuke didn't like the sinister grin that formed on Sakura's face at that moment...not one bit. Lifting one blue sandal clad foot, she stomped it down forcefully and shook the ground. Naruto yelped as he fell on his rear, Sasuke was unmoved and stood there coolly.

"Who says I need fixing? Don't you think this new size suits a woman like myself?" Sakura declared haughtily. "I KNOW you'll learn to appreciate me, Sasuke." She cooed down at the Uchiha.

"Sheesh, you haven't changed a bit Sakura." Naruto grumbled, causing Sakura to look at him fiercely. "What was that?" Lifting her other foot, she slammed it down dangerously close to Naruto. Sasuke's eyes widened as he noticed the pinkette was steadily increasing in size.

The 'tattoo' on Sakura's forehead seemed to glow as the girl declared in a strangely booming voice: "I want to test how strong I am now...and you both are going to help me!"

"We are?" Sasuke and Naruto asked together with a glance at each other.

"What's wrong? Afraid of being beat up by a girl?" Sakura mocked as she swatted her hand against a pillar in the chamber, causing it to crumble and fall down towards the two boys.

Thankfully the two ninja were quick to avoid the dangerous debris as they leaped aside. Naruto was also quick to run his mouth, "ARE YOU CRAZY, SAKURA?! YOU COULD'VE KILLED US!"

Sakura growled as she clenched her fist, "Shut up little runt! Start fighting back!" Sakura sure seemed to be getting full of herself. This was evident as she reared her fist back and sent it flying towards a panicking Naruto.

"MOVE YOU IDIOT!" Sasuke yelled, throwing kunai at the now 30 ft woman...which incredibly bounced off of her skin! "What the heck?" Sasuke said in astonishment as the fist slammed into Naruto and tore through the stone floor like butter.

"That oughta shut you up, loser!" Sakura smirked proudly...until the dust cleared and quite the opposite happened.

"ALRIGHT, LET'S GET HER! BUT NOT TOO ROUGH OKAY FELLAS?" The chattering of dozens of Naruto clones filled Sakura's ears......like buzzing flies.

"GrrrRRrAGH!" Sakura roared as the Narutos climbed on her...each one blushing and perving out.
1111112122.title: A Test of Strength

choices: Sasuke and Naruto gear up for Round 2 against Sakura.
Thinking that they might be outmatched, they flee as Sakura follows.
11111121221.content:
Sakura growled as she swatted at the climbing Naruto clones on her legs and shirt, this was annoying, they were like bugs to the 30ft growing giantess, she cleaned off a few but more seem to take her place as she stomped about the place.

"Watch it Naruto!" Sasuke warned him as he had to jump out of the way of a random foot coming down on him as she tried to shake them off.

"Grrrr, Naruto!" She roared out in anger as Sasuke threw a few kunai at her only to scoff in annoyance as the tools bounced off her skin like hitting a steel wall.

And not to mention the fact that as Naruto attacked Sakura and aggravating her further, her growth spurt progressed to even bigger heights as she seemed to grow even faster as she growled in annoyance, the diamond on her forehead glowing in response to her anger.

"Uh oh, this can't be good!" One of the clones said nervously as the clones by her feet were ran over by the sandals and crushed, popping into smoke, the giantess growing to 40ft tall and counting as she threw them off with a shout, a sort of pulse of chakra throwing them away, as the real Naruto staggered from the force as did Sasuke.

Before they knew it, the growth slowed down to its previous speed as Sakura looked down at the two with a glare at 50ft tall, "Now you've done it, now I'm mad." She said to them, cracking her knuckles with a loud boom as it seems her body is accomodating the power quite well.
11111121221.title: Sakura is PISSED and Grows EVEN MORE! (Uh oh!)

choices: Sakura Recruits the Boys As Her Chief Worshipers! With Perks!
111111212212.content:
Naruto and Sasuke looked at each other...and took off at the same time running in the opposite direction as Sakura.
"YOU GET BACK HEEERE!" Sakura's voice roared as it was soon followed by the entire temple quaking repeatedly as she stomped after the duo.

"Through here!" Sasuke yelled at Naruto as they both ran through the doorway they'd entered this antechamber from.

"You think a wall is gonna stop ME?! HEE-YAA!" The rumbling voice of their pursuer rattled the stone hallway. Naruto and Sasuke kept running. A gigantic sandal-clad foot smashed through the wall behind them and sent debris and dust all around them.

"Alright, that's it!" Sasuke did some hand signs and leaped across several large chunks of falling stone. Sakura's eyes went to hearts as she saw her tiny crush in front of her eyes. "Sasukeee~!" She swooned...until Sasuke unleashed a Fireball Jutsu from his mouth...directly into her face.

"Don't hurt her!" Naruto cried out. "Shut up, dope!" Sasuke yelled as he landed next to Naruto. "She's trying to kill us! She's out of her mind...that jutsu should-" Sasuke began explaining, until he saw Naruto's face pale and the blond pointing up with a shaky hand.

Sasuke followed the quivering blond's gaze and his jaw dropped. Sakura's smugly grinning face sneered down at them...not a single mark or scratch to be seen. "Thanks for that...you're just proving to me how invincible I really am since that weird chakra went into me!" Sakura boomed and took a big step forward.

"No way....not even a scratch..." Sasuke mumbled, horrified at how overpowered he was..by SAKURA of all people!

"Come on...we gotta get outta he-" Naruto shook Sasuke's shoulder and tried to snap him out of it...only for Sakura to snatch both boys up in her fists.
111111212212.title: Team 7 Chase Scene!

choices: Sakura places them in her sandals as insoles.
Sakura decides to sit on them, she could use a seat.
1111112122121.content:
"Hmph! Thought you could escape from me? What a joke." She taunted them, smirking at her triumph over her fellow teammates as they struggled in her hands in an effort to break free.

"Come on Naruto! Can't you break free?" Sasuke asked him as he grunted with effort in her iron clad grip.

"Can't break free, she's really strong at this size." Naruto said in an apologetic tone, he couldn't even free up his hands to make a Shadow Clone to distract her.

"So you've tried to run from your goddess, I don't think that was very wise to do." She chided them as Sasuke groaned in annoyance, goddess? Seriously?

Sakura giggled and walked over to a small pyramid in the temple and took a seat on the top of it as she looked at her trapped victims, "Sakura let us go, you can't just decide to not go back to the village, we have to fix this." Sasuke implored her but she shook her head.

"I'll do no such thing, don't you think I can help everyone like this? I bet I can kick everyone's ads now and protect the village." She rebutted his words as Naruto gulped nervously, that sounds a bit like taking over the world, but she can't do that at this size....right?

At 60ft tall, she said to them, "Now as I was saying, looks like you two need to learn some lessons before you're to be in service of me." She declared to them with a smile on her face.
1111112122121.title: Sakura Punishes The Boys

choices: Sakura Takes Her Time Before Trapping Her Crush..Perhaps Flirting?
11111121221211.content:
Holding both boys in front of her deviously grinning mug, the pinkette hatched a marvelous idea. Narrowing her eyes she pretended to groan, "Oooh booys...you had me chasing you around so much...all that stomping has made my feet sore."

Sasuke and Naruto did NOT like where this was going. "Uhhh...." The boys began to sweat nervously. "I think what I need...is more support in these sandals. And since you two need a good punishment...I think you'll do just fine!" Sakura smirked wickedly.

"GAAAAAH! No way Sakura! You'll crush us!" Naruto freaked out.

Sasuke couldn't imagine being trapped under the foot of the enormous girl...his pride just couldn't accept this! "You need to let us go, Sakura!" Sasuke demanded forcefully.

"Awww, don't be so grumpy, Sasuke! You might learn to like it under there! Then we can get married and you can be the husband of the great Goddess Sakura!" Sakura said with a booming girlish giggle.

Sasuke groaned, but a part of him definitely liked the authority that would come with such a role as being the lover of a goddess.

"Hey! What about me! I might like it too!" Naruto, ever wanting to outdo Sasuke and impress Sakura, blurted.

"Great! Then you can go in first!" Sakura said darkly to Naruto as she gave him a quick squeeze.

Leaning forward, Sakura's right foot's heel was lifted away from the blue sandal with a sticky peeling sound. Her milky arch was flushed as it was exposed and Sakura sighed as her skin was kissed by the air.

A powerful smell wafted up to Naruto's nose and had his arms been free..he would've pinched it shut. But he was trapped, and forced to inhale the pungent stench of his teammate's foot odor.

Sakura lowered Naruto to the visibly steamy and wet sandal inside, grinning smugly at the dumb loudmouth being dwarfed by her dainty feet. She pressed him down hard against the imprint of the ball of her foot..and lowered her foot back down.

She trembled in delight as she felt Naruto's body become consumed by her soft sole as her heel touched down into the footwear.
11111121221211.title: Sakura's New Insoles

choices: Sakura decides to go on a walk back to the village that contracted them.
Sakura decides to experiment with her newfound abilities.
111111212212111.content:
"Hmmm, he feels pretty nice under there~" Sakura cooed in joy, wiggling her toes as she felt Naruto struggle beneath her foot, it was a suitable use for him, and his body was tough enough to bare with the pressure of her weight.

Sasuke watched in shock at the sight of Naruto being made into her insole for all intents and purposes, and he was going into the other foot...

"Let me go Sakura! You can't do this!" He cried out trying to put some sense into her as she shook her head with a giggle, a slight blush on her face, "I may like you Sasuke but you're still rude for trying to torch my face like that, so I have to say that you aren't excluded." Sakura stated to him before lowering him to her other free sandal as her toes flexed in anticipation of their new passenger.

She pulled out her foot slightly to give him space as she inserted the Uchiha into her sole, dark imprints of her foot showed just how long she was wearing these same pairs as the smell of damp rubber fabric pervaded the area, making him cough and cringe at the smell as he was gingerly placed into the slot with his head facing the ball of her foot.

Sakura slid her foot back in to squee at the sensation of both her teammates struggling for their lives and breathing in the noxious musky odors of her feet as she smirked at her prisoners as she stood up and said to them, "You guys made for wonderful insoles to your goddess, now lets see what we can do now..." She mused about the possibilities.
111111212212111.title: Sasuke's Turn...

choices: Sakura Is Fed Grapes and Treated as a Goddess by the Scared Village
1111112122121111.content:
Stretching her arms above her head with a cute grunt, Sakura decided she'd better head back to report their success to their clients. "I'm going to walk back to that village that hired us...you two just sit tight and enjoy yourselves, kay?" Sakura snickered as she began to calmly walk towards the opposite wall.

Given how sturdy and strong she now was, Sakura merely walked through the solid stone and it crumbled like a knife to butter. The pinkette grinned smugly as the stone and rubble crumbled all around her.

"I might be stronger than Kakashi-sensei now..." she thought, her confidence and ego swelling more and more.

Meanwhile, the two males of Team 7 turned insoles were suffering tremendously. They might be grateful that they were made out of tough stuff and able to withstand the pressure, but that didn't make it any less suffocating...or smelly.

"Ugh...for a girl....Sakura sure has some stinky feet..." Naruto thought with a groan as the soft, pillowy foot was pressing down on him.

Sasuke was meanwhile trying to figure out a plan, going over all his options. Among them was the option of just surrendering to the girl's will...she might be more gentle with them. Of course, the girl never was fond of Naruto...but she had an obvious crush on Sasuke.

"Maybe I can use that to my advantage.." The Uchiha thought, cringing at the stench all the while.

Things only got worse as Sakura made it outside, the hot sun shone down upon her and as she was still walking...her feet began to sweat and of course begin to bake her prisoners.

The village nearby began to suffer strange quakes, the denizens of the small town began to fear it was some sort of wrath called down from the gods. Perhaps those ninja kids failed to stop the ritual?

"Look!" One of the villagers cried out and pointed, everyone of course looking in that direction. They gasped as they saw the pink haired girl from earlier....stomping towards them...only GIGANTIC!

As the smugly grinning girl stopped just within the borders of the town, she crossed her arms and addressed them: "You won't have to worry about that weirdo cult anymore! We took care of it....or more to the point...I DID." She haughtily declared.

Of course, the villagers' response was immediate...they began shouting and yelling at the giantess about how she had been 'cursed' and now was a 'goddess' and touched by 'unholy power.'.

Sakura scowled and rolled her eyes, "You guys sure are a bunch of superstitious babies. Goddess, huh? Yeah, I already knew that...duh. So why don't you show some appreciation for your GODDESS who just saved your butts?" Lifting a sandalled foot, of course the one that held the annoying Naruto within, she stomped down and shook the entire village.

"I want some appreciation...NOW." Sakura demanded darkly.
1111112122121111.title: Ungrateful Clients...Pissed Goddess

choices: "...a mixture of the various fruits and wine we could find."
11111121221211111.content:
The villagers looked amongst themselves nervously as their lack of movement from her statement had irritated Sakura as she scowled and felt her body grow 10ft more to 70ft tall, her presence even more imposing to them, "Well?" She asked/demanded the villagers.

They quickly hurried into motion as they then prepared any of the food they had in reserves for the sudden feast they have to make for her now, "Yes right away Goddess!" One of them cried out in subservience to her and also fear of her expressing her displeasure to the village.

Sakura smugly smiled at their compliance as they ran about the place to prepare for the feast, "That's more like it." She said before taking a seat at the center of the village, causing the ground to shake.

It was a matter of minutes, before they had fully prepared the food as they shared it to her as she licked her lips in anticipation, "Now this is service, I am quite pleased by your performance so far." Sakura said with a chuckle as the idle struggles of her prisoners made the experience more enjoyable.

She ate a multiple of fruits and vegetables, in addition to meat and all they had, all manners of food went down her gullet as she ravenously ate whatever they served her, before she washed it down with a beverage filled barrel, tasting its interesting flavor.

"Hmm, an interesting taste this drink has, what is it?" She asked them curiously, she doubts it was poison because her body would react to it, looking up at her, one of the villagers said meekly, "We weren't sure what type of drink you would like, so we..." He began.
11111121221211111.title: A Goddess' worship

11113.content: Alright, other villages, let's start with Sand.
11113.title: Girls from other villages.

111132111.content: Alright, now what exactly is going on? Does Tayuya start growing, or does she somehow make other people shrink?
111132111.title: Tayuya

1112.content: Okay first our two main boys!
1112.title: Naruto Males

11121.content:
It was an average day in the leaf village as Naruto had sat on the side of his bed, looking at the piece of clothing in the form of a patterned orange boxer with interest.

"Huh, so apparently this thing increases one's potential? That guy at the market better not sold me a fake." Naruto said with some doubt in his tone, there's no way a object can do such a thing, unless it was cursed, that'd be a hoot.

But unbeknownst to Naruto, that was exactly the case as it was known to be made for the user to grow in size, based on how much chakra the victim has, and then left at that size, the more chakra gained the more they would grow, most wouldn't get until 20ft tall or so, but for Naruto, the amount of chakra would take time for his full size to be realized.

Taking off his boxers and putting it on, the village fate was sealed so to speak...
11121.title: Naruto Uzumaki

111211.content:
"Hm...feels more comfy than I expected.." Naruto shivered as the boxers practically cradled his junk and caressed his butt cheeks lovingly. "Wonder what this stuff is made out of..." Naruto mumbled, feeling himself already growing hard from the sensitive area feeling so good.

Deciding not to shower...again...he began pulling on the rest of his very orange outfit and sliding on his headband, Naruto popped his considerably stinky and sticky feet into his blue sandals and headed out to his favorite ramen shop.

That is..he would have...if he didn't suddenly bonk his head on the doorframe!

"Ow! What the-!?" Naruto winced as now the top of his blond head impacted the ceiling of his house!

"Wha-? Am I...getting bigger?" Naruto asked dumbly.
111211.title: Fast Growth

choices: Naruto is excited to test out his size.
1112112.content:
Naruto looked around and blinked for a few seconds in confusion at the sudden growth spurt before he grinned excitedly at what was happening to him.

"No way, I'm getting bigger? This is awesome!" He exclaimed as he watched his room shrink smaller and smaller before him as the room groaned in protest from the increasing size of the boy as he was aware of the situation.

"Uh oh, might be a problem." Naruto said to himself with worry as the growth spurt wasn't stopping any time soon as the walls splintered and cracked from the strain as people outside looked at the crumbling apart structure as they heard Naruto swore and grunt in discomfort before the entire thing literally exploded outwards showering the area with debris and wood as they heard loud coughing as the now 100ft tall Naruto waved the dust out of his face before laying eyes on the villagers at his feet.
1112112.title: Naruto Thinks This is AWESOME!

11121122.content:
Naruto grinned as his mind filled with typical Naruto-like mischievous thoughts. Seeing the villagers who had been so often a cause for his torment...helpless at his sandaled feet...it was quite a power rush!

"Heehee! You're all looking pretty small to me now!" Naruto's voice boomed as he gained a cocky grin and stepped out of the ruins of his house...gargantuan foot shaking the ground as it was placed.

The tiny villagers backed away slightly in fear from the open sandals that held enormous wiggling toes facing them.

Naruto stood there with his feet on either side of the crowd of onlookers, hands on his hips and grinned deviously. "I wonder...how many of you microbes I could fit under my foot..." Naruto said casually.

This of course sent the people into a state of utmost fear, which was increased when Naruto lifted a foot over them..they were encased in a foot shaped shadow as they saw the underside of his well worn blue sandal.

"Here goes..." Naruto said tauntingly. The foot was lowered and to Naruto's glee...his foot covered the ENTIRE crowd!

"Whoa! Guess my feet are just too BIG for wimpy bugs." Naruto giggled.
11121122.title: A Test of Size

112.content: Choose your installment of DB!
112.title: Dragon Ball

choices: 18 heads to rescue her brother and fight Vegeta
18 feels her mind fading as her size changes
1121.content:
Somewhere, in an alternate timeline

         Android 18 could not believe it. She had charged at Vegeta, ready to deliver a crushing blow but the Saiyan without much difficulty, intercepted the move and hurled her down to the ground. Then with a barrage of ki blasts and a final taunt, he humiliated her with a bombardment that left her bruised, exhausted, but not yet defeated in the depth of a smoldering crater. It was her brother who watching from a nearby cliff flew to her rescue, to distract the Saiyan while she crawled out and flew to a safe distance.

         It was in a decrepit shed in the middle of nowhere where 18 took a breather, not far enough from where she had left her brother with the Saiyan that they both had underestimated. There was always a fail-safe though and her creator would've made sure of it. There was one last maneuver that the deranged Dr. Gero had told her about. Not even her own brother knew about it and with one good reason. It could potentially cause so much destruction and be out of control for her to use. "Your brother has a bomb but you are too special for that. At the base of your spine..." 18 could hear the old crackpot's voice in her memory. With her face scratched up, and her arm aching from all the fighting, 18 curled up on the floor of the shed to reach behind her back.
         With a forceful push, she pressed into her skin. There was a small click. She reached into the flesh and screaming in agony, she lifted up the flesh where she could now feel the switch embedded into her very structure. One more click. The fighting was distant but she could still hear them and worse, she felt the dread that she had left her brother to die. How long would it take to kick in? No sooner than she wondered that, she felt her body ache, her skin felt like it was stretching. Android 18 yelled and felt her clothes beginning to constrict around her. In a pained gasp, she tore off her denim jacket. Her arms begin to squeeze against the sleeves until they too ripped and fell to the floor. It was happening.

         All her clothes was gone, and as she began to grow bigger, feeling her size increase and become more powerful, her wounds also felt like they were disappearing. The growth process healed her as it made her into a form that the Saiyan would have no easy time fighting. Android 18 grinned, the energy coursing through her body excited her, and at the 20ft size, she stretched upward and burst out of the shed. She had unfinished business with Vegeta.
1121.title: Giant Android Saga

choices: A fight breaks out between the two as 18 finds out she can absorb energy to grow
But before any further fighting occurs, the other Z-Fighters show up.
11211.content:
The amount of power that was flowing through her veins was incredible as she chuckled evilly in preparation to get her vengeance on the Saiyan prince.

The small joys of having a android body means that her energy can't be sensed no matter how strong she gets, making it completely possible to sneak up on unsuspecting targets such as the unruly prince.

She flew back to the battlefield where she saw that her brother was countering back Vegeta with interest now that he wasn't playing around unlike her. The thought was rather touching but she was still annoyed to be needing his help to take care of one arrogant man.

17 was smiling at the haggard prince as he was huffing and puffing in slight exhaustion while 17 was barely winded, until he was surprised to see the sight of his sister who had then kicked Vegeta into a Cliffside catching him off guard.

"Well, this is certainly unexpected." 17 stated to her to which she scoffed and removed a bang from her face.

"Well the doctor was rather weird in his experiments." 18 said as he decided to let her take it from here, she felt like she was stronger in a sense here.

As Vegeta tore his way out of the hole that he was thrown into only to be taken in by surprise by the fact that 18 had grew to 20ft tall and was able to overpower him of all people, this will not stand.
11211.title: 18 heads to rescue her brother and fight Vegeta

choices: Energy begins to flow through Android 18 again...
The commotion has attracted some other players
11212.content:
20ft would've been fine enough for a fail safe, but Android 18's skin began to tingle again and her muscles ached ecstatically. Another intense burst of energy flowed through her. She groaned and closed her eyes, half naked and squatting over the ruins of the safe house she had been using as a sanctuary. Curse you Dr. Gero, why is it always overkill with you? Her barefeet had been the first to expand and the surge continued up her knees and lower abdomen. 18 lifted up a leg and brought it down, leaving the now much smaller remains of the wooden safe house in one of her colossal footprints.
         50ft! She could tell from the print that she had left behind, and although it should've terrified her, it also began to excite her a bit. Would she get any bigger? At least the fight was now just a couple of short paces away. Giant Android 18 looked and saw her brother spiraling around, with the smug Saiyan down on the ground using him for target practice. Her pleased grin turned into a scowl of rage. He had humiliated her and now it was time to deliver some of the same.

*

         "Haha! Had enough yet?" Vegeta cackled at the beat up Android 17. The cyborg was too proud to admit defeat but it looked like it was about to be the end. And who would save him now? His sister who had run off or their wicked false father's creations that had yet to be activated?
"I'll give you one last chance to surrender..." The Saiyan smiled and held up his palm to charge it. The cyborg refused to answer. He gave him the finger and thought about flying somewhere to die when... A massive head rose up from behind the cliff side, blocking any possible escape for anyone. 17's eyes widened in a mix of terror and amazement. How could he not recognize those blonde locks of hair, covered with debris and stains of the dust clouds that the giant created with her every step?
         Vegeta's eyes were next to go wide with horror and for a couple of seconds, he didn't feel so smug. The giantess that had risen and stood a little too close to her brother, was completely nude and her face was pure rage.
She lifted a finger to him and her mighty voice boomed: "READY FOR A REMATCH?"
         Then, like a colossal nuclear missile, the building-sized 18 leapt into the air and both brother and rival flew for cover as her massive bare soles came to crush them with a terrifying stomp. Vegeta hurled ki blasts and they disappeared into the wrinkles of her soles, causing no damage but he heard an audible giggle. It was tickling her?!

         "ENOUGH GAMES VEGETA, WE CAN DO IT FAIRLY OR I WILL JUST SQUASH YOU LIKE A BUG!"
The Saiyan spat in fury on the ground, he had come too close to defeat and much worse, to being stepped on to be in any proud mood. The brother, Android 17, was nowhere to be found.
"Fair?! How is this fair, you humongous bitch?!" He screamed up to her, coughing up dust. At this rate, she would level most of the mountains in the area just by flying around and taking those steps. Giant 18's eyes narrowed with fury. It wasn't the first time he had called her that word... Vegeta screamed again as she lifted herself up and charged.
11212.title: Revenge fuels a cyborg's heart

choices: Android 18 goes to reunite with her brother
Vegeta hears a familiar voice between the booming footsteps
The strand has a tension limit, Vegeta feels it loosen just enough
112122.content:
Vegeta, expecting to be crushed to death, by the colossal Android 18 hurling her body at him charged up one last time to go out with a bang. Instead, the grinning blonde floated in front of him, completely nude with her body full of debris and caked dirt from tumbling around the earth. With no fanfare or build up, she reached for Vegeta, seizing him immediately, and extinguishing his charge. The Saiyan wanted to yell, fuss, or burst out but it was impossible with the clench of Android 18's long fingers which had grown slightly larger to entomb his frame against the palm of her hand. Nothing but a toy for her, Vegeta thought in defeat. Maybe he would be lucky enough that she would put him out of his misery soon.

"WHERE IS SON GOKU?" The giantess clenched her fist. Vegeta groaned in pain, even if he wanted to reveal anything, she was crushing his chest. He defiantly spit, then attempted to wiggle out of her grasp.

"WORTHLESS SAIYAN, I'LL RELEASE YOU IF YOU TELL ME!" But he wouldn't say anything, no matter how hard she squeezed her fingers together to drain him of air. Vegeta began to cackle maniacally through the giantess's grasp, eager for the sweet release. He had surprised himself with this bout of loyalty but once he went down, it was up to the other Z Fighters to save the world from the destructive giant blonde.

"NOTHING THEN? DEATH REALLY IS TOO GOOD FOR YOU, VEGETA..." Android 18 plucked a strand from her head. She lifted her right foot up, exposing the filthy sole that was blackened with dirt, rocks, and fragments of the small structures she had stomped across. Releasing her grip slightly, Vegeta caught a fresh gasp of air and a break from the gigantic fingers. But only for a moment. Too bruised to move or fight back, he was helpless when Android 18 pressed him against her dirty foot, then used the hair strand to secure him tightly against it.

The brief scuffle and the frustration at the failed interrogation had given Android 18 a small boost in growth, as did anything that annoyed or pushed her for a fight. Vegeta, too bruised and beat to fight back, was held by the now 65ft blonde's thick, cablelike strand of hair. She smiled at him, then his view of her distant beautiful face disappeared as she flipped her foot back and took a stomp onto the ground. The air shot out of his lungs and Vegeta was in unimaginable, excruciating pain once again that day. Except now that he was an improvised insole for the giantess, he was humiliated beyond belief. BOOM! He was lifted up and she brought her foot down. He knew that worst of all, he wouldn't even die, at least not right away.

18 left the Lookout, leaving a confused Krilin and the Z-Team. She couldn't believe what Krilin has just done for her and 17. Using Shenron to remove the bomb from their body, it was the first time in her life someone did something for her. But for now she needed some times to think about what do with her life, a life without Cell or the Dr Gero. Android 16 was gone forever, and she didn't know where to find 17..She was alone.

18 landed in a forest after some hours flying without purpose. If she had to live somewhere, she would rather live away from any humans, and she just found the perfect peacefull place. She sat near a tree and decided to take a nap.

Once she wakes up...

1123331.content:
"I don't know, Bulma...it sounds strange...and I don't know if I can just leave Marron and Krillin alone...especially with no babysitter." Android 18 reasoned with her scientist friend as she brushed a strand of blond hair from her face.

"Heh, babysitter's already covered! Come ooon...you deserve some 'me' time! When's the last time Krillin treated you?" Bulma smirked.

Android 18..try as she might could not name a recent time her hubby had gone on a date with her..he even refused to rub her feet the other night! It made her rather angry yet hurt at the same time.

"And you say this place is full of small people and let's us do whatever we want?" Android 18 asked curiously.

"Yep! I've been there before, I'm a VIP even! Which means you'll be one too...that means special perks!" Bulma explained excitedly.

18 sighed, "Alriight...I suppose I'll go home and pack-"

"Already done! I knew you'd see the light so.." Bulma gestured to suitcases labelled '18'.

Android 18 slightly sighed in relief, at least she wouldn't have to awkwardly explain it to Krillin WHERE she was going.

Soon the two females were standing in front of a portal, projected by one of Bulma's devices manned by a low level staff member at Capsule Corp.

Picking up their bags, the two ladies entered through the portal which closed behind them.

18's eyes widened as she took it all in. A sunny regular sized resort that looked incredibly fancy and had a tropical theme to it. To her shock she saw various tiny employees scurrying around, they seemed strong enough to lift heavy bags and push normal sized objects like trolleys though...oddly enough.

Bulma smirked at her friend's dropped jaw, "I remember my first reaction was similar to yours...see that puny city in the distance? That's off limits to everyone but us VIPs...it's a place where us giantesses can take out our frustrations and play kaiju." Bulma giggled as she and 18 went into the lobby to check into the resort and hotel.

11422.content:
Erza just finished defeated a group of evil wizards terrorizing a village. She was being thanked by the villagers before heading back to the guild.

"Thank you so much for protecting our village!" The village elder said with the other village were cheering her name.

"I was merely fulfilling my mission." Erza smiled. "Now I'll be going now."

"Wait please take this." The elder said showing an amulet. "It's our most prized possession and likely what those mages were after."

Erza looked down at the purple necklace, she would have declined but knows better than to reject a gift from people she's saved. They're always too insistent. "Thank you I graciously accept." She took the amulet and said her goodbyes and began walking.

The fairy tail wizard wasn't keen of the long walk home, but didn't complain she only mentally wished she could just take a couple steps to get home.

Her amulet started glowing. She looked down to see it. "What is it-" She looked around to see the trees shrinking. She looked down to see the ground seem farther away. The forest isn't shrinking she's growing!

How big does she get?

115312.content: What should the most popular witch at Luna Nova do?
115312.title: Diana

choices: several feet taller and was growing quickly
several inches taller and was growing slowly
1153121.content:
"There we go," Sucy declared as she set the slice of pizza down on the desk in her dorm. "Akko should be back any minute and I know she won't be able to resist!"

The young witch had concocted a magic potion that was supposed to enhance the user's special abilities. Her preferred test subject however, had become fed up with her attempts to experiment on her. Sucy had tried to slip some of her potion into Akko's own food, but the girl had become too cautious to leave her an easy opportunity. This time however, it would only be Akko's fault for eating something that wasn't hers. After sprinkling some of her potion onto the pizza slice, Sucy quickly made her way out of the room she shared with Akko and Lotte, knowing full well Akko's class had just ended and she should be returning shortly. As she stepped out into the hallway, she heard someone call her name from behind. She turned around to see Diana approaching. "Have you seen Akko?" the popular witch asked her. "I let her borrow my boots but I need them back immediately or I'm going to be late!"

Sucy looked down to see Diana was in fact barefoot. "She should be back soon," Sucy answered. "Why don't you just wait here for a minute?"

"I suppose I will if I must," Diana replied, "but if she isn't and I end up having to go to class barefoot, I may end up strangling her later!"

"I certainly wouldn't fault you for it," Sucy responded in her usual deadpan tone.

Diana then entered the room and took a seat on Akko's bed, groaning to herself. After they'd been able to avert a global catastrophe by stopping a possessed missile, she and Akko had been on much better terms than before. Diana figured it would be no big deal to let Akko borrow her boots for a day while her own were being repaired, but she should've known better. She wasn't sure how much trouble she'd be in if she showed up to class barefoot as opposed to out-of-uniform shoes, but now she didn't even have enough time to go back and grab a different pair of footwear. At least her midnight blue-painted toenails looked good.

Diana knew she only had about 30 more seconds until she had to head to class, and she was about to give up. She'd skipped breakfast today, and she wasn't sure whose slice of pizza that was sitting on the desk. Deciding she didn't care, she grabbed it as she turned to leave and took a large bite. Just as she'd finished eating all of it, she heard someone else enter the room.

"Akko's just down the hall," Sucy declared upon returning.

"Finally! And she'd better have my boots!" Diana responded. "Wait a minute... Why do I suddenly feel so strange?" she asked as the room around her seemed to be contracting.

Sucy realized the pizza slice she'd left on the desk was no longer there. She hadn't planned on using Diana as her test subject, but in the end it didn't make much of a difference. Either way she'd find out what effects her new formula were going to have.

Sucy noticed Diana had become
1153121.title: Grow

choices: Her growth spurt stops for now.
11531211.content:
Diana was walking down the hallway in a slightly irritated manner until she felt a tingly sensation flow throughout her whole body as she saw Akko in the hall looking like she was out of breath.

"What the-!?" She asked in surprise as she felt her feet expand against the cold floor, her toes wiggling from the feeling as she grew in size suddenly, Diana felt her head smack against the ceiling as plaster fell down the place.

"Woah! Diana! You're growing!" Akko said in surprise and awe, before she realized that Diana wasnt stopping after crouching down, Sucy also took note of the fact that she was also in danger and went to go and get her broom to get a better view, only one way to properly see the experiment progressing smoothly.

It was a unfortunate case in which they were on another level of the school as the floor cracked underneath her feet as she yelped in surprise of the sudden giveaway of the floor as she fell through the floors.

It was a small mercy that there was nobody below as Akko was nervous about the floor pieces dropping off as Sucy flew by her and stopped.

"Hop on." She shortly ordered her as Akko nodded and jumped on as she flew out through an open window as the many students and faculty heard the sounds of rumbling and Diana's terrified yelling before she came down to the ground level, plummeting to the ground as she had grew to 20ft tall as she groaned in discomfort but unharmed.

1153212.content:
It was the middle of the night in the dorms of U.A, everyone was fast asleep in preparation for tomorrow. However, amongst these students was a greenette known as Izuku Midoriya. The freckled teen was sweating as he tossed in his sleep, the white shirt he wore stuck to his muscled torso as he groaned

Izuku blinked down in shock as scurrying around his clunky red shoes were cars and citizens. The tallest buildings around him only reached his knees and the ground crumbled as he simply shifted his weight.

“U-um please move, I don’t want to step on you!”, Izuku pleaded as he lifted up his large foot and brought it forward. The boy flinched as he felt a weight crush under his shoe.

“Oi watch it!”, an angry salesman yelled as his car laid flattened like a coin under Izuku’s shoes.

Izuku nervously mumbled. “S..sorry!”, unfortunately swaying his body had his hip crashing into a building to knock it down like a mega block set. “AH Sorry!”, the boy frantically apologized to the bug sized people at his feet.

The bed beneath a Izuku began to creak, as if more mass was being added. Suddenly the familiar green bolts of the boy’s quirk started to surge. His plump and smelly feet started to get wider and taller, his shirt started to tear as his sweaty muscles bulked up.

With this strange nightmare came a BIG change to the greenette. And by morning he had grown.....
1153212.title: Izuku Midoriya

115321332.content: Let's start off with my personal favs...
115321332.title: How about some girls?!

115321332331.content:
Izuku Midoriya was walking rather nervously towards Power Loader’s workshop..where he knew exactly who he’d find: Mei Hatsume.

But Hatsume had been assisting everyone of class 1-A with their costume upgrades, so she was invaluable despite her energetic and sometimes over-assertive personality.

Gripping the door handle, he winced as he remembered how it had literally blown up in his face the last time he was here. He also blushed as he remembered Mei’s bust pressing on him in front of Uraraka.

Midoriya slid the door open, “Hey Mr. Power Loa-AHhhHH!” He yelled out comically as he saw what was akin to a gigantic cannon with a pointed glowing tip aiming at him...before he was then zapped and felt like he was being electrocuted.

When the smoke cleared and the machine seemingly powered down. Hatsume emerged from behind the enormous thing, “Heeeey! You got in the way of my baby’s test run!”

“O-Oh...sorry, Mei...but I came here to ask-” Izuku barely opened his mouth before the prodigy inventor was off and running. “Isn’t she gorgeous!? She’ll be equipped with over a hundred different quirk types to be zapped into people! Can you imagine if people were able to wield TWO quirks at once?! Hehehehehee! But for a test run I could only put in one quirk right now.”

“Wait...what? So...what did you just uh...zap me with? I mean...which quirk?” Izuku was almost afraid to find out.

“That's the fun part, I was thinking of many sorts of Quirks to use like Todoroki's or Bakugou's, but I think it was wise to simply dial it down to Mount. Lady's quirk of Gigantification!” She enthusiastically told him much to his surprise.

“Mount Lady!? Wouldn't I grow out of this room?” He asked nervously to which she gained a thoughtful look on her face.

“As a matter of fact, yes! But it doesn't seem to be working like I intended, do you feel different? Do you feel yourself pumping with energy?” Mei asked Izuku excitedly as he backed up from her invading his personal space.

“Not exactly but could you please give me some room?” He requested of her as she somewhat obliged him, “Though I wonder if its slow to activate, that could be it, I knew my baby wouldn't just not work.” She mused to herself.

“Well...thanks for uh...that...but I’ve gotta head back to class now!” Midoriya quickly exited the room, the reason for his going to Hatsume in the first place completely eradicated from his mind.

He kept having panicky thoughts of outgrowing his clothes or causing the entire roof of U.A. to collapse...it was quite scary for the young hero to be. However, he at least had the comfort in knowing it was quite early in the morning so it wasn’t like everyone was here yet.

Unfortunately he was quite looking where he was going..and bumped right into Ochaco Uraraka..sending them both falling to the floor.

“Waaah!” Both students cried out as they landed in a heap. “Oh, Uraraka! I’m so sorry are you hurt!?”

“No...I’m totally fine! Don’t worry!” Uraraka cheerfully replied even though she was inwardly blushing as Izuku had landed riiight on top of her.

It took him a moment to realize that her breasts were squishing against his chest as he blushed up a storm as he stuttered,”S-sorry about that!” He said hastily getting off from her.

Though unknown to both, a faint static jumped from Izuku's body and into Uraraka's with such subtly, “Its fine, honestly!” She reassured the boy as she got back up to her feet along with Izuku.

“So what were you doing that looked like you were in a hurry?” She inquired from him, knowing that he doesn't normally act like that.

“Oh, well you see, I was trying to get some upgrades to my costume to help better my Shoot Style but then Mei Hatsume accidentally blast me with some of Quirk giving device.” Deku explained to her what had transpired earlier on as she was surprised and also confused by the concept, a machine that gives Quirks?

“Weird...so it’s a machine that lets a person have TWO quirks at the same time?” Uraraka asked, this was quite interesting!

“I guess...but I think it’s nowhere near ready yet...it doesn’t even seem to work.” Midoriya said. “I didn’t even get to ask her about my costume upgrades.” He sighed.

Ochako and Izuku went into the classroom and sat down in their seats. Jiro and Kaminari were already in there and of course Jiro was teasing Kaminari about how his quirk made him temporarily dumb.

Unknown to the duo...an invisible spark of energy entered Jiro and Kaminari from Midoriya’s body.

Soon people began to filter into the classroom of 1-A..and the students chatted amongst themselves.

The class was looking a bit more vibrant as they talked amongst themselves considering its a few more minutes until class actually starts.

“So Midoriya got into some mess with Hatsume with a quirk giving machine?” Jiro asked Uraraka curiously after she had explained to her about what was the rush with him and why he came into the room in such a hurry.

“Yeah, but I don't even know if whatever she did worked on him or something.” She mulled over the fact before she simply shrugged, whatever it was it probably wasn't anything to get investigative over.

But unknown to the ones that were afflicted by the static that actually carried the Quirk that was transmitted to them like some sort of disease, it started to activate itself in a slow manner.

Throughout the day, the affected students of Class 1-A and to no one’s knowledge the cause of this whole ‘infection’ Mei Hatsume...were feeling rather….uncomfortable.

It was a strange feeling, to know something is off and perhaps your clothes are fitting a bit more snug than before...but unable to put your finger on what was wrong.

At least the others weren’t...as they weren’t really privy to the knowledge they’d been infected by Midoriya’s newly acquired ‘disease’. For Midoriya he was too focused on his studies to notice much of a difference in clothing fitting.

Soon the school day was over, and everyone of course headed back to the Heights Alliance dorm on U.A.’s campus. It was there that once those ‘infected’ started to get changed into more casual wear...they noticed how tight everything was...especially their shoes!

Denki and Jiro were seated in their own respective rooms and were having a tough time removing their shoes and socks. Same went for Midoriya and Uraraka!

“Gr..grrrgh!” Jiro grunted.

“Grrrrraaa….!” Denki yelled, causing some folks out in the hallway to assume he was having trouble going to the bathroom.

Midoriya grit his teeth as he tugged and pulled at the sweat ridden footwear and socks.

It took some time before they managed to pop off their smaller shoes with with a groan of relief, though soon after they took it off, they crinkle their noses at the slight foot odor coming from their feet, though to them it probably wasn’t much, but to others, it was quite...unpleasant.
115321332331.title: Hatsume,Midoriya,Kaminari,Uraraka,Jirou

choices: Keep Focusing on Kaminari and Co.!
1153213323311.content:
“Man I thought they’d be stuck on forever!” Jiro said relieved, massaging her right foot to alleviate the slight pain of being confined in those shoes, but she was confused as well.

“Didn’t these things fit just a moment ago? Now I feel like its slightly constricting.” She noted on what just happened, looking over herself, though she blushed a little at the fact her breasts were pushing a bit against the tight shirt.

“You’re telling me, how did this happen?” Denki asked her, trying to not stare at her chest, which she caught him doing, “Well…” She began with a slight glare at him trying to sneak a peek, “What Uraraka said was that something was going on with Izuku, so I guess what happened to him is happening to all of us.” She guessed, not entirely sure of what happened but it seemed a likely cause.

Meanwhile in Uraraka’s room, she had just flopped onto the bed with a wide relaxed smile on her face and a groan of relief...her still steaming school shoes and knee-socks lay on the floor at the foot of the bed.

“What...is….going on…?” She huffed to herself as she stared at the ceiling, sweat having beaded on her forehead from the effort it took to unleash her plump feet from those abnormally tight confines.

Uraraka was currently in a pair of shorts and a loose fitting tank top as she was sprawled out on her bed huffing and puffing.

Midoriya likewise in his own room sighed in sweet release as he tossed his now balled up and wet socks into the hamper. His feet emitted a foul odor just like the rest..though some could say since he was ‘infected’ long prior to the others...his was more potent.

He was thinking to himself of how will he tell the others about how he was hit by a Quirk giving device that turned people practically into Mount Lady for crying out loud!

But unknown to him and everyone else affected by it they might actually end up significantly bigger than the recently minted Pro Hero, not that they would know until later.

Izuku then straighten up as he gained a determined look on his face, whatever that might happen to him he still has his dream of being a hero, he shouldn't let this slow him down.

“Besides since she can return to normal size I bet I can do the same as well.” He theorized as he nodded to himself in agreement of his assessment, he tried to focus on trying to return to normal size, only to realize after a while it didn't really work as he thought it would.

Izuku sighed as he flexed his toes in slight annoyance, he guess he'll have to deal with tight clothes until Mei figures out how to fix this.

Soon enough it was dark out, and the U.A. students were milling around the dorms..being teenagers they aren’t exactly predisposed to going to bed early.

Jiro and Uraraka were hanging out in the latter’s room getting to know each other better..unknown to them (at least pretending to not know at least), Denki and Mineta were listening outside the bedroom door.

“Oh my angels….what secrets do you share with one another...in the quiet of the night?” Mineta moaned pervertedly.

“Move over, I wanna listen.” Denki hissed in hushed tones.

“So why do you think our clothes were all tight?” Uraraka asked Jiro as they both were seated on the girl’s bed.

“I dunno...but it was almost like we weren’t fitting them the same way we did when we came in to school….but that’s impossible...growth spurts don’t work like that.” Jiro said thoughtfully.


Right on cue, both Jiro and Uraraka began to feel a tingling sensation throughout their bodies...from their heads all the way down to their bare and still quite sticky and odorous toes.

The same went for Denki who suddenly felt like his whole body was getting a surge of power...and to Mineta’s horror his pal and fellow perv’s body was starting to crush him against the door as the electric user began to experience a growth spurt along with Jiro and Uraraka.
One thing was for sure...that door Denki was pressing against wasn’t going to hold him pushing up against it much longer…

It was at that moment that the door couldn't take anymore and went flying off its hinges as Mineta and Denki was flung right in front of the two girls.

“Oh man, I wasn't expecting a growth spurt…” Denki groaned in annoyance as the Mineta lifted his head off from the floor to then be hit by the noxious odor of their sweaty feet.

“Seriously? You decided to now act all perverted on us?” Jiro questioned them in irritation, with Uraraka glaring at then the same as they shuddered in comedic horror.

“Now ladies let's not act in such a rash manner.” Mineta said in a meek sort of tone as he then see Jiro then lift her foot over his face as the sweat lightly dripped off of her sole as she then stepped on him, forcing the boy to inhale her rather odorous foot odor, making him yell in terror at the smell.

Denki tried to crawl backwards out of where the door was when his attempt was stopped by Uraraka slamming her foot next to his head, actually making the things on the shelves and dressers to rattle from the force, “And where do you think you're going?” She asked him sternly.

Denki cringed as the close proximity of Uraraka's large foot to his head... giving him an experience in her potent foot stink.

“Ack! Come on girls, we just shot up to six feet! Don't we have more impor-” Kaminari tried to reason, but found Uraraka's sole cut him off as it was placed on his face.

“Kiss it and show us how sorry you are.” She stated dangerously.

Jiro smirked wickedly at little Mineta at her own feet.

Considering that he was the same small size as he always was, Jiro's admittedly large feet was practically half his size as she grinded her sole onto his head, saturating it with her sweat.

“So you think barging in to us growing girls is funny isn’t it?” She mocked him as she watch the boy squirm ineffectually to try and get away from the foul smelling odor, it’s one thing to loot panties and the like, but to be forced to smell her feet is something else!

Uraraka was giggling to herself as she squeezed Kaminari’s nose between her toes only to then release it to make the boy be forced to inhale between them as he coughed from the pungent smell coming from them, “Geez Uraraka I didn’t think your feet stink that bad!” He cried out as she grinned at him.

“Neither did I, I guess I’m full of surprises.” She said in a smug tone, though inwardly she was laughing at the fun she was having with this sort of degrading punishment, though to be fair the thing she was affected by also seem to increase her sweat output to a certain above average.

With Mineta, Jiro planted her sole against his diminutive face and grinded her sour sweat into his nostrils. “Not what you thought it’d be like, huh?!” She snapped with a glare at the grape-headed perv.

Uraraka and Jiro finally plopped down on the bed with two girlish sighs, leaving their feet propped up on their heels to display their odorous soles and waft their toes.

“Y’know…since you apparently grew too, Kaminari...you maybe can join in.” Jiro said with a slight blush as she twirled one of her earlobes around her finger.

“Or I can go back to rubbing my feet all over your face!” Uraraka teased and flexed her big toe at him.

It wasn’t nearly the difficult choice Mineta had hoped his pal would find it to be. “Deal!” Kaminari practically blurted.

“Then let’s see what you got...wonder if your feet will be outshined by us girls.” Uraraka teased, whatever had effected the group..had made them rather frisky and obviously sweaty.

“W-what!? No way! You can’t do this to me, buddy!” Mineta objected as Kaminari towered over him even moreso than usual.

“Uh, sorry man, but I'm not really interested in getting stomped on so take one for the team.” He told him with a apologetic smile as he lifted his large foot over Mineta's face and wiggled his toes at him almost teasingly.

Before he then abruptly stomped down on him as Mineta yelped from the foot pressing down on his body.

“You don't feel apologetic!” Mineta retorted comically as the foot odor that wafted from the Electricity Quirk User was just as awful as the girls’ were, “Well duh, I'm not down there am I?” He asked in a joking tone as he rubbed his foot across his smaller body like a rag with his sweat from his soles draining onto the shirt.

And coincidentally enough, generated enough electricity to then begin to zap the smaller pervert with some non-lethal static electricity.

115321332331131.content:
"Holy crap!" Denki exclaimed practically describing the emotions of this moment for everyone as the plaster fell from the ceiling as they backed up into the corners of the room as Izuku's head came into view with a grimace, "Sorry! I didn't think that would happen!" He apologized to them.

"Its alright, just hope theres an end to this!" Jiro stated as she saw Deku's growth resume as the stressful situation of the boy growing into their room caused the same changes that Izuku has experienced first.

It was then quite apparent when they too noticed the increased size when Uraraka bumped her head into the ceiling while crouching, "This place can't take much more." Denki reminded them as Jiro rolled her eyes at his statement of the obvious as she looked to the other end of the wall.

"At the count of 3 we bust through this thing to outside." Jiro said to her friends as Denki raised an eyebrow curiously.

Uraraka got that part of the plan immediately, even if they didn't say it, Izuku's growing body had caused the entire 1-A class to be evacuated off the premises as the trio reared their shoulders to the wall and thrusted forward.

The wall was easily destroyed by the growing men and women as they saw the carnage from the outside perspective.
115321332331131.title: Jiro, Denki and Uraraka grow MORE as well!

115331.content:
An SAO fan, eh? Alright! Here are some ideas featuring the lovely ladies of Sword Art Online!

1. Goddess Lisbeth: Shinozaki Rika enters a contest made to promote a mysterious soon to be released VRMMO (Virtual Reality MMO). Against all odds, she wins! The promised reward is admin privileges and in game omnipotence within the new fantasy game entitled: Goddess' Wrath.

Once Rika dives into the game, she discovers herself in her original Lisbeth avatar from SAO...only at 100 ft. tall!

Being the mischievous type, she's sure to have a LOT of fun as a giant goddess with unlimited power!

2. Sinon's Therapy: Prior to meeting Kirito and the Death Gun fiasco, Asada Shino's therapist recommends her client a stress relief VRMMO. This VRMMO was designed by psychology experts and Asada's avatar Sinon from GGO would be able to download directly to it. This stress relief sounds strange, but it's found to be quite effective. Sinon finds herself in what appears to be a tiny model city, at an enormous height! Sinon immediately understands what her therapist meant...this is going to be quite a stress reliever indeed!

3. More ideas
115331.title: Sword Art Online

choices: Sinon yanks off those stuffy boots!
Sinon decides to stuff some people in her armpits
Sinon engages in some vore-ish fun
1153312.content:
Sinon: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/e...

-----------------------

Asada Shino sat in her bedroom, having just come home from a therapy session. The glasses wearing girl was a far cry in appearance from her Gun Gale Online avatar: Sinon. Sinon was badass sniper with cyan hair...and while technically they were the same person...Asada felt more free to express herself and go wild when she was in game.

Maybe that's why she felt her heart flutter at the proposed 'therapy' VRMMO sessions prepared for her that would incorporate Sinon as her avatar.

Her hands clenched on her legs as she recalled being continuously bullied by her classmates over her very real fear of guns. She even trembled and had a near panic attack when one of the bitches aimed a finger-gun at her.

"Calm down...." She quietly said to herself as she cast a glance over at her headset.

Fuck it...she decided...what harm could it do?

=======

Shortly after placing the headset upon herself and starting up the fulldive technology, she found herself standing as Sinon...only she was in the middle of a city that greatly resembled a real life Tokyo...and a dropdown menu in front of her face.

"What's this...?" She mumbled in confusion as she scrolled through a list of heights ranging from 50ft. to 100 ft. and onward.

Feeling curious, she pressed her slender finger to the words '100ft.'.

A tingling filled her body and she let out a gasp as she realized she was growing bigger and bigger!

Looking down, she saw the street she was standing on getting further away, along with cars and even buildings!

When she finally stopped growing she was exactly 100ft tall.

Looking around in shock, a sinister grin formed on Sinon's face. "Well...I gotta say this is going to be one hell of a therapy session!" Her voice rattled windows along with the tiny lifelike npcs' eardrums.

Looking through the menus, she saw an option for odd things like sweat and odor, and things to increase the tiny NPCs lifelike qualities and even an option to spawn military resistance!

Wiggling her sockless toes in her boots, Sinon felt they were slick with sweat and grinned deviously. She took the cursor and cranked up the sweat meter along with the odor one.

Immediately she felt her armpits and feet dampen like she'd been baking in the hot sun.

Approaching a skyscraper with screaming office folk inside, she tapped her finger on the glass and grinned wickedly inside. "Oho...you runts are SOOOO screwed." She sneered.

Sinon lifted her boot clad foot and stomped it hard down on a busy street, demolishing cars and causing a crater to form in the shape of her boot. "Hah! AHAHAHAHA!" She roared with laughter.

She wielded unlimited power here! And she was going to damn sure enjoy exploiting it!
1153312.title: Sinon's Therapy

choices: Crush all the Npc's with her foot
Plant more people on her body
11533122.content:
As soon as she placed her giant boot down onto the ground, all of the Npc seemed to jump at the same time. Running away and screaming. Sinon smiled to herself, a satisfied look on her face. She was sceptical at first but now... now she's all in.

Walking closer to the fleeing crowd she brought her foot down. She couldn't see it but she had a feeling she just squished someone under her boot. Normally killing someone would be a major problem, but thats the beauty of a game.

Looking down she saw a small Npc running away. Looked to be an average man, nothing really special about him. Smiling gladly, thinking he will make a good first target. Sinon reached down and yanked the man between her two digital fingers. She stood up and saw him struggling in between her grip. He looked so frighten, it was borderline adorable.

“So NPC, do you have an actual name or are you just an extra running around.”

“Let me go please” The man said simply. It didn't sound like an actual conversation starter, more just extra fluff the non important characters say.

“Makes it less fun, then again i don't really need a name for what I'm about to do to you” Sinon said with a now devilish grin. She went into her menu with her free hand, looking for her equipment and her attire. Since everything has transferred over to this game from her Gun Gale Online profile, she's got all her stuff still. Including her favourite sniper. But that wasn't what she was interested in.

Moving down she unequipped her jacket. Leaving her in nothing but her inner clothes. The Npc didn't know what was happening, until it was far to late. Sinon moved and pushed the Npc deep into her skin, more specifically her clean shaven armpit. Raising her arm as she pushed him far in. She saw the Npc get sweatier and sweatier as she rubbed him around. Thank god for the sweat function, makes this so much funner.

Another good touch is hearing the Npc scream. Very satisfying. She removed her hand quickly and slammed her arm down, trapping the man between her upper arm and her body. With her free hand she equipped the jacket. Meaning the man was trapped in there.

Sinon likes having him in there, and will get him out to see the effect the sweat had, but after a while.

With a satisfied smile she looked around even more, seeing some other Npcs staring at her. Most with stunned looked. However that changed when she looked at them, almost like they just went on alert they started fleeing again.

Sinon laughed at they're pathetic movements, thinking that these people have no idea how screwed they were. Might as well have a little fun with them. Plus all the functions at her command, she can do some real creative stuff. With the man still trapped in her armpit, she chased after the crowd. Planning to _______________
