1153331332332.content:
After Volume 5.

Raven Branwen is in the forest not far from her tribe's camp. She just defeated Cinder at Haven Academy and allowed her neglected daughter to take the relic.

Tears were still running down her face, she made a lot of choices, she still believed that Salem could not be beaten. But the things her daughter said made her think what if she kept fighting.

Maybe Summer would still be alive.

Maybe she wouldn't have left Taiyang

And maybe she wouldn't have left her daughter wonder why she left.

These thoughts made her eyes leak out the spring maiden's power, the power that was never hers, the power she stole from a scared girl! Yang must have felt ashamed for having a coward like her for a mother! Summer wouldn't look at her if she was alive! And what would Tai think?

She left her family behind not for her tribe but because she was scared. And she valued strength but she ran away from the people she valued most. "Aaaaah!" She wailed as her maiden powers created lightning around her. And then something else happened as she screamed in anguish.

She started growing, the towering trees around her seemed to shrink as her body grew until the trees only reached her knees. She stopped screaming and calmed down and looked at her new surroundings.

"What, just happened?" She asked herself looking down at the trees that once towered over her. "I've grown but how?"

She looked around to some more and looked down to see a pack of Ursa's only they were small, almost as small as her high heel boots. Instinctively she rose one of her giant feet and stomped down on a couple of the Ursa, the rest of the pack ran trying to get away from the giant Spring Maiden.

She watched as the pack run she looked at trees that were at her knees and the sight of the running Ursa. She would estimate she was roughly 50 ft tall!

She looked at her hands and formed ice with her Spring Maiden powers. That must be it, her sudden growth spurt must have been caused from her Maiden powers, and anger at herself. How else could she have grown?

Wait. With her new size she could change things, she could go back to fighting Salem. She could try to rekindle her relationship with Taiyang, and maybe start a relationship with Yang. She can keep herself and her family safe from whatever might threaten them, from Salem and otherwise.

A smile formed on her lips, with this new size and power there's nothing she could be afraid of. And who knows maybe she can grow even bigger.

But for she'll decide what to do first. She could

A: Go after Salem. (She could meet some of her associates and find out Cinder survived. She'll likely torture and interrogate her for information and make her a tiny slave for her.)

B: Go find Team RWBY (She could join her daughter's party, and be a real mother to Yang, whether she likes it or not. Her new size will likely deny any rejections even from Ozpin or her brother.)

C: Go to Taiyang( She could try to rekindle their relationship, try to convince him that she can make up for her mistakes. And if he refuses she'll 'persuade' him to renew their relationship.

She'll do all these eventually. What option does she go for first?
1153331332332.title: Raven Branwen the spring giantess

choices: Obedience (She'll become Raven's slave and tell her about Salem)
11533313323321.content:
As much as Raven would have liked reuniting with both Yang and Taiyang to form a true family, Salem is still a threat, maybe not to her now but still to her family. Not to mention Summer's daughter Ruby.

So Salem must be dealt with first, then she can start being a true wife and mother.

Raven started walking her enormous steps shaking the earth beneath her giant feet., crushing various grimm living in the forest or forcing them to flee. A smile formed at her lips. 'Ozpin must not have known about this power of the maidens, he'd do anything for a chance to defeat Salem.'

With this new size and power Salem herself will be terrified.

"AAAAAH!"

Speaking of terrified, some traveler must have spotted her, she looked down to the source of the tiny scream that sounded like a loud squeak.

A woman dropped her basket and ran away once the giantess bandit looked down at her, leaving behind another woman in a red dress on the ground. Raven rolled her eyes and was about to walk away until she recognized the wounded woman that was left behind.

"Wait, I know you." Raven stated as she took another booming step and crouched to get a better look at the woman left behind. "Cinder"

Cinder's remaining eye looked up in shock at the gargantuan Raven Branwen. She was just defeated by her, and now she was found by her 10 times her size. "H-how is this possible?" Cinder asked aloud terrified at the mighty size of the bandit.

Raven smirks looking down at the false maiden. "This is perfect, I was on my way looking for your master and here I've found you."

Cinder managed to get up and turn around to retreat.

SLAM!

Raven's giant fingerless gloved hand crashed in front of the scarred woman and it's giant fingers ensnared the False Maiden. "Let me go!" Cinder screamed as Raven squeezed causing her pain.


Raven brought Cinder to level just below her chin, to get a better look at her and keep the flase maiden looking up at her giant beautiful face. "Listen worm, you have a new master now." She stated with a smile. "Not only will you tell me where Salem is, you will do any task I see fit do you understand.... slave?"

Cinder looked up at her from the Bandit Chief's fist, she instinctively gulped wondering what to do. Is she loyal enough to keep her mouth shut and defy her. Or does she obey and comply with the giantess for now?

One of three things will happen now.

A: Defiance (She'll refuse to obey Raven and try to fight back or escape Raven will torture her with pain and putting her in humiliating positions on her body like say sitting on her with her giant butt.)

B: Obedience( She'll tell her some of what she knows, and Raven will have her do various tasks for her like a slave, such as rubbing her giant feet, entertaining her with humiliating tasks, and varous other tasks)

C: Growth Spurt (She'll defy her and discover she has the same size power Raven has and either match or surpass Raven's height, the reader may decide if she's bigger, shorter or matches Raven's enormous size)

Which of the three happens?
11533313323321.title: Giantess Raven finds Cinder

choices: Step on her and slowly increase the pressure.
115333133233211.content:
While Cinder feel that she is at a bit of a disadvantage due to her size compared to Raven's, she would be obliged to give away her secrets to preserve her own life above Salem's desires, she was Cinder Fall after all, and she is not easily deterred from a challenge.

"I won't dare try to give away Salem's secrets, I'm not weak!" She declared as her only eye glowed with wisping orange trail flowing from it as she heated up her body.

The heat was sufficient enough to make Raven grit her teeth in pain and forced her to let go as she saw her fly in mid air and flew at blinding speeds to fire large fireballs at her.

"So you're trying the hard way huh?" She asked in a disappointed tone and raised her arms to block the fireballs as they harmlessly detonated against her.

Cinder growled in annoyance at her enemy not falling to her power, she summoned a large firey blade in her right hand nearly as big as Raven's head as she flew towards her to skewer her in the head.

Only to in turn had it swiftly grabbed by a giant hand, Raven looking positively bored, "Really now?" She rhetorically asked her before snapping it in two like a twig before she swatted Cinder down like a fly.

Luckily for Raven it was not enough to kill but it will disorient her to find a proper solution to dealing with her stubbornness.
115333133233211.title: Defiance (Raven tortures her)

choices: Raven makes Cinder tell her about Salem
Raven takes Cinder's power growing larger.
115333133233212.content:
Cinder's instinct was screaming at her to defy this maiden wannabe, but she knew that it wouldn't well with her in her tight grip. Perhaps she can tell her lies to keep Raven from tormenting her, and escape to warn Salem of Raven's growth spurt.

Raven squeezed her hand forcing Cinder to scream in agony. "Answer me now, slave."

"Gah!" Cinder gave a painful grunt, she tried not to glare at the wretched giant woman and try to use her powers. She lost to her normal size, what good could she be now. "I" She struggled with her words, she's never had to obey anyone other than Salem before. "I understand."

Raven didn't seem convinced, the red flare in her eyes showing her Maiden powers glowed making her look more threating to the woman in her fist. "Be more specific."

Cinder really wanted to avoid actually saying it, but she got terrified from the intense look she was getting. "I will obey you."

"Hmph" Raven looked at the small woman disappointed she was hoping she'd resist at first to show her how much more strength she has than her. And the various things she can do to her with her new size. "Prove it."

Cinder looked up at her, before she could ask what she meant Raven 'lightly' tossed Cinder on the ground making her groggy as she just woke up from a coma in their previous fight. A shadow covered her, she looked up to see the bottom of Raven's black shoe.

Cinder stood up and backed away.

Raven smirked down at the woman scared for her life trying to scurry away. "Prove that I have your loyalty by cleaning the bottom of my boot of dirt."

Cinder would have been angry again but this time she was terrified, the sight of the bottom of this giant bandit's boot and seeing her stand at full height makes her realize how small she really is compared to her. "What do I clean it with?"

"Your tongue." Raven brought her boot down making Cinder flinch as the bottom of Raven's boot was just above her head.

Cinder really didn't want to do this but escaping right now isn't an option, she'll have to feign loyalty until she finds an opening. With much reservation she stood up looking up at the sole of Raven's boot and took a lick.

It was as bad as expected, the dirt from the woman's travels were felt on her tongue, but she didn't stop she licked the boot hoping a way out of this humiliating position will present itself.

Raven tilted her head to see Cinder licking the bottom of her boot, she smirked seeing that she has Salem's most powerful lacky serving her. "Keep licking slave, well have a talk about Salem soon." She smirked as she sees Cinder licking.

What'll happen now?

A: Raven makes Cinder tell her about Salem (Raven will go on a rampage on all of Salem's allies dragging Cinder around, also torturing her into telling the truth.)

B: Raven wants to break Cinder( Raven will make Cinder do so many other humiliating tasks until she becomes so broken that she will see Raven as her goddess)

C: Raven tries to take Cinder's power (Raven will want to take Cinder's maiden power so she can grow larger
115333133233212.title: Obedience (She'll become Raven's slave ...

choices: Timeskip Cinder Breaks the hunt for Salem begins.
1153331332332122.content:
Raven couldn't help but smirk evilly, not long after growing into a giant she found Salem's favorite servant and turned her into her slave licking her boot. She looked down to see her step away. "Why have you stopped!" She put her foot down next to Cinder making her fall on her back from the small quake.

Cinder gritted her teeth fighting the urge to attack or even give an insulting remark. "There's no dirt it's done!"

Raven rose her eyebrow an sat on a large boulder and brought her leg on her left lap and checked the bottom of her boot while keeping an eye on the little woman on the ground. "Good work"

Cinder sighed in releif and then a large shadow covered her again, she looked up to see the bottom of Raven's other boot.

"Now the other one." She spoke.

Cinder's blood started to boil but looked up at the car sized foot loomed over her and controlled her self. She stood up and licked again.

Raven sits on the boulder and watches her new slave licking the other boot. She seems to be obedient but Raven knows better, Cinder was too quick to start obeying her. Raven could demand information from her now but it'd be nothing but lies and half truths. No she can't trust her yet, she'll need to break her, to make her see that she is and always will be her slave. Only then will she demand answers on Salem.

Raven smirked, she'll just have to make this more humiliating for her. "Alright slave stop."

Cinder graciously pulled back and spat on the ground some.

"Enjoyed the taste of my boots?" Raven looked down with her grin as she pulled her foot back.

"What do you think?!" Cinder yelled sarcastically, she bit her tongue not wanting to anger her.

Raven merely chuckled. "Then your going to love what else I have in store." She brought her foot onto her lap and grabbed her boot and started pulling. With some grunts she successfully pulled it off revealing a pale slightly sweaty foot.

Cinder looked up at the giantess confused. "What are you doing?" She then backed away as Raven's bare foot dropped infront of her.

Raven smirked as she put her other foot next to it. "Im getting ready for my slave to rub my feet."

Cinder can see the pale sole of her foot and its so large that she could only reach up to the ball of her foot. Also it had a musky smell she immediately covered her nose from it.

"Stop gagging and start rubbing." Raven commanded.

Cinder kept getting angry an orange light flickered in her only eye, she stopped trying to be rational, she walked over to her right foot, she looked up to see Raven's giant toes wiggle in anticipation.

Swallowing her pride again Cinder put her hands on the sole and went up and down her foot. They were soft and slightly moist and stank. She fought not to vomit from the smell alone, she hated putting her hands against this woman's foot.

Raven smiled down at the False maiden rubbing her foot. "Tell me how does it feel, to go from being Salem's lieutenant to rubbing a bandit's foot?"

Cinder felt angry at that, but kept selt and kept rubbing.

"I asked you a question slave." Raven's eyes flickered a red glow of her maiden powers. "And answer honestly."

Cinder growled and kept rubbing. "You won't get away with this, Salem will have your head for this!"

"Really? Like to see her try." Raven sneered.

Cinder stopped rubbing and shouted. "You say that now, but from what I remember you ran away from the fight against Salem, and now your just a bigger coward!" Cinder was pushed down by Raven's foot.

"I knew you still had some fight in you." She then planted her foot on Cinder, her head between her biggest and second toe.

Cinder gagged the smell was worse with her head between the toes. The rest of her body beneath her soft sole.

Raven rolled Cinder's body beneath her sole left to right. "Before you tell me where Salem is you will beg to be my slave." Raven promised smiling at the thought of one of her daughter's enemies becomes her slave. "I will be your goddess and then you will tell me where Salem and her allies are."

Raven stopped and positioned Cinder's head between her toes.

"I- I can tell you now!" Cinder yelled.

"I don't believe you." Raven stated. "You will lie to keep her safe, which is why first I will make you into a truly obedient slave. Just imagine you everyday massaging and bowing at my feet." She started grinding her foot down on Cinder, showing her the tremendous strength of just her foot. "You won't even remember why you obeyed Salem because you will worship me and then you will tell me everything about Salem.

Cinder gagged looking up with fear in her eye, but she persisted. "I- I won't! Salem will find me and destroy you!"

Raven sneered. "Well see little slave, we'll see." She rested her head on her chin.

What happens next?

A: Beneath Raven's foot (Raven continues to have Cinder worship her feet, making her lick them and spend the day in her boot getting Cinder closer and closer to submitting to Raven.)

B: Raven makes Cinder Pray ( Raven will demand that Cinder Pray to her for her protection and permission to touch her feet and serve her. Maybe even build a shrine to her, getting Cinder closer to breaking down and worshipping Cinder.

C: Timeskip Cinder Breaks (After days or weeks of slavery Cinder is broken and worships Raven. And then Raven finally begins her hunst for Salem and her allies.)

115333331211.content:
Kari was pouting in her room as her brother had gone out tonight..and due to the fact that she wasn't permitted to go out as late as Tai that meant she was stuck at home.

"Hehe, maybe when you're bigger you can go out!" Tai had teased her, causing her to storm up to her room. Gatoman tried to comfort her. "It's okay, Kari...don't let him get to you!" She said sweetly.

Kari sighed as she placed her pink and white shoe encased feet down on her bedroom floor. "I just wish I was bigger..."

Gatomon felt the proverbial lightbulb go off and she hopped on Kari's lap, "Well...I can arrange that." She said with a swish of her tail.

"You can?!" Kari blurted and got Gatomon's nod in return. "Just...be sure you want this." Gatomon said tentatively.

"Yeah! I want it!" Kari cheered.

"Alriiight then..." Gatomon held Kari's hands in her paws and a soft glow went from the Digimon's palms into Kari's hands and vanished into her body.

....What happens now?
115333331211.title: Tai's 'Little' Sister

choices: Skip to Morning? Ash only grew a little...
The next morning...Ash is so big he's trapped in his room!
1153333321.content:
It was late at night in Ash's home, the young lad had returned home to spend time with his mother and perhaps enjoy some time off from battling and after all it was summer vacation for the Pokemon School in Alola region!

But rest and relaxation weren't ALL he'd returned home for.

Ash had discovered a strange Z-Crystal that was unrecognizable and that he couldn't find any sort of information on. Professor Kukui had no clue about it so the strange rainbow colored crystal currently rested on Ash's bedside table...at least until Professor Oak was home and he could ask him about it.

What Ash did not know..was that this crystal was currently pulsing with power! Power that caused it to float up from his beside table silently.

Ash slightly stirred in his sleep and murmured something incoherent as a bit of drool leaked from his snoring mouth.
The Z-Crystal lit up and seemingly turned into a liquid which then floated over to Ash's gaping mouth and slid down his throat.

Of course, this caused the young trainer to sit up quickly and cough violently...waking up Pikachu in the corner who let out a sleepy 'Chuuu..."

Rushing to the bathroom,, Ash got a glass of water and gulped it down. "Ah...ah...what was that about?" Ash huffed as he looked at himself in the mirror.

Was it just him...or did he look...taller?
1153333321.title: Ash Ketchum

choices: Ash was too big to even move!
11533333212.content:
"Hmm.." Ash looked closer to see if there was anything off about himself, he could faintly see that he's somewhat different in height, making him beam a little in excitement.

"Must be getting my growth spurt finally Pikachu." Ash said to his companion and friend as the electric mouse Pokemon with a slight smile in which he yawned a bit in response, "Pikaaaa...." He said tiredly as he let a tired smile on his face as he closed his eyes once again.

Ash walked back over to his bed as he gently petted his head soothingly as he went back to his bed, "Must be pretty tired." He said more to himself than to Pikachu as he yawned as well, "Well, I think I'll look more about that tomorrow." Ash mused before he settled back in and began to sleep once again.

However as the Pokemon Trainer slept for the next day, it seem his body has no concept of the word rest in a sense as throughout the night, he grew more than just a inch as his rather sweaty bare feet peeked out from the cover as he giggled a bit in his sleep from the pleasing sensation of the growth spurt.

The growth continued until a few minutes into the morning before it stopped just as Ash was ready to wake up, groaning as he opened his eyes as he realized something weird, the ceiling was MUCH closer than normal much to his confusion, "What the?" He asked himself as he tried to lift his head only to wince from hitting his head on the ceiling, cracked edging out from the forehead impacting the piece of plaster, causing it to drop dust a little.

Things seem to calm down before....

115333333.title: More

12211.content:
It had happened all at once, Sora had been clashing against a group of Heartless and in a rather rash move followed them to a dark corridor. The last he heard was the frantic yells of his friends before being consumed by darkness. By some miracle his heart had not been weakened nor tainted, he felt normal upon waking up, though there was a big question at hand.

Opening his eyes, Sora blinked as rays of a sun hit through the branches of a tree. Covering his eyes with his palm the boy sat up with a groan, he was laying on rather lively grass and under a tall tree. The brunette looked around as thr area appeared to be a large and calm park. Confusion filled him as he slowly stood up. "Where...am i, i don't see the Heartless anywhere and...what world could this be?"

In the distance were tall buildings much like the ones in San Fransokyo, the sounds of cars rang through the air over the trees surrounding this park. Sora began to take a stroll, the only sounds being occasional bird chirping and the grass being flattened under his large shoes.

"Its definitely open here! The air's nice and the sun is pretty bright.", Sora smiled taking in the pleasant atmosphere, he might be lost but the unfamiliar world did have beauty.

A sudden glare of bright light caught the spiky haired boy's attention as he looked off. On a podium seem to be a display, a stone slab with a blue crystal sheet. Walking closer, Sora focused on the bright material it seem to pulse some kinda of energy as the light reflected off it.

He wasn't sure why but Sora reached his hand out, feeling the energy wisp against his hand. As soon as his finger touched the crystal, Sora felt a shock travel through him like static. Hopping back, Sora looked in surprise as a bolt of blue energy pulsed around him, flickering and pulsing.

Suddenly Sora....
12211.title: Sora

choices: Sora begins his fun with the populace.
Sora decides to move to a more secluded spot.
122111.content:
As Sora touched the crystal before him, he felt the surge of power flowing from the object towards his very being as he jerked his hand back from it as it dulled and went seemingly silent, the energy siphoned from it integrating into his body.

"That was pretty...weird." Sora mused as he looked around in confusion as it seems that this crystal haven't gotten any other person's attention, what the teen didn't realize, was that it was a unique kind of magic infused crystal called Aetheryte, infused with the energy of the cosmos as some scholars like to say, those that have a special attunement to the energy source will have power beyond their reckoning, one that will increase with them the longer it ferments inside them, safe to say, Sora is that candidate.

He felt the energy flow through his body as then it seemed like his perspective had shifted some, "What's going on? Am I...growing?" He questioned himself as he felt a pleasant sensation flow throughout his body as he shuddered and spurted up several feet in rapid succession as his clothes tightened somewhat on his body but still roomy enough to deal with.

The ground trembled slightly as a result of this sudden increase in weight as Sora became about 10 ft tall!

Coincidentally it was about this time that Sora heard the sounds of civilians murmuring in wonder of the larger boy in front of their very eyes in disbelief as nearby police officers try to calm them down, and yet Sora couldn't help but feel a bit of...playfulness springing up inside him, this could be interesting to have some fun.

1253312.title: D.va (Hana Song)

choices: She grows fast! Into a giantess!
She grows to 12 ft and stops...for now
12533121.content:
Hana Song stood in a wing of MEKA headquarters devoted entirely to scientific research. Not the kind she could find interest in either, it was all test tubes and animal testing in here.

She wore casual clothing rather than her bodysuit, a gamer cap and headphones resting around her neck as well as a t-shirt with her very own D. Va logo on it of the angry looking pink bunny, and cargo shorts and a pair of slip on sneakers.

Wearing a bored expression, she casually blew a bubble with her gum and let it pop before slurping it back into her mouth. Dae-Hyun elbowed her gently, making sure she knew she was supposed to be paying attention to this presentation.

Song caught the tail end of it...something about some weird super-soldier experiment to be tested on her. Her eyes widened and she shared a look with Dae-Hyun. "What? No way." She refused.

"This could very well be a breakthrough in our fight against Gwishin! Besides, if successful you might even be powerful enough to not NEED a mech...and afterward we might not even need mechs at all for ANY of MEKA." The head scientist, a remarkably Einstein looking fellow, tried to convince her.

Hana Song DID like the idea of getting a power boost...a big one by the sounds of it...she could REALLY kick some ass then...livestreaming it would probably make her even MORE popular.

Before she could answer, Dae-Hyun butted in. "And if it doesn't work? Will she be ok?"

"Worst case scenario is some minor aggression problems...but that's all." The second scientist said with a dismissive wave of his hand.

"Alriiight! Let's go!" D. Va was already laying on the chrome table and strapping herself in.

"Uhh..?" Dae-Hyun was ignored by the scientists as well as Hana as the lights were dimmed and a device resembling a gigantic x-ray machine was lowered over Hana's body which had been secured to the table.

"Well..at least it's not a needle." Hana said with a slight chuckle at Dae-Hyun.

Dae sighed, "Are you sure you want to go through with this...?"

Before Hana could answer, the device hummed to life and crackled with energy...before beginning to zap Hana Song on the table.
12533121.title: Grow

choices: With the people trying to flee the facility.
125331211.content:
Hana groaned from the initial pain of the device zapping her as she was strapped onto a table, she grit her teeth as her body twitched and shuddered from the energy going through her body, "The energy spiking up is incredible I never believed that it would work!" Dae commented in awe at the results.

"Great that you find the time to be excited about something!" Hana said biting through the pain, feeling her body put on a few inches as her feet felt snug in her shoes as her shirt stretched across her breasts, as the console slowly began to spark and sputter.

"Wait...something went wrong, something is happening!" One of the scientists cried out as the alert blared throughout the room, "What is it?" Another asked, "Calibration has failed, the energy is too much!" A Female scientist warned.

Hana groaned in discomfort as the growth spurt accelerated, her shoes started to tear off as her freed toes wiggled and flexed as the cramped shoes were destroyed by her growth spurt, her pink painted toenails on display.

Her shirt teared up and exposed more of her skin, same with her shorts before the restraints burst off of her as she pulled her legs up and did the same for her arms as her growth went out of control, "We need to evacuate!" One of them said as they started to pack their things and begin to run.
125331211.title: She grows fast! Into a giantess!

125331231.content:
"Wow, there's a lot of people here today," Brigitte Lindholm remarked as she removed her flip flops and took a step onto the sand from the wooden walkway. "I hope they don't swarm us begging you for autographs like last time," she told her girlfriend Hana Song who'd accompanied her. They'd been allowed to take a vacation week away from Overwatch, and they'd traveled back to Busan, South Korea. They were staying at a swanky hotel on the beach, but it wasn't merely a leisurely trip, however. Winston had given them a special assignment. He'd supposedly invented a special type of sunscreen for long outdoor missions that was 100% water and sweat-proof and could last for days. Hana and Brigitte then volunteered to be the first test subjects if it meant they could spend a week together at the beach.
"Yeah, we'll just try and keep a low-profile this time," Hana replied as she removed her footwear as well. She then looked around for a spot in the sand that wasn't too close to anyone else to set their towels and beach bags down. Once she'd found one, she reached inside the bag and pulled out the bottle of formula that Winston had given her.
"This stuff had better work," She said, "If we get sunburned that monkey's going to owe us big time!"
"Yeah, seriously!" Brigitte replied, "but I have faith. Winston's a pretty smart guy."
"True," Hana said, "Just make sure you do my back real good, k Babe?"
"Of course, Hon!" Brigitte reassured her.
Little did the two young women know as they rubbed the lotion onto their skin, that it had been severely tampered with. Hammond, Winston's former animal-experiment counterpart from the Horizon Lunar Colony, had sneaked into his lab several days ago. The hamster then proceeded to investigate what the ape had been working on, but being the careless type, didn't put back all of the chemicals where he'd found them. The mix-up had left the two ladies with a different formula that Winston himself had never intended to give them.
"There, all done," Brigitte said as she finished rubbing the lotion onto her lover's back. "Ready to do mine?"
"Sure," Hana replied as she rubbed the chemical onto the young Swedish woman's back as well.
"Alright, that should do it," Hana said, "now we can relax!"
"Totally!" Brigitte responded. "Talk about an easy mission!" she said as she leaned in and gave Hana a kiss on the cheek. "I just hope Reinhardt can survive without me for a week."
"I'm more worried about your dad trying to mess with my mech while I'm away. He always bugs me about it but you're the only one I trust to help me work on it," Hana replied.
"Haha, oh I'm sure it'll be fine, Hon," Brigitte said, "my dad's no idiot... well not really anyway."
Hana chuckled. "Thanks Babe, that's very reassuring."
"Hey, I... feel kinda funny," Brigitte suddenly told her.
"Really? Is everything..." Hana started to ask but couldn't finish as she just stood still with her jaw hanging open.
"What's wrong, Hon?" Brigitte asked before also realizing something strange was happening. "Hey, what the hell's going on?!" she exclaimed. "Why does it look like everything's shrinking?!"
The landscape around them wasn't shrinking, however. The two girls were in fact growing in size due to a side effect of the formula they'd been given.
They began to grow...
125331231.title: Yes - Brigitte

choices: The Police had came from the panic calls to try and stop them.
The two decide to try and past the time.
1253312311.content:
The couple watched themselves startled at what was happening as their clothes ripped off of eachother, leaving them bare naked as the beach goers then started to run as fast as they could away from their growing giant bare feet as the ground shook, "Oh no I'm naked!" Hana complained as she covered her breasts and crotch to preserve some form of modesty on her body as Brigitte rolled her eyes at her girlfriend acting hysterical, though she felt the water brush against her heels is when she realized how big they were getting.

Hana's pink-painted toes bulldozed through the boardwalk as they ran away from them as she unintentionally flexed them as she took a few steps back into the water.

"Whoops! Sorry!" She apologized to the small people as the growth started to slow down mercifully enough.

"I was wondering when it'd stop." Brigitte wondered with a sigh as the growth spurt finally stopped and left the two at around the range of 550 ft, proportionately they were the same height to each other, but to everyone else there, they were like two colossal towers of flesh and bones.

"Maybe we should stay in the water? So that we don't accidentally hurt anyone." Brigitte proposed to Hana as she pouted a little,"Really? It sounds so boring though." She said childishly, not wanting to just stay in one area, besides she'd like to get something to cover herself up.

What happens now?

125333311.content:
"Woww! Lady Palutena sure is generous to let me take a vacation to this world!" Pit declared as he flew through the skies. It was a modern city-type of planet that had all the pleasures of the human world but without the trouble that people would freak out if they saw a real life angel.

Apparently this world was a sort of vacation resort that allowed for various universal travelers to come take a load off. So someone from Skyworld wouldn't be too strange.

Soaring down to the swanky hotel that he would be staying at, the automatic doors opened and caused Pit to leap back. "Ohh...right...hehe." Pit said sheepishly as he got a few stares. Walking up to the front desk he rang the bell and was startled once again as the clerk practically rose up from beneath the desk. "Hello! How can I help you?"

"Uh..I'm from Skyworld...Lady Palutena supposedly made a reser-" Pit started to say, only to be interrupted by the enthusiastic man.

"Yes! Of course! Right this way! Do you have any luggage?" The man asked, Pit blinked and shook his head. "Oh...well no matter...right this way!"

Pit was taken to an elevator and brought up to a very fancy suite that made his jaw drop. The beds were so incredibly comfortable looking, there was a juice bar in the corner, a videogame console hooked up to the tv, and it even had a hot tub!!

"Wow...Lady Palutena you're so kind!" Pit said with happy tears in his eyes.

"Your roomate should be arriving any moment..." The man said as he went back into the elevator.

"Wait..roomate? What roomate?!" Pit blurted.

Unknown to Pit or this 'roomate' yet to arrive...Palutena had cast a sort of magical enchantment on Pit..one that should be taking effect quite soon.

Pit flopped on the bed with a sigh...looking up as the elevator dinged...he gasped as it was... "Pitto?!"

Dark Pit scowled at the annoying nickname his lighter half used for him, "I told you to stop calling me that!" Pitto snapped.

"What are you doing here?" Pit asked suspiciously.

"Hmph! Viridi sent me on some lame-ass errand to this place to spy on you...and then she informs me I've earned some time off and I can chill out. But she didn't mention i'd be rooming with a dork like you!" Dark Pit snarled.

"Aww...you don't have to be so mean..." Pit pouted childishly.

"Pfft, whatever!" Dark Pit was unaware that Viridi was in on Palutena's little 'prank' and she had cast the same enchantment on him as well!
125333311.title: Pit's Vacation

choices: Dark Pit decides to show Pit his gaming skills.
Dark Pit doesn't rise to the obvious bait and go looking for some food.
1253333112.content:
"Well I guess I'll be sticking to playing some of these video games in the mean time." He said as he walked over to a nearby chair to turn on the TV and turn on the game console, a Switch to be exact as he grabbed a controller and turned it on and began playing a game which was Mario Kart.

"Want to join in Pitoo?" Pit asked his mirror counterpart curiously to which Dark Pit growled in annoyance at being referred to that name once again.

"One, don't call me that name, and two why would I even care to play your stupid little game?" He questioned him pointedly with narrowed eyes, folding his arms.

Pit straightened up in his seat to have his wings folded comfortably as he relaxed and pouted at the answer, "Well I thought you were into a challenge or whatever? Or maybe you're a bit of a chicken?" He asked him with a wry smile on his face as Dark Pit scoffed at the idea of being intimidated by some game.

All the while they didn't quite notice it yet, but during the conversation they were growing in size slowly but surely, with both Pits being an inch or two bigger, not that they would notice for the time being.
1253333112.title: The boys start to look a little taller (Slow Gr...

choices: The Boys Order Pizza...Still Growing Slowly.
The Pizza Makes them Grow Faster!
12533331121.content:
"Fine! I'll beat you at this dumb game..." Dark Pit snapped as he flopped down on the end of the bed next to Pit's chair. "Yeah yeah..we'll see." Pit snickered as he watched Pitto snatch up his controller and shoot his lighter half a glare.

Pit and Dark Pit scrolled through the character roster, Pit of course chose Mario who he was a big fan of..even having wondered if the mustached hero would sign his wings during the Galeem and Dharkon incidents.

"I wonder what these guys are up to right now? I thought we might not make it out of that last crazy situation alive!" Pit said, bringing up the aforementioned skirmish.

Dark Pit scoffed, "I wasn't afraid...it was just annoying having to team up with YOU...again!"

"Aw come oon! It wasn't that bad!" Pit pouted childishly.

"Will you just pick your character already?!" Dark Pit shouted grumpily. "Will you calm down? We're supposed to be relaxing!" Pit argued as he clicked on Mario.

"Hmph!" Pitto of course chose Bowser...since ya know...bad guy.

"I knew you'd pick Bowser." Pit muttered, "What was that?" Dark Pit sneered. "Nothing! Nothing!" Pit sheepishly denied.

The course was Rainbow Road, a classic staple of Mario Kart. Pit was in the lead, and Dark Pit was getting frustrated.

"Grrrgh!" Pitto growled, they were on their final lap..and Dark Pit was in 2nd...while Pit was in 1st.

Pit crossed the finish line and cheered, "Woohoo! I won!"

"Screw this..." Dark Pit tossed the controller roughly on the ground.

"Don't be a sore loser! You did 2nd! That's not so bad." Pit tried to explain.

Dark Pit hmphed and turned away from his other half as he flopped back on the bed.

The sound of stomachs growling met their ears...Pit chuckled. "I uh..I'm kinda hungry."

"Oh shut up." Dark Pit grumbled, only for the sound of his own stomach to meet Pit's ears as the dark angel blushed.

"Pizza?" Pit suggested. "Fine...just none of those gross fishes on it." Dark Pit warned.
12533331121.title: Dark Pit vs. Pit: Mario Kart!

choices: One of them started to notice something wasn't quite right.
A person is sent to investigate the strange loud noises.
125333311212.content:
"What you mean Anchovies?" Pit asked him curiously, putting his arms behind his head in a carefree manner.

"Yes, exactly that, I'll just order the food so you don't mess it up." Dark Pit said to Pit pointedly as he went to go and get the phone to order the Pizza, a simple Pepperoni with Extra Cheese pie was decided on by the two of them, even though there was a bit of bickering on what type of toppings and other things to get, after all they practically have enough money to get anything they want.

All the while Pit shuffled a bit in the chair as his small persistent growth spurt made the positioning of his wings uncomfortable as he draped them over the arms of the chair, that was a bit weird, but the simple minded angel boy didn't mind it too much.

Soon after about 40 minutes worth of waiting for the food and with Dark Pit sitting on the edge of the bed resisting the urge to punch Pit in the face after hearing him complaining about if the food was there yet about 3 times now, the doorbell rang as he went to get the Pizza from the delivery man and gave him the money.

"Thanks, here you go." He said handing the Pizza to Dark Pit, though he was a bit put off by the appearances of these twins he's guessing, and were those actual wings?

He inwardly shrugged and chalked it up to a long day at work and went about his business, closing the door they put the Pizza box on the table as Pit looked giddy at the sight of the food, "Oh man it smells great!" He said excitedly smelling the cheese and spices from it.

"Divide it in half Pit, four for me and four for you." Dark Pit reminded him as he nodded in understanding and started to take his four slices and went to eating them.

The two of them went into their food with gusto as the food they were eating tasted pretty great, one could dare say it was energizing in a sense and as they ate their food, their growth spurt picked up a bit more, a warm sensation flowing through their bodies.

Their feet spread slowly across the floor as they grew in length and width, their toes flexing idly in enjoyment of their eating, their heads approaching the ceiling...
125333311212.title: The Pizza Makes them Grow Faster!

choices: The Boys Put On Their Trunks and hop in the Hot-tub!
1253333112121.content:
Dark Pit and Pit yelped out at the same time as their heads clunked the ceiling. "Ow!" Pit whined as he looked down and realized the room looked a lot smaller.

"What the heck?!" Pit yelled as Dark Pit looked around, "What's going on?!" Dark Pit demanded of his other half.

"I dunno! It's like the room's shrinking!" Pit gasped as he held up the pizza. "The pizza! Did you put something in it?!" Pit demanded of Dark Pit.

Pitto scowled, "If I did..why would I eat it too?!" The duo glared at each other, thankfully the suite they were in was quite roomy..so no fears of it being too cramped...and the beds were big.

It was almost like Lady Palutena had this room reserved because she knew this would happen.

That thought clearly entered Pit's head, and the same was true for Dark Pit..only his would be Viridi.

"Grrgh...that damn brat better not have something to do with this..." Pitto growled.

"Yeah..somehow I have the feeling this is one of Lady Palutena's pranks." Pit groaned.

Pitto sighed and flopped back on the spacious bed, "Wonder if this is just a one time thing or we'll keep growing. Maybe it'd be cool to be a giant." Dark Pit gained a devious grin.

"What do you mean?" Pit asked oblivious.

"Well y'know how Viridi and Hades and all them are super-giant and big? Didn't you ever wonder what it'd be like to be that huge?" Dark Pit asked.

"Well...I've always wondered what it was like...it probably would be fun! Pitzilla!" Pit laughed and continued stuffing his face.

Dark Pit sniggered, "Giant Pit Stain, you mean..."

"Heeey!" Pit protested through a mouthful of food.
1253333112121.title: Something is Definitely Up

choices: With their nee swimwear they go off to the Hot Tubs unimpeded.
As they go to the hot tub they were stopped by something.
12533331121212.content:
"Well since we were apparently placed here to have a small vacation in this resort, I guess its fair to do unwind a bit." Dark Pit mused as he folded his arms in contemplation making Pit look at him in interest.

"But what about the other humans outside if they see us? I don't think people normally see giant angels." Pit reminded him as the clone of himself turned to glare at him.

"Listen Pit, do you really think I'm going to sit in this cramped up room while we're still growing? Not to mention getting stir crazy." He replied back to him listing off some pretty good points to him.

"That does make some sense, oh I think this place has a hot tub, can we go there please?" He asked Dark Pit hopping a bit in place in excitement and making the room shake a bit.

Pitoo sighed in relunctance as he could see the puppy eyed stare from his counterpart finally got him to stand down and to at least make him not do that anymore.

"Alright fine we can go to the Hot Tub, we just need to get out of our combat gear and see if your Lady and Viridi left us some sort of swimwear." He relented as Pit smiled childishly in anticipation of the hot tub.

They went into the closet to then shuffle through the selection to find a rather small swim trunks but soon it glowed and grew to match their size, "Huh, I guess those two thought of everything." Pit mused as Dark Pit was inclined to agree as they then shed their clothing.

Though the two blushed a bit from the awkwardness of undressing near eachother even if it was technically just Pit himself, but having two distinct personalities and cognitive thinking does that to people, by the time they finished putting on their new wear, they look it over themselves.

With Pit's was a average length white shorts with gold latin symbols as trimmings along the bottom, with Dark Pit being more or less the same but black instead of white.

"Well they certainly look stylish." Pit commented with a smile on his face as Dark Pit huffed in annoyance, though it wasnt too shabby a job he'd admit.
12533331121212.title: The Boys Put On Their Trunks and hop in the Hot...

choices: Ease Into the Hot Tub and Relax
125333311212122.content:
The angel duo walked out of their room and down the hall, vibrating the floor with every step. Pit casually trotted along with a happy smile while humming a merry tune. Pitoo was grinning smugly at the people they passed who were looking fearfully at the two large males. It made him feel even more superior to the humans than usual!

As Pit and Pitoo stepped in front of the elevator, they cast a glance at each other. "Well...hopefully it'll hold us..." Pit said nervously.

Before the young angel could reach out and press the 'down' switch, they were alerted by the voice of a staff member. "Sirs! You cannot use that elevator!"

Dark Pit scowled, "And what are YOU gonna do about it?" He didn't like being bossed around by some puny human.

"You are VIPs! You have access to the secret VIP elevator which leads to the VIP lounge!" The staff member exclaimed, pressing in a hidden tile on the opposite wall. Pit's eyes widened as he saw a fancy gold elevator revealed that was just the right size for them!

"Wowww! Does the lounge have a hot tub too?!" Pit caused the floor to vibrate with his bouncing again.

"Not only that, it has a buffet and sushi bar, a massage parlor and plenty of room to relax as well as a swimming pool!" The staff member said jovially, Pit's excitement was contagious.

Dark Pit smirked, "That's more like it." He entered the elevator, followed closley by Pit. Pit practically slammed his finger into the button labelled 'VIP' as the staff member waved goodbye as the doors slid shut.

The elevator doors opened after a short trip, putting the two angels in the lap of luxury as they gazed at the large swimming pool and spacious hot tub, the buffet with every kind of food to choose from on the other side of the lounge. The sushi bar was well stocked, and of course the massage parlor was there too.

The boys' colossal feet slapped against the tiles as they raced each other to the hot tub.
125333311212122.title: As they go to the hot tub they were stopped by ...

choices: They decide to talk about their increased height and what it could mean.
After a few Dark Pit decided to order for a foot massage.
1253333112121221.content:
The tub was practically could be considered a pool with the width and length of it being far larger than a normal one, "Wow, this thing is huge!" Pit said with wonder in his voice as he then made a childish smile at the idea in his head.


Dark Pit could get a bit of an idea what he was planning to do, "Don't you dare!" He tried to tell him but was ignored as Pit then crouched before leaping forward, curling up into a ball, yelling, "Cannonball!" Before he then splashed into the hot water, throwing a large amount of it into the air from the landing.

Dark Pit covered his face from the splash of water as he groaned irritably at the boy's lack of warning, as Pit emerged from the water with a gasp of fresh air, "Man this water is good! You should try it out Pitoo." He suggested to him, the water cascading down his deceptively toned physique.

"I was getting to that!" Dark Pit retorted back at the 12ft tall Angel as he then dipped his left foot in to test the temperature, knowing that it was the right heat he eased the rest of his body in, settling into the water with a content sigh, leaning against the wall of the pool with his arms behind his head.
1253333112121221.title: Ease Into the Hot Tub and Relax

1313311.content:
"Ugh! This is soo unfair!" Mandy flopped onto her bed and huffed. Mandy's arch rival Clover and her two dork friends had taken away her giantess size! "She's always got to copy me! And now I can't tower over everything like I so deserve!" Mandy wailed throwing a tantrum.

As she flailed around on her queen size bed, she was unaware that while the Spies had returned her to normal size...they'd failed to account for the residual energy that dwelled within her from the device used by Smalls.

--

Meanwhile, Diminutive Smalls sat in a cell, snickering to himself despite his confinement. "Ohh...little do those fools know that Smalls will get the last laugh! Even though those two bimbos are back to their usual size....there's still the residual energy that my device leaves within them! Hahahaha!" His puny cackles caused the jailer to call in: "Shut up pipsqueak!"

Smalls grumbled, but the thought of the havoc that would soon occur kept him happy..oh so happy.

--

Later that night, Mandy was snoring away in bed, dreams about stomping Clover underfoot causing her to snigger in her sleep.

Little did she know, her dreams might soon become a reality!
1313311.title: Mandy's Growth!

13133112.content:
While Mandy was having her little fantasies, her body was undergoing a not-so fake but drastic transformation in the form of her body undergoing a growth spurt! Her arms widened as the sleeves on her shirt teared up a little, in addition to her shorts ripping up on the edges, her bare feet moving over the edge of the bed.

Her shirt bulged around her rather perky chest as her breasts made the neckline tear slightly, giving anyone a nice view of her cleavage if anyone would dare to have gotten too close to her, if she wasn't feeling frisky already.

Truth to be told, she was a rather heavy sleeper as she lightly snored through the growth spurt as it continued, the sounds of her clothes tearing and her bones cracking and such was quite audible to anyone nearby.

By the time it had finished the initial growth spurt anyways, she was around 8ft tall, her feet flat against the ground as her right arm draped over a dressing table.
13133112.title: Mandy grows a little bit

choices: Clover and Mandy wake up in very cramped quarters!
Clover and Mandy outgrow their rooms in their sleep!
131331122.content:
Similarly, Clover was nestled in her bed dreaming about the day prior...only things were a bit different. In her dream, Mandy was restored to normal size...but Clover remained a giantess. She smiled in her sleep as she dreamed of herself being crowned not just Pageant Queen but Queen of Beverly Hills.

The whole town was at her every whim and she sat atop a gorgeous diamond encrusted throne, while Mandy was serving her via foot rubs and other humiliating tasks.

However, Mandy and Clover had more in common tonight than either would like to admit...as Clover was undergoing the same growth spurt as she slept.

She was soon 8ft tall, matching Mandy's newly acquired height. Both girls weren't done growing yet...as it would come in spurts throughout the night.

They were 10 ft. tall by midnight...and still increasing!

One thing was for sure...Beverly Hills was in for a surprise in the morning!
131331122.title: Check with Clover...

choices: They try to make her crawl out through the door.
1313311221.content:
The very next morning things would be quite different for the two as they would soon find out, at Clover's and by extension the Spies' house, the two other girls were alerted by the loud commotion and the ensuing screaming of distress from Clover.

They hurried into the room before they opened the door and was startled by the sight of Clover who was currently 10ft tall sitting on a collapsed bed.

"What the heck?" Sam asked surprised by the mini-giantess Clover who was just as surprised as she was.

"Oh my god I'm a giant! Again!" She exclaimed nervously as the windows rattled with her voice as her friends covered their ears from the loud voice.

"Clover can you please speak quietly we're right here." She told her blandly as she looked embarrassed, "Whoops, sorry, but I didn't realize this would happen to me again, you think that little rascal Smalls is up to no good?" She wondered as Alex shook her head in negative.

"Last I heard of him he was kept in heavy containment, so he wont be getting out for a while now." She corrected her, making her think a bit on what could it be.

"Maybe your right, but geez, I need more room, my room feels like so cramped right now." Clover complained to her friends as they thought a bit on how to deal with this problem.
1313311221.title: The next morning...

choices: 50 ft. Tall is when it stops..for now!
13133112212.content:
Meanwhile, Mandy was juuust starting to wake up. She was unaware that her bed had long since crumbled beneath her posterior and was now a mere pancake.

When she went to stretch however, she found herself unable to. With her eyes still closed she angrily kicked out with both feet, smashing down the wall at the foot of her bed. Upon feeling the crumbling of plaster and hearing the ruckus, she opened her eyes and looked around.

"Eh!? Did I grow in my sleep?!" Mandy sat up and cracked the ceiling when she smacked her head against it. "Ow! RRragh!" Her anger and frustration merely amped up the remaining power within her, and she increased in height once more!

"OOooh..." She groaned as she found herself hunched over in the shrinking space. "Look out, Clover...Mega-Mandy is back in town!" She cackled as she felt the ceiling begin to crumble as she stood up and recklessly smashed down the walls.

"I'll have that blond copy-cat grovelling at these feet in no time!" Mandy moaned blissfully as she enjoyed the power rush of growth.
13133112212.title: Check in with Mandy...

131331122122.content:
The growth of her body was much quicker on account of Mandy's short temper as she had continued to grow in size, from there she was about 50ft tall when she stopped growing, practically putting her back where she gad last grew up to, and perhaps later on would grow even more so.

"Ha! I'm huge to all these maggots!" She said excitedly as she stomped her bare foot for emphasis causing the cars to jump slightly, the alarms going off from the noise she was making.

It was then that that people that lived near her had came out to see what was the commotion before they were greeted to the visage of the giantess herself.

Looking to see that there was her potential list of victims and slaves, she then addressed them, "Hello there losers! Remember me? I'm back to my huge size and prepare for this hostile takeover!" She declared lifting her foot into the air and slamming it onto a nearby car to get her point across.

That was the signal for them to start running for their lives as they screamed and flee, making her laugh at their efforts doing exactly as she wanted them to do.

"Thats right you bugs start running, I want you all to know my power!" She exclaimed laughing at them and started to chase after them at a leisurely pace.
131331122122.title: 50 ft. Tall is when it stops..for now!

choices: Sam and Alex heave-ho and push against Clover's buns!
Mandy has arrived at THEIR house!
1313311221221.content:
Not soon after her 'hostile takeover' began, a news helicopter was flying overhead and recording the gargantuan Mandy's rampage.

"This incident seems to be a repeat of the one that occurred just yesterday! It seems whatever stopped this giantess' rampage...didn't last long!" The newswoman reported as Mandy was filmed ripping the rooftops off of houses.

Meanwhile, the Spies had taken notice of the way the ground was shaking as well as the hordes of people running down the street.

"What's going on..? Don't tell me..." Alex groaned as she and Sam looked out the window to see the gargantuan Mandy on her second rampage.

"Oh no..." Sam facepalmed.

"Lemme guess, it's Mandy!" Clover called back from the other side of the door.

Sam and Alex had attempted to get her through the door of her bedroom...but she started growing and now her generous rear end was lodged in the doorframe with the other end of her body out in the hall.

It seemed growth affected a girl's sweat output given the fact that Clover's feet and panty clad buttocks were sweating and making the room they currently occupied rather hot.
1313311221221.title: News Coverage is a go!

choices: They begin to go and look for Mandy.
13133112212211.content:
"Seriously? My butt is stuck in the door?" Clover asked annoyed by the inconvenience as she tried to push her way through but the frame shuddered and buckled from the strain.

"Come on Sam, lets help her out." Alex told her friend who nodded in agreement, and taking one cheek each they then groaned and pushed as hard as they could to help get Clover free.

"Come on Alex push!" Sam exclaimed as the sweat was making for a good substitute lubricant to allow her to slip on through as bit by bit she came free.

"Just a little more!" Clover declared as she pulled herself strongly as with both their efforts they managed to push Clover through the door.

"Yay I'm free!" She said happily before she realized that she slammed through the wall and plowed through the opposite side as the wall lead to outside as Clover groaned in disorientation.

"Clover you're alright!?" Sam asked her friend in concern as she saw her pick herself up and looked back at them in relief.

"Yeah I'm fine, but we need to get to stopping Mandy before she trashes all of our favorite spots!" She declared as Sam and Alex looked a bit incredulous at her case of priorities.
13133112212211.title: Sam and Alex heave-ho and push against Clover...

choices: Norman and Clover Grow to 30 ft.
131331122122111.content:
"Shouldn't we be the ones to go...? Cause...last time you and Mandy were this size you almost crushed all of Beverly Hills..." Alex said with a worried look.

"What!? That wasn't me! That was all Mandy's fault!" Clover pouted.

"Besides, you really want to go out in your PJs like this? What if a cute guy sees you?" Sam warned, causing Clover to go full air-head and gasp: "Oh my gosh! You're right! Thanks for looking out for me guys! I'll just stay here and-" Clover began to say, until a familiar young boy's voice called out from the house.

"What was that big crash!?!" Norman yelled as his eyes locked on to his cousin Clover and he yelled out in surprise. "Clover!! What happened to you?!"

"Uh oh....uh...Normie we are uh-" Clover started to explain, only to realize Alex and Sam had ditched her to go after Mandy who was making her way to town. "Oh no..." Clover groaned as Norman practically jumped on to her.

"Make me a giant too! I wanna be giant too!" Norman yelled.

"It's not like I'm in control of-" Clover started to deny, until she felt her body beginning to tingle.

"Whoa! Clovie, why am I feeling all...tingly?" Norman inquired curiously.

"Wait...what?!" Clover yelped as she began to expand..and Norman with her!
131331122122111.title: Enter Norman

choices: The Police begin to show up.
The civilians begin to flee for their lives.
1313311221221111.content:
"Huh? What?" Norman asked questionably as he saw his body beginning to expand in size along with Clover, their bodies pressing up against eachother in an awkward position as their growth spurt continued.

"Oof! Get your foot out of my face Norman!" She yelled at her younger cousin as initially he grew quicker before settling at the same rate of growth as Clover as the two continued to expand in the house as plaster dropped from the ceiling and dust in addition.

His bare foot was smacking against her face as she turned her head away in disgust as Norman groaned in annoyance, "That would be nice if we had some room!" He declared and when he said the last word he kicked with his other foot to free up some space as they promptly fell through the floor, their weight too much for the wood.

The house shuddered and groaned from the outside as it had seen better days as civilians were coming out of their homes to investigate the sounds and shouting as the house seems to crack wide open like an egg, as they untangled themselves off of eachother both about 50ft tall, though in the case of Norman's proportions of being a kid he was generally wider than Clover.

"Well at least we're free." Clover said in relief before seeing the stunned group of civilians, "Oh..." She said at the sight of them.
1313311221221111.title: Norman and Clover reach 50 ft!

choices: Switch to Mandy and The other Spies!
Stick with Jerry as he Tries to Explain Himself!
13133112212211112.content:
The civilians screamed and began to run in all different directions screaming at the sight of the two enormous giants.

"Whoa! Hahaha! This is soo cool!" Norman laughed boisterously and looked down at how small everything was, especially the fleeing people!

"Normiie! This isn't the time for....well...I gotta admit it was kinda cool the first time...." Clover admitted, causing Norman to grin wider: "Yeah! Wait..you did this before?"

"Uhh...yeah let's just say it was to teach Mandy a lesson." Clover said evasively.

"Did it have to do with spy stuff?" Norman said, causing Clover's eyes to widen and yelp in surprise: "Wha-!? H-how do you know about-"

Norman scoffed and rolled his eyes, "Duh. That time I got flipped down that weird slide and met Jerry...it was pretty obvious that wasn't some secret study hall like you tried to say."

"Oh...yeah that." Clover said dumbly before squatting down to peer inside her now decimated house. "Mom's gonna totally kill me." Clover groaned as she reached inside her room and took out her communicator which was designed to resemble a makeup mirror.

Of course now it was a lot smaller than normal..but she carefully flicked it open with her fingernail and got connected to WOOHP. Or more specifically: Jerry.

"Clover, this had better be-...goodness is your communicator malfunctioning?!" Jerry gasped at the gigantic hologram of Clo.

"Sorry...we've had another...giant incident. Mandy is super-huge again...and so am I..and Norman." Clover groaned as Norman waved to Jerry in the background.

"Is there any way we can get to you? Maybe get me some clothes? I do NOT think me stomping around Beverly Hills in my PJs is going to do anything but embarrass me." Clover sighed, wondering if any hotties dig a super-huge giantess for a date.

"You're in luck! WOOHP has just come up with a teleporter that can transport you and Norman here! However..." Jerry trailed off. "What is it?" Clover asked suspiciously. "It's never been tested on anything larger than...a hamster."

"Are you saying I'm fat?!" Clover roared.
13133112212211112.title: The civilians begin to flee for their lives.

choices: Switch to Alex and Sam tracking down Mandy.
Stay with Norman and Clover as they contemplate their orders.
131331122122111122.content:
"What? Not at all, we just never really tested it on something of your size." He said trying to explain what he meant to Clover only for her as usual to take it the wrong way.

"So you're saying that because I'm too 'big' you can't teleport me to WHOOP or even give me some clothes?" She asked him incredulously with a glare.

As Jerry was stammering to try and find the proper words to tell her that the area would be too small for her to be transported to, Norman couldn't help but be a bit bemused at the situation but the little guy was just saying all the wrong things.

"Clover, not to interject or anything, but it sounds to me that the teleporter might not even have enough space to bring us in, or on the chance that we might just get smushed inside like the house or something." He pointed out to her to which it dawned upon Clover as she blushed embarassed from overreacting.

"Oh right, sorry Jerry." She apologized to her boss as he sighed in exhaustion and slight relief, "Its quite alright Clover, but on the other hand, with the two of you, you might be able to stop Mandy's rampage downtown, Alex and Sam are on their way to slow her down, if you two could assist them it would be appreciated." He informed them as Clover nodded affirmatively, "Right." She said as she turned off the communicator as Norman gained a thoughtful look on his face, "What are you thinking of Norman?" She asked him curiously.

"Well, do we have to stop her right away? I kinda like this size and I want to use it than just to restrain a girl you know." He said to her.
131331122122111122.title: Stick with Jerry as he Tries to Explain Himself!

1313311221221111222.content:
"What are you talking about?" Clover asked curiously with a raised eyebrow. Norman grinned childishly, "Well...we're pretty big...don't you think it'd be awesome to just..have fun?" Norman suggested with a tone that suggested he was thinking of all sorts of naughty things.

Clover blinked a few times and gained a thoughtful look, "Well...this is kind of cool...but how am I supposed to enjoy fashion when nothing fits meee?" Clover whined.

Norman rolled his eyes, she was such an airhead. "Well you could always just ditch the PJs and bare it all...I'm pretty sure some guys would like that. You'd be the center of attention and stuff."

"Wait..what?! I can't just--.....Center of attention? Boyyys? Oooh...but who would want a girl who could crush them?" Clover complained.

"You'd be surprised...there's lotsa guys who like that sort of thing." Norman wiggled his eyebrows suggestively. "Wait...really?"

"Yup! Lotsa boys are into a girl who can boss em' around and take charge. Besides, you'd pretty much be in charge no matter what." Norman grinned, she was taking the bait!

Clover got starry eyes, "Clover..Giantess Queen of Beverly Hills." She said in a daze.

That was when...
1313311221221111222.title: Contemplating Mischief

choices: Switch to Alex and Sam trailing Mandy
Stay with the escalating situation between the law and two giants.
13133112212211112222.content:
It was then that the two cousins were alerted by the distant siren noises as Clover looked around in confusion, "Wait is that the Police?" She asked curiously as she could see a squadron of about 8 cars coming into view down the street from her rather high vantage point.

"Well what would you think Clover? That girl is on the loose and she did come from the same neighborhood as us, and also we are also giants too." Norman pointed out to her hands on his hips, "Oh right, there's that too." She said giggling a bit in embarassment at missing such a obvious thing.

It didn't take long for them to drive up to a few distance away from their feet as Clover groaned in annoyance at their timing, "Seriously? You guys have to come now? Shouldnt you be trying to put the cuffs on that monster Mandy?" She asked them incredulously.

"That makes the two of you as well, disrupting the peace and causing panic." The police officer said as he got out of the car glaring up at the two blonds.

"Well officer sorry to say that I don't think you're in any position to be trying to intimidate us." Norman said in a taunting tone as he crouched down to get a closer look at the police officer scrutinizing him, and in turn intimidating him and making the others pull out their pistols in warning.

"Hey you can't point guns at my cousin!" Clover interjected with a stomp, causing the ground to shake with her tremor, causing a situation to be tense as civilians wisely decided to run away from the ensuring fight.
13133112212211112222.title: The Cops Arrive!

1321.content: Which Ben goes through a size shift?
1321.title: Ben Tennyson

132112.content:
You groaned as you woke up. The last thing you remembered was that you were watching random cartoons when you blacked out. The ground beneath you felt like concrete and as you stretched, your body felt different somehow.

You soon felt the ground begin to shake rhythmically, as if to that of footsteps. The shaking got more intense to the point where you where bounced into the air. Finally the shaking stopped and as your vision cleared, the sight before you made your jaw drop.

A black and white shoe was in front of you. What made it stand out was that it was as big as a building!

"Ah cool, you're awake!", a booming voice rang out.

Looking up, you saw a towering figure in dark green trousers with a black and white shirt. On top was a familiar face with a mop of brown hair.

It was Ben Tennyson from Ben Ten! Only now he loomed over you at about 200 feet.

The giant soon crouched down, placing his arms on his knees.

Ben looked down at you with......
132112.title: He shrinks someone

1321122.content:
He smirked at your shrunken form as you were about a few centimeters tall to him, "Um...hello? Do you know what happened to me?" You asked him cautiously as you didn't like the look on his face, it showed a bit of ill intent.

"Well duh, I shrunk you of course." He told you in a matter-of-fact tone as you were shocked by how casually he revealed the fact to you!

"But why did you do it!?" You questioned him in disbelief of what was happening, a ten year old just randomly shrink you for shits and giggles? This can't be happening, it must be a dream of sorts.

"Well I was testing out my little Omnitrix device on my wrist, who knew it had a shrink and grow function?" He said in a rhetorical tone as he smiled down at you, it all made sense now, the last thing you was watching was Ben 10 and some reason you saw him getting a mischevious grin and pointed the Omnitrix at the screen, the green glow...it was him all along.

"Now since you're so tiny and weak now, I think you should spend some time in a place made just for you!" Ben said with a grin as he reached out with his hand to grab at you, thinking of where to put you.

Where did he decide to place you?
1321122.title: Shrunken before Ben!

13211221.content:
Standing up and towering over you again, Ben leaned against a wall next to him and reached down to his right foot. Grabbing the footwear, the alien shifter began to tug off his sneaker with some difficulty.

After the footwear was finally torn off Ben let out a deep sigh. The boy's socked foot looked worn and had damp spots from sweat.

Ben looked down with a smirk. "Nice to let my foot breath, I've been walking around all day! I hope you don't mind the smell!"

You caught onto Ben's motives as he dropped his sneaker to the ground with a THUMP!

Turning around, you bolted in the opposite direction. Filled with the pure instinct to get away, it was crushed as a loud laugh rang out and the shadow darkened around you.

You were soon enveloped in warm flesh as Ben reached down and wrapped you in a fist. Bringing you to his face, Ben chuckled as only your head popped out of his hand.

"Nice try bug! That's cruel, my foot's real eager to spend time with you~"

Crouching down, Ben moved his hand over the opening to his shoe. Immediately you felt yourself gag as the chessy fumes reach your nose.

Ben sneered as he loosened his fist. "What, you don't like cheese? Well you will after I mash you up a bit!"

Letting go, you fell into the dark entrance of the hot shoe. Your fall was cushioned by the insole's soft padding, a small splash of sweat formed as you moved on the squishy inside. The light from the entrance was blocked as you looked up in horror to see the wiggling socked toes of Ben.

You began to run towards the front, but slipped and fell face first into the sweaty insole. Some salty sweat entered your mouth and made you gag more. This was forgotten as you watched the foot slowly come closer. The foot soon passed over and the ball rested on you, already applying a large amount of pressure.

Soon Ben stood up, and the flesh of his foot squashed you down and pushed you into the sole.

Ben hummed as he closed his eyes. The young boy put his hands behind his head as he began walking, feeling your pathetic body being smooshed by his foot.

What was next?
13211221.title: A Sweaty Place

choices: Ben peels his socks off, you're going to be a footrest!
Ben peels his socks off and makes you rub his feet!
Ben leaves you there, maybe burps at you more!
132112212.content:
It was a hot day, unfortunately for you the Tennyson hometown of Bellwood was going through a serious heatwave! Doubly unfortunate for you was Ben's personal hygiene...or lack thereof. You knew his feet were odorous from the scenes in the show, but this was taking foot odor to a whole new level!

The socks in truth hadn't been changed in at least three weeks, it was still summer vacation after all..and he'd neglected his bathing while on the road trip with Grandpa Max and his cousin Gwen...much to the latter's displeasure at having to share a small RV with a smelly boy such as he.

In fact, even on school days he would sometimes go without bathing or changing his socks. Though this was more of a rare occasion since he didn't want to be bullied for smelling bad. But who knows, maybe now that he has you as a tiny toy to force his stink on..that could change.

Ben wore a constant smug grin as he walked down the hot sidewalk, enjoying every drop of sweat that formed on his body, dripping down his pits...and most certainly his feet!

You however were having a completely opposite time! The stench of moldy cheese filled your nostrils, and you were unfortunate enough to have your face pressed into a hole in the sock..directly below Ben's big toe bend.

Which meant your face was smushed into the grimey and incredibly cheesy flesh of his toe. In any other circumstance you'd be excited to meet a cartoon character...not this time it would seem.

Ben continued walking, making sure to sweat all over you and get really stinky...he came to his house and walked inside. Wandering around the air conditioned home, he found a note on the fridge when he went to get a soda.

His parents were gone for today and until tomorrow evening....that meant he had loads of alone time with YOU!

Grinning widely, he went to the living room, popping the tab on his soda and chugging it. Flopping down on the couch, he pried his shoes off with his feet, unleashing those glued on socked feet...which you were stuck to.

Your eardrums rattled as you heard what amounted to a monstrous roar. It turned out...Ben was just burping from his soda.
132112212.title: A Mischievous Tennyson's Insole

1321122122.content:
Your ears ached again as Ben chugged the rest of his soda and let out one last loud belch. Letting out a relaxed sigh, Ben tossed the empty can aside before smirking at his feet.

With some flexing, you popped out of the boy's sole and fell to the table onto your butt. Sighing in slight pain, you wiped your face down damp with sweat no doubt condemning you to smell like foot cheese. Ben soon reached down to grasp the toe portion of his sock and began to slowly pull off the glued sweaty clothing.

Being stuffed in the sock and shoe all day, Ben's sole was slightly red from the heat. Trailing down the foot was drops of sweat all creating puddles as they landed in the table. The aura of cheese was amplified by 5 times what it originally was, making you start to hold your mouth as you swore vomit was creeping up your throat.

Throwing his hands behind his head, Ben smugly grinned. "Alright bug, I want you to start rubbing my feet."

"What-what!?", you cried out in shock.

Ben chuckled and wiggled his toes. "You heard me! Message my feet, I wanna feel them being pampered!"

An evil glint struck the cartoon boy's eyes. "Get to it, or else I'm gonna stink you up with more then just my feet!"

You felt a chill at the threat and decided to.....
1321122122.title: Ben's Threat

choices: Continue Ben's Foot Rub as he Taunts You!
13211221221.content:
You decided it was best to just go along with this titanic ten-year-old brat's demands. You very reluctantly approached the plump, peachy soles and cringed as the moldy cheese stink only intensified.

Ben grinned smugly and gave a soft chuckle, fanning his plump toes back and forth to really waft his notorious foot odor into your face. You gagged and clutched your throat, causing Ben to laugh mockingly. "Maan..my feet must be AWFUL to a shrimp like you! Too bad...you're still going to rub 'em!"

You grumbled in slight annoyance as you reached out with your hands and pushed them into the pillowy and supple sole. Ben groaned and relaxed his head back, closing his eyes. "Yeaaah...that's right...you know who's boss. Really rub these bad boys!"

You whimpered as your hands felt the greasy skin as it gave way to your palms...and squelched out more gross sweat.

Above your head, those house sized toes wiggled and flexed...making sure you were constantly bombarded with Ben's signature cheese funk.

What happens now?
13211221221.title: Rub the feet

132112212211.content:
You continued rubbing Ben's feet, having to stretch to reach higher towards the scent releasing toes. You took a moment to try and get a quick rest, only for the heel to lift up and fall back down to shake the table plus making you fall on your butt.

"Hey what's the hold up?", Ben called out annoyed. "You better not stop, or I'm gonna squish you so bad you'll be stuck to my stinky foot shrimp!"

You watched in fear as Ben began demonstrating his threat by lowering his plump sole to cover you. Not wasting time, you quickly resumed rubbing the cheesy sole trying not to gag as the aura of odor consumed you.

Ben chuckled and went back to relaxing now that his little bug was being obedient again. He smirked as he mocked you more.

"I want my feet to feel good, so put more effort in squirt and I hopefully won't squash ya like a pancake! And no gagging, or you'll be drowning In sweat hehe!"

You kneaded the pillowy soles faster as the giant brat showed his superiority.

What was next?
132112212211.title: No Break

1321122122112.content:
Ben grinned wickedly and slowly lowered those gargantuan feet on top of you. You let out a yelp which caused Ben to giggle at how squeaky it was, and soon you were pinned flat against the table's surface...being mashed by rancid boyfeet.

It was evident that Ben's feet probably hadn't seen a change of socks, or water, for practically WEEKS. Their moldy cheese stench and sticky, moist surface was almost more than you could bear at this range.

Meanwhile, the mischievous Omnitrix wielder sighed and relaxed against the couch. "This is the life..." He said with a smug smile on his face. The young boy truly felt like a king...who knew being a big bully to a puny runt would give him such a power high?

"If you want outta there...you're gonna have to..."
1321122122112.title: Getting squished

13211221221122.content:
You felt pale at the command of the giant kid. The cheesy odor was already invading your nose as the heavy sole squashed you down. You coughed muffled as the plump flesh clouded your mouth with it bitter taste.

Ben pouted annoyed before applying more pressure and swiveling the sole. Small squish sounds came out from beneath the huge foot.

"I don't feel you pressing your nose to my foot. So don't pretend you took a whiff!", Ben frowned crossing his arms. "If you don't want these feet to turn you to mush then sniff!"

The pressure was slightly lifted as the plump sole stopped momentarily squashing you. Cringing, you stuffed your nose into the squishy sole and inhaled largely.
