The thick chessy mold caught up in your nose and stuck the stinky fumes there. The salty chessy sweat garnered wet your body in the odorous substance.

Soon....
13211221221122.title: "Take a BIG whiff!"

1322112.content:
You feel super groggy as you wake up from your coma. You then looked around and see that it looks like you’re in a motor home, an RV if you will. However, the thing is, everything around here is looks really big to you. Then it hit you like a ton of bricks. You must’ve shrunk while you were out cold as you appeared to be 3 inches tall.

You then noticed that the ground beneath you is starting to shake. There was then a huge shadow looming over you as you looked behind to see who or what it is. Who do you see is an orange-haired girl who seems to be about 10 to 12 years old that has emerald green eyes and is wearing a bright blue shirt with a cat logo on it, white pants, and white sneakers. You recognize her as Gwen Tennyson from Ben 10 and she’s a freaking giantess to you in your state.

You then see her bending down and grabbing you from the floor to bring you to her face.

“Glad to see that you’re awake.” Gwen said with a
1322112.title: You

13221123.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: ...teases you with her feet. Very intensely.
...ask you what like about her feet?
13221123.content:
"Yes, I've finally summoned a living thing!" Gwen's grin was of triumph and happiness. She even did a little fist-bump! The sight of such jubilation coming from her was...cute.Very cute indeed.

It still didn't change the fact that you are shrunken and technically taken against your will.

"Um, Miss..not to rain your parade or anything..." You shyly commented as you started to look down at the floor. Secretly hoping she won't take this the wrong way."...But can you do what you just did to me but in reverse?"

The happiness drained away, as she just realized she basically kidnapped you. Worse yet, she doesn't how to do the ritual in reverse....yet. A big not so happy smile formed on her face."Well, I...got to learn how to do the spell in reverse. But up till then...I guess I could watch over you for time."

Seeing you have little choice in the matter. Gwen sighed as she reached up for something, her knees on a couch. "Don't worry Little guy, I'll find something we play to pass the time. That's if my dweeb of a cousin hadn't mess with anything up here."

As Gwen made her search, her white sneakers began to dip and dangle. Frequently revealing the juicy heels of her tanned feet. Your brow became sweaty and lips became quivering as her sneakers began gently tap against her feet, slowly sipping off with a little movement With one final dangle, the shoes completely fall. Making them fully bared.

Like her cousin, Gwen also had pretty big feet. Seems a thing that something that runs in the Tennyson family. Her slightly blush soles while very plump and chunky, had a slight length to them. The arches were a healthy medium. And the toes contrasting with the soles were fairly long. They wiggled an excitedly when the cool air of R.V hits to them, happy to be freed from their confines. You blushed at the sight.

"What'cha looking at?" The voice brought you back to cold reality. There Gwen was looking dead at you. Her green twinkled with amused playful mischief. Causing you at stuttered and gulp saliva.

"Nothing...Nothing at all." You quickly to try to make an excuse, but the girl's grin only grew.

"Oh nothing..huh? "Nothing" seems like to me is staring at my feet for I don't know...two minutes.~" Gwen innocently sinh-song as she stood on the floor. Slowly walk towards to you. The soft squishing sounds her feet made with every step made your crotch stir. With her looming over you, the cute girl...
13221123.title: grin

choices: You ask what else she had in mind?
132211232.content:
It frankly came down on to you just how big she was compared to you, pretty much the size of a small building at this rate, and her feet were especially large probably about size 12 or something.

Gwen teasingly lifted her foot over you as she wiggles and flexed her toes at you as your blush increased and your bulge press against your pants.

"Well I don't know about you but it looks like you have a bit of a foot fetish." She said in a teasing tone as you could catch a whiff of her musky foot odor from being stuffed in those shoes all day long.

"Well I, Uhhh..." You began trying to come with up with an excuse for the situation but found very little to go on, its very hard to justify the fact that you were staring at her feet for quite a long time, but still though.

"Well what little guy?" Gwen asked you with her hands on her hips, moving her foot closer to you as her toes flexed and curled in front of you, making your mouth feel a bit dry as a matter of fact.

"I...think your feet...could maybe use a foot rub? You seem to maybe need it!" You propose as Gwen hummed in amusement as she prodded you with her big toe.

"You do have a good point, tell you what, you do a good job, and I might look for the spell to reverse it faster." She said to you with a smile on her face, "Or...we could figure out something else for you to do, but since I'm nice I'll let you decide." She told you, oh she is good with the baiting...
132211232.title: ...teases you with her feet. Very intensely.

1323.content: An interesting little thing I have formulated.
1323.title: More Option

13231.content:
Gene Therapist Dr.Tyler Stross let out a sigh of relief and exhaustion as he sent out three of the defective gene pods utilized in his research to enhance the human body, it was meant to make them stronger, faster, and overall better than the average person, making an all new benchmark in the staple of human evolution, there was no way but up after hitting the natural brick wall of evolution, but the defects did it to the extreme.

Testing them on mice made them better sure but they soon became more aggressive and when they were terminated they were as large as house cats, it was there he drew the line and go back to the drawing board, already he corrected some of the mistakes of the defects and was making progress, where those defective genes would go would be in vast wilderness where it will use a gas emitter to disperse the defective genes in an gas that will quickly make it harmless, so long as nothing nearby breaths it in then nothing could go wrong right? Oh if only he knew in the end.

The pods flew aimlessly through the night sky as it streaked over the horizon unbeknownst to anyone that were out for the night or sleeping, not knowing the future dangers that these three pods could cause indirectly to these masses.

That night just so happened to be when a certain Ben Tennyson and Kevin Levin were staying out late and causing trouble. Ben and Kevin had strolled into a gas station quick stop. “Can I help you boys find something?” The clerk asked.

Ben’s stomach growled as Kevin exited the store at a brisk pace. “Wait for me!” Been called as he ran after. The two boys walked a bit before reaching the Tennyson home. “Catch!” Kevin tossed a soda and honeybun into Ben’s hands.

“Wait...did you swipe these? Smooth!” Ben declared as Kevin grinned smugly. “Just use that soda to burp on your lame cousin for me alright?”

Ben grinned mischievously as he nodded in understanding, “You got it Kevin, where are you staying at anyways?” He asked him with a tilt of his head.

The boy waved off his concerns as he nonchalantly responded, “I gotten myself a nifty tent and all the good stuff that comes with it to rest for the night, as long as I got a good food source, I’ll be fine, besides any animal comes by I’ll just zap them.” He said with a smirk on his face.

“Sounds like a plan, just be careful okay?” Ben advised as he walked to his door and opened it slightly so as to not disturb his parents when they’re sleeping in a bit early.

“You worry too much what's the worst that could happen?” Kevin asked rhetorically with a shrug as he began to walk away from Ben and to the direction of where Ben presumed his sleeping spot would be.

He went inside and closed the door behind him as he took off his shoes and went up the stairs to his room.

Due to a certain scientist’s miscalculation, two of the canisters landed outside of Ben and Gwen’s windows, which were open due to the sticky summer heat this night.

The canisters were the length of a can of potato chips, but slightly thicker. On cue, they began emitting a colorless, odorless gas.. that of course flowed into the two preteen’s windows as they slept.

Due to the size of the containers, they hadn't made much noise upon impacting the ground. This meant no one was any the wiser of what was going to transpire.

They unknowingly breathed in the gas as the genetic modification went into their bloodstream and modified their genetic patterns, making them remarkably stronger,faster and more efficient than any other human being, maybe a bit too well, their effects will be known soon enough.

The canisters depleted their contents as quickly as they came, before shutting off and closing the ports where the gas came from its work done.

Though the visible effects if there was any, it was highly unnoticeable to any other person save for its secondary effects, which they will find out the next morning.

Ben’s parents had gone on a business trip so Max was housesitting for them...as well as watching Ben and Gwen. Thankfully he had his own things to attend to so he whipped up breakfast for the two cousins. Gwen and Ben were now sitting at the table with each other.

“You stayed out really late again didn't you?” Gwen asked her cuz disapprovingly. Ben was clearly sleepy...and grumpy to boot. Though for some reason he was more irritated at Gwen’s question than even that could explain.

“It's none of your business! Kevins cool!” Ben practically shouted.

Gwen glared, she too was feeling more irritable at Ben’s childishness. “I knew you were hanging out with that guy again!”

Ben gripped his fork and skewered some sausage...not noticing his fork stabbing through the plate. When he stuffed the meat into his mouth and bit down, he heard a crunch and spat out the top of his fork which he'd somehow bitten off.

“What the heck? These forks suck!” Ben said with disdain as he dropped the bitten fork on the table, Gwen narrowed her eyes slightly at the fact that her cousin just bit clean through a fork with no sign of flinching.

“You could at least treat the silverware correctly.” She said to him with a slightly haughty tone as Ben glared at her for implying he knows nothing of how to handle his forks and junk.

“Says you, I bet your fork is as cheap as mine.” He retorted as Gwen scoffed and replied, “These are metal forks you dingus, they don't break that easily.” She said to him.

“Prove it then.” Ben stated as he folded his arms impatiently waiting for her to try and prove him wrong.

“Fine!” She decided as she picked up the fork she was using and placed her thumb on the front end and pressed down, much to her surprise instead of encountering resistance it simply bent back from her putting force into it like clay.

The two cousins were interrupted when they heard a loud splintering of wood and a voice outside the front door mumbled “Oops..”

Ben and Gwen stood up from the table...and as they scooted their chairs back they both tumbled on to the floor from the back legs snapping off. Looking up from the floor they saw Kevin letting himself in….while holding the now completely ripped off knob in one hand..and a weird canister in the other.

“Yo Ben, Ben’s cousin. This weird tube thing landed outside my tent and I get sprayed by some gas..now I'm super strong!” Kevin declared proudly as he gestured to the damaged front door.

“Whoa, really!?” Ben said wide eyed as he looked back at the table.

“Only one way to find out how tough we really are...let's go to the woods.” Kevin said with a smirk.

Gwen frowned, “So what are you gonna do, beat each other up?”

“More like...whack each other with trees.” Kev said.

Gwen facepalmed as she followed them outside.
13231.title: Kevin, Ben and Gwen's Growth Spurts!

132311.content:
It didn't take too long for them to find the forests that was near the city of Bellwood as Gwen trailed behind the two boys, while she is rather irritable at the moment, she does have an obligation to look out for Ben, and see what the extent of these powers are.

“This looks like a good spot.” Kevin said as he looked around and nodded to himself in assurance that this will do just fine.

“Shouldn't you guys test your punching before your lifting?” Gwen questioned as she found a nice rock to sit on as she looked at them curiously.

“I guess so.” Ben said scratching his head before walking up to a random tree and knocked a bit on the trunk, knowing its not hollowed out, he reared his fist back and punched clean through as indicated by the cracking noise and how easily it went through.

“Woah.” They all said at once at how strong that punch must have been, “Wow and I didn't even put effort into that one.” Ben said surprised at his own strength.

“Lemme try!” Kevin said as he approached a different tree. Rearing back his leg he kicked the base of the trunk. Kevin grinned as the others’ eyes widened to see the tree torn off by the roots and topple over in a splintered heap. “Heh, didn’t even have to try!” Kevin bragged.

“I wonder what was in that stuff...or where it came from.” Gwen said thoughtfully. “Who cares?! We’re super strong now! I don’t even have to use the Omnitrix to be a superhero!” Ben said happily.

“Hold on, Ben...we haven’t even seen how tough we are...just that we’re really strong.” Kevin said as he hoisted the broken off tree into his hands with little to no effort.

“Oh...uh...yeah...I guess.” Ben said, clearly a tad nervous about getting whacked with a large tree. “Be careful, Be-” Gwen started to say, until Kevin took Ben by surprise and smashed the tree onto his head.

“BEN!” Gwen shrieked, but to everyone’s surprise the tree itself splintered down the middle and Ben was left relatively unharmed...just shook up. “H-hey! That….didn’t hurt!” Ben seemed surprised himself.

Gwen breathed a sigh of relief, “You didn’t know that wouldn’t hurt him! You coudl’ve-” Gwen started to scold Kevin, only for Kevin to throw the remains of the tree at her….and cause it to break into hundreds of tiny toothpicks.

“Jeez, we’re invincible...you’d think you’d stop naggin’ and enjoy it!” Kevin scoffed at her.

Gwen growled in annoyance, “Enjoy it huh? Let me see how to enjoy it.” She said as she hopped off of the rock she was sitting on and bent down and lift it up, cracking the ground a bit as the boulder the size of a person was in her hands.

“Okay I think I see where this i-” Kevin was about to say before getting hit in the face by the aforementioned boulder that came at him with a speed of a car, sending him flying through rows of trees.

Ben looked in awe at the path of destruction that Gwen casually brought to the forest, “Okay you might have a point about this being a little fun.” Gwen admitted as she looked at her hand with a sly grin on her face.

The two heard the sound of the rock moving as Kevin moved the Boulder away a bit dirty from the dust and splinters but no worse for wear, “See now you’re getting it, maybe we should go and stop a few bank robberies or something to see how good this superhero business is.” He suggested as he dusted himself off.

“Wait, really?” Gwen blinked in surprise. “What? You look surprised.” Kevin crossed his sleeveless arms. “Just I expected you’d be more into.robbing a bank yourself.” Gwen stated with a sheepish look.

“Nah too many security cameras!” Kevin said like it was obvious. Ben snickered, “Yeah I bet if we stop some bad guys we’ll get a reward anyway!”

Just then the trio heard the sound of a bank alarm coming from the town. “Let’s go!” Ben declared as he and Kevin ran up ahead towards the sound. “Wait up! Ugh...boys.” She groaned as she followed.

The three young kids didn’t notice it, but each of them had slowly increased in height since they had set off to the bank.
132311.title: Continue 1

1323111.content:
The bank was being held up by a group of over 8 robbers that had hostages inside, the tellers were frightened by the robbers as they were held up at gunpoint and forced to give over the money that was inside the safe.

“Give me all your damn loot, or money it doesn't matter, I get something of value.” The Robber bragged with an arrogant laugh as the hostages were herded into a corner by the others as they pointed their guns at them threateningly.

“Police ain't here to stop us as long as we got our hostages so no use crying for help.” One female robber said with a sneer as she mocked the shivering teller.

Outside the bank the three kids came to the scene as they failed to notice they sprouted 6 whole inches each as their clothes tightened slightly but not too restricting.

“So this is the place, can't wait to deal with some robbers.” Ben said with a grin cracking his knuckles in anticipation.

“Just don't go too overboard.” Gwen reminded him and Kevin, “Yea yea don't hospitalized them too badly.” He said nonchalantly as he saw the police outside the area surrounding the place.

“I don't think they’ll let us through, think we can make a dynamic entrance?” He advised them, Gwen nodded in understanding as she responded, “I think we can make a breaking and entering.” She said with a mischievous grin on her face.

The bank wall blasted open, sending the closest robber flying to the floor in an unconscious heap. The hostages and crooks looked up, expecting to see the cops with some changes...only to see three kids glaring at them.

“What the heck is this!? This ain't your daycare! Waste the brats!” The robber who was having the cash loaded ordered.

A hail of bullets hit the kids, only to bounce off, some of which back at the robbers.

“Yo Ben, still got that soda?” Kevin asked Ben with a grin. “Yeah, why?” Ben inquired.

“I wonder how the great and powerful dweeb’s burps have been effected by these new powers.” Gwen teased, explaining Kevin’s idea for him.

“Oooohh, I get what you’re saying.” Ben said returning the grin as he fished into his pockets and pulled out the soda can and easily poked a hole in there and drank from it.

“What do ya think this is? A meet and greet? Shoot them!” The robber stubbornly ordered the rest as they opened fire on Ben but to no avail.

“Ah, still cold.” Ben said with a sigh, ignoring the bullets bouncing off of him when in actuality the bullets crumpled against his body into a flat circle from the impact.

He then looked to them and grinned before he sucked in a deep breath and then suddenly unleashed a burp that rippled throughout the bank causing some of the robbers to be sent flying back from the shockwave as the windows shattered from the force of it.

“Woah check me out! Super burping skills are a go!” Ben praised himself as Gwen and Kevin chuckled in amusement at his antics.

The hostages soon ran out to the police as the SWAT team rushed in to find the humiliated and now partially deaf robbers whimpering on the floor. There was no sign of the mystery heroes.

Kevin, Gwen and Ben were back at the Tennyson house, laughing and hanging out.

“Never thought your gross habits would come in handy!” Gwen laughed.

“Don't make me super burp YOU too.” Ben smugly threatened.

“Guys...can ya come in here!?” Kevin's voice yelled from Ben’s room. Gwen and Ben shrugged and stood up only to hit their heads on the ceiling together.

“Ow.” Ben said rubbing his head from the impact on the ceiling as Gwen looked strangely at him, “You realize that doesn't hurt right?” She asked blandly as the plaster and crack from the ceiling showed that they were perfectly fine.

“It's a sense of habit okay?” He said slightly embarrassed about the fact as she shook her head with a sigh.

“Lets just see what's wrong with Kevin.” Gwen decided, Ben nodded as he walked to the door with her behind him, noting their footsteps are much heavier now.

He opened it only to come face to well, pit, “Wait Kevin is that you?” Ben asked surprised and Gwen fanned the air slightly with a light grimace before she smirked a little.

“And it looks like someone needs a shower.” She joked as he did indeed reek from the days of sleeping in the wilderness for days on end.

“Oh bite me, could you help me out here? I was crashing on your couch before this started to happen.” Kevin explained to them as he shifted his body a bit as the two heard furniture being moved and stuff falling to the floor.

“Like what grab your hand and pull you out?” Gwen questioned him as he replied back, “Duh, I bet your living room got more space for me to stretch out.” He said rolling his eyes.

“Alright...uh..can ya reach your hand out?” Ben said, he was used to his own body odor, and in a lesser sense Kevin’s..but he hadn’t really experienced being up close with Kevin’s armpit before..much less when Kevin was ten feet tall! “Yeah I think so...lemme just-” Kevin grunted and they heard a crunch. Ben winced, “Please tell me that wasn’t my console…”

“I’ll buy you another one!” Kevin said defensively.

“With what?!” Gwen demanded. “Look...can we just...talk about this later?” Kevin grunted uncomfortably as he reached his hand out. “Alright...it’s a lot more spacious in the living room anyway.” Gwen said as she grabbed Kevin’s hand. Kevin couldn’t help himself and said: “Oooho..we holdin’ hands already?”

“Oh shut up or I’ll leave you in there to stink up Ben’s room.” Gwen glared.

“Heeey!” Ben whined as he grabbed Kevin’s wrist. “One..” Gwen said.

“Two..” Ben grounded himself.
“Three!” Kevin bellowed as the doorframe began to creak and strain and on the sides the walls cracked a bit as Kevin finally came flying out on top of the equally big Tennysons. “Ugh...get off’a me! You BOTH reek!” Gwen pushed Kevin and Ben off of her.

Soon after, Ben, Kevin and Gwen were sitting on the sagging couch. “So...looks like we’re gonna be invincible giants now…” Ben said, somewhat excitedly.

“Heh, and we thought we’d have it made BEFORE.” Kevin said cockily.

“So Kevin, what exactly did you mean by buying Ben a new console?” Gwen asked in a stern voice with her arms folded, Ben was curious as well at what he meant.

“Alright! So I may have swindle a bit of cash from the bank we just saved.” He said showing her the hastily stuffed in money in his large hand all of them showing hundreds of dollars.

“Kevin I thought we were just saving the bank from robbers not rob them blind.” Ben said slightly disappointed in his lack of self restraint.

“Besides they’re gonna find out that the missing money went somewhere and they’ll find us eventually.” She added in her two cents with a raised eyebrow.

“Bah you guys are too cautious besides what are they gonna do arrest us? They’d only be able to cuff our fingers at this point, plus we are invincible to them.” Kevin replied back, while it was dishonest to rob them he does have a point, there was little they can do against them.

Gwen relented and sighed, “Fine you can keep the money, not like they’ll do anything or even know we were there.” She said as Kevin grinned and teasingly punched her shoulder.

“See now ya gettin it.” He said as Gwen rolled her eyes.

“So what do we do now?” Ben asked them as Kevin shrugged as he gingerly picked up the remote for the TV.

“Don't know about you guys but I feel like watching some TV and airing out my feet if you don't mind.” He answered them and turned on the television.

“Oh, boy... I'll open a window.” Gwen groaned and walked over to the living room window and gently lifted it open.

Kevin grinned smugly as Ben looked at the dark haired troublemaker’s boots..he had experience in foot odor, it being one of his primary resources for tormenting or grossing out Gwen.

However strangely enough he’d never seen nor experienced Kevin's feet...first time for everything he guessed.
1323111.title: Continue 1

13231111.content:
Kevin gripped his colossal right boot and grunted as he began the arduous struggle of unsticking it from his unclean foot. “Giant Kev is gonna grace your home with his feet, Benny boy!” Kevin teased through the effort.

“Great...as if Ben doesn't have it smelling ENOUGH like foot sweat.” Gwen rolled her eyes as she sat back down...just as with a sickening squelch.. Kevin freed his sockless foot.

“Ahh much better.” He said sighing in pleasure as he wiggled his thick toes from the freedom of his boots as the pungent foot odor leaked from them which thanks to the windows aired it out some.

“Man Kevin I didn't think your feet would stink that bad.” Ben said fanning the air to get the smell out from him to little effect.

“When you’ve been travelling as long as I have throughout the United States with no access to good bathrooms and clothes you’d smell like this too, not that I’m complaining.” He said as he flexed his toes for emphasis, wafting his smell into the room as the News channel was on as he kicked up his feet on the table in front of them.

“Wonder what are they talking about now?” Gwen wondered as they paid attention to what was being said.

“Probably that bank robbery we busted.” Kevin said with a smile as he put his boots next to the table as he gives it time to air out.

The news anchor was talking about how the hostages told of three mysterious children who saved them with strange powers. “Good thing the goons took care of the camera system...or we’d be dealing with a LOT of weird publicity right now.” Gwen sighed in relief.

“Yeah, plus it wouldn’t be as fun to get the drop on people who mess with us if EVERYONE knew we were super powerful.” Ben smirked.

“Speaking of that….I was thinking if you wanted to head down to the arcade, Ben?” Kevin smirked knowingly.

“Yeah, sure! But those jerks from the other day are probably still-....” A sudden mischievous grin formed on Ben’s face as he and Kevin shared a dark laugh.

“Am I missing something here?” Gwen butted in. “Just wait here..we’ll be back later.” Kevin stuffed his still ripe feet back into his boots and stood up, Ben followed him as they went to the door. “Just try not to break the-..” she was interrupted by a loud crash and the sound of the door tearing off it’s hinges.

“My bad!” Ben called over his shoulder as he lifted up the door and gently placed it back in it’s frame.

“Ugh...doofuses.” Gwen groaned.

The arcade was down the street thankfully, in an area that not a lot of prying eyes were seen...and since the three older teens had basically taken over the place and bullied anyone into coming around during ‘their’ hours..it was quite deserted..except for Ben and Kevin’s targets of course.

Chris, the leader of the trio of bullies, felt a thick finger jabbing into his back. “Nice game skills...for a runt.” Ben’s voice said from behind him “Oh..you’re gonna get it, Tennyson….” Chris whirled around..only to see Kevin had his two buddies and fellow bullies in headlocks of sorts, both boys faces buried in his armpits as he had his arms wrapped around their necks. Ben cracked his knuckles and grinned deviously. “Might wanna start begging and apologizing now..” Ben warned darkly.

Chris stumbled back from the sight of Ben and Kevin as he fell on his ass in fear of them, “B-Ben what happened to you?” He asked him nervously as the ten year old mini-giant grinned mischievously at the boy in front of him.

“What would you like to know? I got big, bigger than you obviously, now for some payback.” He said with a sneer on his face.

“Now that I’m big, I could do stuff like this for instance.” He said forebodingly as Chris wondered what he meant before he saw him walk to a random arcade machine and put his hand on it and squeeze, he was treated to the unpleasant noise of metal and plastic crumpling under Ben’s grip as he looked at him with a smirk on his face.

“Just don't hurt me I’ll do anything please!” He begged pathetically, eyes wide with terror, “I dunno if you should refuse Ben, he did say ‘anything'.” Kevin said as the boy’s two stooges were struggling to break free from his ironclad grip to no avail.

“You’re right about that, so if you don't want me to hurt you, all ya gotta do is simple, take off my shoes.” Ben said to him as Chris looked confused, “That's it?” He asked him.

“Of course not, after you do it I’ll tell you what to do next.” Ben said as his toes wiggled inside his shoes.

“On your hands and knees, crawl like the bug you are!” Kevin chimed in with a wink at Ben. Ben smirked as he watched the older boy crawl before him up to his sneakers. The boy jumped as Ben took a seat on top of the now collapsed arcade machine.

Chris whimpered as his shaking hands fumbled with Ben’s shoelaces, but eventually he got them untied. Ben narrowed his eyes menacingly as he felt the shoes being pulled off, he let out a sigh as his reeking and obviously well worn socks on his feet were hit by the cool ac in the arcade.

Kevin snickered as he heard his prisoners gag into his pits, Gwen was right….but in his opinion he certainly didn't need a shower.

Ben’s socks were littered with holes that gave a preview of his plump pinkish boy sole. Chris cringed and gagged a bit at the cheesy funk.

“Okay, what now?” He asked fearfully as he shivered as the sight of Ben’s feet as he wiggled his toes in anticipation of what he will ask him to do next.

Ben’s grinning face told him that what was gonna happen next is not gonna be a fun time.
13231111.title: Continue 1

132311111.content:
“Well my little buddy I got another thing for you, cuz you're not done taking off everything off my feet.” He said pointing to his socked feet to point out this discrepancy.

“Wh-what but you sai-” He was about to begin but was shut up by Ben stomping his foot right next to Chris, causing the tiles to crack slightly from the force of it, “And I said you’re gonna take off my socks now get to it!” He demanded as Ben rested the foot in front of him as the odor from their close proximity as it smelt like raw cheesy vinegar stench that emitted from them.

Chris crawled forward to pull and tugged at the sock as Ben flexed his toes and watched amused as he tried to stay on his foot to remove it, eventually he managed to remove the first sock, and unleashing a terrible smell that came from his freed foot.

“Ahhh...nice job, foot boy! Now the other one!” Ben said, domineeringly stomping his other foot down and cracking the floor.

Kevin smirked, he'd finally released his hold on the two other teens...only to twist up two arcade machines like tinfoil and restrain them to the floor with them. Now he stood over them, from their perspective on the floor he was very big indeed.

Kevin sniffed the air as he heard Ben sigh and turned to see the boy Chris looking green in the face before both of Ben’s now bare feet.

“What are you gonna do with us!?” One of the two bullies wailed from the floor before Kevin. Chris was being commanded by Ben to lay down faceup on the floor, Ben wanted a footstool.

“What I’m gonna do? Well that's obvious, I’m gonna use you for entertainment until Ben is done with his fun.” Kevin said with his hands on his hips as he loomed over both of them.

“Quick question, how good are ya at breathing?” He asked them curiously as the two bullies looked at each other before answering nervously, “Pretty good?”

“Works for me.” He replied with a grin as he walked a bit closer to them, “My pits are so lonely without something to keep them company so your faces will do just fine.” He stated before he placed his hands on each side of them before he shoved his pits into their faces.

The full unbridled smell poured into their nostrils as the sweat dripped onto their faces as they coughed and choked at the nasty odor that plagued their senses.

“Heh, come on you losers, can't handle a smell of a actual tough guy?” Kevin taunted them as he grounded his pits into their faces, marking them with his horrendous armpit stink.

Ben was grinding his reeking soles into Chris’ helpless face, a smug grin on his own the whole time. “Yeah, revenge is sweet. Who knew you guys were such babies?” Ben mocked.

“Yep, you're all such wimpy losers it almost is too pathetic to keep this up!” Kevin increased the weight he was putting on their faces with his pits and said “Naaaah!”

“Kevin..I think we're getting bigger!” Ben reported excitedly. Indeed, both the pit and feet hostages felt the rank areas start to become more vast and heavy on their poor sweat stained faces.

“W-whats going on, stop it! Please!” Chris pleased desperately from beneath Ben’s expanding soles.

“Y-yeah! Your stink...it's getting too much!!” The suffocating boys said through Kevin's pit skin.

“Best ditch the rags before we get some unnecessary attention.” Kevin said groaning in slight pleasure at the growth as he slowly surged upwards in size.

“Aww but I think we should trash their place before we leave.” Ben said as he covered Chris’ face with his immense sole before he passed out from the smell, “Certainly fun for us right?” He rhetorically asked him before slightly pushing him away as he expanded in size.

Kevin smirked in agreement before he freed the barely breathing bullies, “Get your boss and scram knowing who runs things around here.” He said sneering at them before they got up hastily and ran away, picking up Chris on their shoulders before running away screaming.

“Hey you bet Gwen is growing too? I just hope the neighbors don't call in the police for disturbance, last thing she wants is cops hounding her.” Ben mused to which Kevin shrugged, “Probably but that's on them if they want to pick a fight with her.” He said chuckling in amusement as they continued to grow.

Speaking of Gwen, she was currently struggling to make her way through the hallway...and she was starting to lose her patience with how cramped she was. “Ugh...I’m sorry Grandpa Max and aunt and uncle Tennyson...but this is the only way I can..breathe!” With that, the redhead reared back her white slip-on clad foot, and crashed it through the wall in front of her.


Gwen knocked through the rest of the wall... she'd made quite the mess but at least she had more room and wasn't stuck.

The notoriously nosy neighbors were already calling the police. Ben and Kevin were just smashing through the arcade wall, when they saw two cop cars speeding by. “Uh Oh.. that'll be Gwen.” Ben said as he wiggled his moistening toes in his just recovered and slightly now tight shoes and socks.

“Eh, she can handle herself...there's the loser’s car. I wanna step on it with these rank feet, gonna take my boots off now.” Kevin said with a lick of his lips.

“Go for it then.” Ben said with a grin on his face as he stood back and watched as Kevin began to do his thing.

Kevin put his hands on his boot and pulled them off as he groaned in satisfaction as he wiggled his freed toes in joy before doing the same for the other boot as he grunted and tugged off the other one.

With the boots off Ben could smell the sweat and stink coming off of them as he scrunched his nose slightly, “Quite the smell.” Ben commented smiling a bit.

“I know right? Now down to business.” Kevin said as he stomped down the street to where he last saw the car of the bully and in moments he found it, a nice shiny sedan sitting in park along with some other cars.

“I think its time to give this car a makeover.” He said smirking as he lifted his bare foot over the car as he wiggled his toes and pressed down onto the hood, hearing it crumple a bit, his grin widened as he forced it down as the lights came on from emergency alarm coming on as the metal deformed and twisted under him slowly crushing the front of the car.

“Yeah turn that thing into the scrapheap!” Ben goaded him on as he pressed down with a force of a hydraulic press as the alarm abruptly ended when Kevin crushed the entire front hood of the car easily as the rest lifted off the ground from the weight being balanced on the other side.

“Heh, serves him right, now to trash the rest of it.” Kevin declared, not that he can't lie that stomping on stuff with his bare feet felt really good to do.

He then decided to finish the rest of the car by stepping into the uncrushed portion and simply standing on top of it, grinning wildly as he felt it compressing itself underneath him as he wiggled his toes in pleasure, curling over the side of it and denting the metal as the windows fractured and cracked from the pressure like a slow compression tool.

“That looks rather fun to do Kevin.” Ben said folding his arms with a smirk on his face, the boy chuckled as he replied, “It feels awesome crushing these tin cans with my large feet.”

“And just think we about 16 ft tall imagine if we’re 50 ft or something? We could stomp them whole with our sweaty feet.” Ben said at the quite frankly, rather arousing imagery of stomping around the city and terrorizing people.

“Don't forget the special surprises inside these cars when they’re loaded with people inside too, I bet it’d be even more fun if there was some in there too.” Kevin added in with a slight lustful sigh.

All of a sudden screaming met their ears, and a mustached bald man came out shouting at them in Italian. Kevin and Ben looked at each other in confusion. “Uhh...you sure this is Chris's car?” Ben asked his friend.

Kevin scratched his greasy hair and stepped off of the car. “Chris!?” The man started swearing in Italian, “He told us to do this.” Kevin lied, winking at Ben.

“Why that little #*$&@!! I loan him my car and he gets two overgrown children to..” The man, who they guessed was Chris’ grandpa growled.

Kevin and Ben wandered off while the.man went to presumably strangle his grandson.

“Well that just happened..” Ben joked as they approached the Tennyson home. “Hey ain't that your grandpa with Gwen on your front lawn?” Kevin asked.

“Uh oh..” Ben gulped as Max sternly waved them over. “Well...good luck!” Kevin started to leave until..”That means BOTH of you, boys.”

“Aww why I gotta be in this?” Kevin complained as Gwen glared at him, “Because this involves ALL of us Kevin.” She replied before looking at his bare feet and asked him.

“What happened to your boots?” She questioned him as he waved her off, “Took them off somewhere, I’ll get them later.” He nonchalantly answered her, noting that there is a big hole in the house.

“Well there goes my house.” Ben said in a deadpanned tone as he looked to see that the police was here as well, documenting the scene in addition to several armed vehicles as big as they were.

“Wait, aren't those the S.E.C.T. guys?” Ben stated as he saw the icon on those vehicles as Gwen nodded, “They’ve been here since I burst out of the house.” She explained to them.
132311111.title: Continue 1

1323111111.content:
“So what they want blood or something? Did they use needles?” Kevin asked her, she shrugged at the question, “They certainly tried, the few broken needles told them that it's fruitless.” Gwen said, maybe a bit prideful in her body’s invulnerability.

“Which is what I’m asking in how did this happen to you kids.” Max wondered out loud as he adopted a thinking pose to try and figure out what was the cause, they were exposed to something but what?

Kevin stooped down to Max, “Well with me there was this weird can that landed outside my tent..sprayed me with some gas and I got super strong. We just recently hit these growth spurts.”

One of the S.E.C.T. guys came over carrying two of the cans in plastic bags. “That's them.” Kevin said casually.

“It must've sprayed through your windows, it was hot last night.” Max said.

A large S.E.C.T. truck pulled up with Kevin's boots loaded in the back, a pair of scientists wearing gas masks were inspecting them.

“Hey there's my boots.” He said happily as Gwen interjected, “Could you pay attention for a little bit and tell us if it said anything of interest?” She asked him as he shook his head in negative.

“Nothing obvious that's for sure then again I felt pretty fantastic with having super strength and coming to your house.” He said scratching his head embarrassed a little bit from missing some crucial details.

A SECT scientist written down some notes as he informed them coming from Kevin’s boots, “That explains I suppose the extra sweat coming from your feet, must be a small side effect, not very harmful but this data doesn't make sense, from the sweat it says you are in peak performance, even above it.” He said writing down more notes from this observation.

Kevin looked at his feet to quizzically wiggle his sweaty toes, ‘Extra sweaty huh?’ He thought to himself as he allowed a small prideful smile.

“So if there's a pod that came from somewhere wouldn't there be a sort of I don't know, launch coordinates? Could find the source?” Gwen suggested to do.

“Yeah, and thank the guy!” Ben blurted causing Kevin to high five him.
Gwen rolled her eyes, though she had to admit her new position of power sent shivers of pleasure down her spine.

“Hey! You guys aren't taking this--... hold on...are you three getting bigger?” Max said as his eyes widened.

Ben, Gwen and Kevin began to notice those SECT trucks weren't looking so big now.

“Woah we are? Awesome!” Ben said in glee as he Kevin and Gwen started to sprout up in size, the scientists and guards ran away to a safer distance as Gwen stood up with them as they expanded outwards and upwards.

Kevin wiggled his bigger and sweatier toes in pleasure as he sighed at the sensation that was going through him as was Ben as he commented, “We just keep going up eh Gwen?”

Gwen couldnt help but crack a smile at the poor attempt at humor but for some reason it felt right, “Couldn't agree more with you Ben.” She said with a smirk on her face as she saw her shoes growing more and more.

“Heh, might get those guys to make new boots for me, these are too small for me.” Kevin joked as he stomped his foot near the truck holding them, showing that his feet went past the toe section of them by a bit.

By the time they stopped they were around a size of 35 ft tall! Max gazed up in awe of his two grandkids and the troublemaker. “Alright, we DEFINITELY need to find out how to reverse this.” Max said.

Kevin scoffed, “Yeah right.”

“As much as I don't wanna agree with b.o boy over here...he's got a point.” Gwen smirked.

Ben laughed and pointed at Kevin for Gwen's nickname for him. Kevin retaliated by grabbing Ben in a headlock and giving him a noogie while Ben held his breath of course.

Upon being released, Ben smiled at grandpa Max. “We're unstoppable! We're gonna go have some fun! Later grandpa and SECT dorks!” Ben waved as he and the other giants stomped off.

Kevin had retrieved his boots, he'd elected to skewer his meaty toes through the front so they wouldn't be cramped so now the only part of his feet showing were his toes wiggling through the five individual holes each.

“You making a fashion statement, stinky?” Gwen teased.

“Hmph, you can say that, no way I ain't losing these boots, besides now people get a nice preview of my stink.” Kevin said with a grin on his face, flexing his toes to waft his foot odor into the noses of the nervous SECT task force that was there.

“So I say let's bounce for now, anywhere of you guys want to go?” Ben asked as he put his hands behind his head as they walked off, ignoring the people they left behind calling for them to stay.

“Not too sure, then again there isn't much of a place to see in Bellwood, unless you want to visit school again?” Gwen asked with a teasing tone.

Ben thought about it for a moment and the idea was rather appealing to him as he flashed her a mischievous smile ready to cause some real trouble for some people, one that Kevin was intrigued by.

“Gonna trash the school?” Kevin asked him curiously, Ben nodded in confirmation as Gwen giggled a bit at what is gonna happen, safe to say she was wanting to see how powerful they all are at this new size and how frankly unstoppable they will be later on.

The Bellwood elementary building was located separate from the high school, the trio supposed they could terrorize the older kids later.. something Kevin looked forward to since he'd had trouble with punks of a higher age who he knew went there.

Due to it still being summer but close to the new school year's start, the faculty there were a few teachers and of course the principal.

Luckily for Ben, these were some of his most hated authority figures who had given him a hard time during his attendance.

The school's windows vibrated with the footsteps of the trio. As they approached, Kevin spoke up. “I think I'll let you solo this one, Ben. I ain't a student here, would be less personal for me.” Kevin smirked.

Gwen nodded, “I'll jump in later, you get the spotlight for now.” Gwen smiled at her cousin.
1323111111.title: Continue 1

13231111111.content:
The astonished teachers and faculty gazed out from the windows of the school at the approaching giant Ben Tennyson.

“Hey there losers! Enjoying the view of your favorite student?” Ben sarcastically asked them with a devious smile on his face as he stomped closer to the school, seeing the faculty at the windows.

They saw his feet standing right in front of them as he bent over to get a closer look at them, they backed away as his large green eyes looked upon them with amusement before he continued talking, “I say the curriculum is pretty lacking if you asked me, too much work and not enough enjoyment from yours truly, so I’d say…” He left off forebodingly as he stood back up and reared his fist back, before he then punched into the school’s roof easily, considering that the school itself was about 1 floor with a basement.

“School’s cancelled permanently!” He declared as he pulled back his fist, seeing the chunk of debris and dust that had showered the classroom, Ben chuckled in amusement before he had a wonderful idea in his head, one that would potentially traumatize the school faculty that he knows is in there.

“I got a great idea that I’m sure you teachers are gonna love.” He said as he bent down and began to undo the laces of his shoes and pried them off with some effort considering they didn’t grow properly with him when he was at the Arcade.

With a grunt, he popped off his shoes and allowed their reeking odor to leak out in front of them, going into the ventilation systems and slowly contaminating the air of the school, “Ah that feels nice.” He moaned as he wiggled his toes in freedom, fanning the smell into the air and making it worse for them.

Ben of course hadn't been able to fit his bigger feet back into those rancid well worn socks of his, a fact which had disappointed him back at the arcade. However, upon smelling his just freed feet, he smirked at how the soaked insides of his sneakers had increased his potency.

The sounds of gagging and swears made him chuckle mischievously, dropping the shoe with a mighty clunk.

Prying off the other shoe soon after, Ben placed with his meaty feet down on the ground, wiggling his plump toes in anticipation.

The roofless school was cast in the shadow of Ben's bare foot, he grinned smugly and spread his pudgy toes as rancid sock lint and drops of murky sweat rained down onto the huddled, scared faculty.

“Benjamin Tennyson! Stop this immediately or else..!” The principal tried to come up with a sufficient threat.

“Or else what? You’ll suspend me from the school I don’t even want to go to?” He retorted back at him with a smirk of superiority over these people thinking they can tell him what to do, well no more on that front.

He put his sweaty odorous foot down on top of the faculty as they tried to get away from it but unfortunately since the debris from him punching a hole in the roof and ceiling blocked the exit, making any chance of escape impossible and inhaling his giant foot all the more a reality.

“Heh, you people are like little mice scurrying around, but its time for me to put my foot down on you people, starting with the good ol principal!” He declared as he quickly aimed his foot right onto the man, covering most of his body with total ease as the man struggled under his warm foot.

“Mmm, you make a nice insole Principal.” Ben said in a low voice as his breathing quickened a little bit, riding on the highs of dominance as he wiggled his head-sized toes in comfort and making the life for his victim miserable.

“Please let me go Tennyson I’ll make you pass with all 100s! Please just let me go!” He begged for his life as he was forced to inhale the pungent sweat and toejam that had accumulated between his toes and Ben was relishing in the suffering he was going through.

“Awww, bargaining with me? You must be pretty desperate! But nah, grades don't really count for me anymore since as ya can tell….” Ben leaned down and looked the teachers in the eyes and bellowed “I HIT A GROWTH SPURT!!”.

This roaring declaration caused the teachers’ ears to ring and at least one of them to go deaf in one ear.

Standing back up, Ben lifted his rank foot off of the blubbering principal only for the man to come with it, adhered to Ben’s foot.

Ben’s homeroom teacher was well accustomed to the Tennyson boy's mischief, her name was Ms. Crabapple...and this had to be the biggest trouble Ben had ever caused for the school, pun intended.

Thankfully she wasn't too worried about being a revenge target like the notoriously cranky and strict principal who had a habit of chewing Ben and his friends out and passing out detentions like candy.

Of course, given Ben's power high, that could change.

“I think this is yours.” He said teasingly lowering his foot with the stuck Principal who had been knocked unconscious by the fright and potent cheesy smells of his toes.

The other remaining faculty members quickly acted to extract him from Ben’s sole as quick as possible lest the close proximity to the smelly foot take its toll on them as well. With a wet pop, they got him out of there as they rested him on a still standing desk as Ms.Crabapple looked up at Ben nervously as he seem to recognize her.

“Oh is that you Ms.Crabapple? You were one of my favorite cool teachers, I did get pretty big didn't I?” He said with an rather arrogant look on his face.

“Y-yes, that you did Ben but please you can't treat us like this.” She pleaded to him, Ben rolled his eyes at her being overly dramatic, “The Principal was an annoying guy, not like you, so I’m willing to cut a little something with ya.” He said dropping a rather tantalizing deal on the woman.

“O-oh? R-really? That's nice of you...um...thank you for saying I was your favorite by the way.” She was starting to feel more at ease.

Ben smiled in a rather reassuring way as he explained, “You’re gonna get to tell everyone what you saw here! So I'm letting you go!" He said excitedly.

"S-sure...thank you Ben. Are you sure this'll be ok?" The teacher said, grateful that she was on the titan's good side.

“Duh, we’re huge and frankly invulnerable, even to each other, and we're getting bigger by the hour.” Ben informed her with a knowing smile on his face.

“Well...alright then..” She said relenting and allowing Ben to pick her up with ease as the other teachers looked shocked that she gave in to his proposal just like that!

Ben held her gently in his cupped hand and brought her to his widely grinning face. She had to admit, he was every bit the childish kid she'd known...even as a mighty giant.

“Just wait, you're gonna have lots to tell!” Ben assured her before turning his attention back down to the rest of the teachers. “What are YOU looking at, runts!? Kiss my toes!!” Ben ordered.

Ben closed his eyes and let out a relaxed sigh as he felt their kisses and knew he was in control.

They were forced to kiss his sweaty plump toes each as big or bigger than their heads as they were forced to breathe in his awful foot odor as they dry heaved from the odor and even tasting the sweat as it sometimes drains through their lips.

“Now since you’re on board the train that has no breaks, I think you should get a front row seat to see the destruction of this school.” He said winking at her before calling over to the two other giant/ess sitting a bit away from him as they talked to themselves.

“Hey Gwen! Kevin! You mind keeping an eye on my teacher?” He asked them pointing to the woman with his free hand.

The two looked confused before Gwen shrugged and said, “Sure I can watch her for you.” She agreed and got up from her spot and walked over to her cousin, before he placed her carefully in her hand as she walked back to her spot with Ms.Crabapple in tow.

“Now that's outta the way, I think you guys did enough groveling for now and since you were so cooperative.” He said smirking as he drew his foot back, as his heel broke a hole in the wall, allowing them to escape.

“Scram since I can't really squish you people without having to clean the mess, but I can however do this…” He said with a sneer as he drove his thick foot through the school wall as the building shook from the impact,

“Woohoo! School Demolition is live!” He declared as he swept his dirtied foot left and right, causing parts of the classrooms and halls to be totaled as he began his onslaught on the school.

Crabapple's eye twitched annoyedly “There goes my job…”
Gwen giggled, “Guess you should start looking for new employment.”

Kevin snorted, “Yeah, I could always use an armpit scratcher.” He smirked menacingly and reached for the now terrified teacher.

In an instant Ben's shoe flew over, hit him in the face and knocked him to the ground. “Get a different tiny to scratch your gross pits!!” Ben roared, now standing in smoky ruins with one shoe on.

Kevin rubbed the spot where he got hit more out of habit than any real pain as he picked up the thrown shoe and tossed it back to him to catch.
13231111111.title: Continue 1

choices: Upon looking around...it's not a dream at all! (Duh)
They were just dreaming...?! Or at least weren't THAT big yet?
132311111111.content:
“It was a joke alright? Jeez, everyone's a critic.” He said in complaint as Gwen giggled at what happened before she looked at Ben amused.

“So had your fun trashing the school?” She asked him teasingly as he blushed slightly in embarrassment at the question, “Uh yeah, it was a blast bossing people older than you around. Anyhow, see you later, teach!" Ben snickered as Gwen placed Crabapple on the ground.

She quickly ran away, casting glances over her shoulder at her student and his two accomplices. "I have a feeling things are going to change even more around here..." She mumbled as she got in her car and drove off.

"So..what now?" Gwen asked the two boys.

"I wanted to have my fun smashing some place important, sticking to the man right?” Kevin joked as he and Gwen got up and walked to Ben who was fitting back on his shoe.

“Oh? Where to?” Ben asked curiously as the two grinned at the question, “There's an amusement park opening tomorrow, on the other side of the city, and I bet the city council didn't say a peep of what happened tonight, so what do you say? Rest and then come terrorize the amusement park tomorrow?” Gwen asked him.

“Sure why not?” Ben said his eyes alight with the prospect of going to an amusement park at this new size of his.

Kevin saw from the corner of his eyes a fleeing teacher as he quickly bent down and snatched him up as he chuckled in amusement, “Now I don't think this guy is off limits right?” He asked Ben waving the Gym Teacher in front of him as the man screamed in fear.

Ben smirked as he sat his rump down on top of the rubble and stretched as he tried to force back a yawn. “Nah, do whatever ya want. I'm gonna take a nap...it's getting dark anyhow.”

Gwen snickered, “Looks like ya grabbed the gym teacher, he should know a thing or two about stinky boys”

Kevin leered at the puny man who he now knew was the coach, back when the delinquent attended school he hated p.e because of the bullying jocks and coach who was just as bad and pretended not to see the older jocks cruelty.

“Oho...you don't know how screwed you are little maggot.” Kevin narrowed his eyes.

Kevin sneered at the Gym Teacher as he shook the terrified man, “So little man ready to get a whiff of a real man?” He asked him as he raised his arm and allowing his armpit odor to waft into the teacher’s nose.

He struggled in the boy’s thick fingers as his grip didn't let up in the slightest, Kevin brought the man closer to his toxic pit and pressed him against it.

Kevin chuckled before he yawned in tiredness, “Boy dominating you pests is so tiring, I think I’ll hit the hay, better do a good job licking up the sweat.” He threatened him subtly before he lied down with his armpit closed around the man to prevent him from escaping.

Given that they'd had quite a long and tiring day of mischief, the trio lazily slept the rest of the night and well into the afternoon.

Ben yawned as he sat up and stretched. “Man, that was a crazy dream... Ms Crabapple was there and I was huge..” Ben yawned again.

“Yeah, so was I….” Gwen said sleepily

Last to sit up and of course stretch was Kevin. “Hehe, mine was pretty cool...I had a tiny wimpy man stuffed in my armpit!” Kevin snickered.
132311111111.title: Continue 1

1323111111111.content:
He then felt a sensation in his left armpit of someone struggling weakly as he opened it and saw to his delight, the gym teacher drenched in his sweat and breathing heavily being forced to intake his nasty odor and sweat as he smiled in satisfaction.

“Looks like it was a dream come true for me.” He mused as he pulled the man free as he hacked up sweat that got lodged in his throat as Kevin laughed.

“You’d think we got bigger in our sleep or something.” Gwen said slightly disappointed and stretched her arms.

“But on the bright side the amusement park must be opened by now so I bet you want to go check it out.” Ben considered as he got up and stretched and cracked some stiff bones in his neck.

“Uhh...guys.. about that not growing.” Kev interjected.

That was when the three noticed they were growing at a much quicker pace than they had been previously!

Kevin and Ben had wide goofy grins on their faces as even Gwen had to admit she was getting a power high.

Their growth stopped at 50 ft, a classic size for a giant to be. “I can see the fair lights from here! I'm gonna have the coaster take a detour right into my stomach...I'm starvig’! Urrp! Those school buses last night around midnight ain't gonna cut it for this growing boy!” Ben bragged.

Kevin began to eye his pit sweat seasoned tiny with curiosity...and hunger.

“Well the thing that made us grow also made us strong as heck, biting metal is like biting a sandwich!” He bragged patting his stomach pridefully.

“Funnily enough our digestive systems can process any sort of material and turn it to energy, you should’ve seen him pig out on those buses.” Gwen joked as she remembered him biting into the metal and seats easily and it didn't take long for him to devour 5 school buses in no time.

“Hey a growing boy needs his energy!” He huffed childishly as he folded his arms.

Kevin chuckled as he said, “Since we’re actual giants now, how about I give this guy a tour of my stomach?” He asked them licking his lips in hunger as he looked at the gym teacher covered in sweat.

Ben smirked as he nodded, “Go ahead, he’s small enough to go down.” He said giving him the okay as he watched the spectacle with Gwen.

Kevin opened his mouth in front of him, letting his hot breath go over him as he weakly screamed as the punk kid swallowed him whole and gulped as a bulge went down his throat, “Ah, I could taste my sweat on him, it tasted good, I bet we can get more at the Amusement Park.” He said in anticipation.

“Yeah! Step right up and get your sweat soaked tinies fresh from Kevin’s pits!” Ben joked as Kevin grinned smugly.
1323111111111.title: Dream Come True

13231111111111.content:
Soon the titanic trio were stomping towards the fair lights in the distance! They were sure to cause quite a stir...especially to anyone they passed!

“Heh, you boys have been hogging the spotlight..and I haven’t had my shoes off since yesterday morning before this whole mess started!” Gwen bragged.

Kevin and Ben looked at each other in shock, “Wait...you’re actually joinin’ in?” Kevin asked. “You ain’t taken those shoes off since yesterday MORNING?! Jeez….” Ben said, wrinkling his nose.

“Yep, my feet’ll give yours a run for your money!” Gwen said confidently as she strode ahead.

“Y-yeah right!” Kevin and Ben said together shakily.

Gwen’s smirk showed the amount of confidence she had in her odor filled feet.

It was quite the experience for the citizens to see these three giant kids walking through their city, especially the more busy sections to get to the Park faster.

There was some near misses as some cars had to drive out of the way of their feet, though some people cringed from the odor coming from Kevin's exposed toes much to his amusement.

“I hear something, maybe its the Park?” Ben wondered as he heard music faintly playing in the distance as he looked around slightly.

“What else it could be Ben?” Gwen asked rhetorically as she rolled her eyes and continued to make their way to the Amusement Park.

The park was starting to get crowded, the lights and music had been powered on.

By now the ground of the park had begun to quake from the approaching colossal kids. However, the carnies and guests paid it no mind.

The blaring rock music and sounds of the rides were all that could be heard,so they assumed it was normal.

The ticket booth guy soon was met by the sight of three gigantic shoe clad feet, one of which had ten meaty toes poking out of boots. Gazing up, he saw three kids who were grinning smugly down at him in his puny admission booth.

Those on the ferris wheel got a bird's eye view of these 'guests’. Those at ground level started asking if this was some new show or attraction.

“Uh...didja wanna buy some tickets?” The teenage ticket guy asked nervously.

Ben squatted down so he can get a closer look at the measly ticket man at the entrance, the person obviously intimidated by his movements.

“Yeah, I guess you can say that, three VIP tickets free of charge if you know what I mean.” He said leering at the terrified man behind the counter as he then stood back up and chuckled with the others at the Ticket Man flinching as they walked over him and into the front plaza of the Park as the visitors was stunned by the sight of three giant kids walking in, the ground trembling from their hefty weight as cracks appeared underneath their feet slightly.
13231111111111.title: On to the Amusement Park!

132311111111111.content:
“Its been awhile since I’ve been to an Amusement Park, time to catch up on some rides.” Kevin said with a devious smile on his face.

“Speaking of rides, let me see if they got some passengers onboard.” Gwen said with a smirk on her face.

“Yo, Gwen? Can ya do a spell to put up magic barriers so none of the bugs escape?” Ben asked his cousin.

Gwen smirked and with a quick chant combined with hand movements a purple energy barrier flashed around the park borders and vanished.

“There, ya can't see it but its there.” Gwen said smugly as she strode over to the tilt a whirl and sat down outside it. “Why don't I show you boys what the mighty giantess Queen Gwen has been letting fester in her shoes?” She said to Ben and Kevin

The two raised their eyebrows at what she just said, they were curious about the contents of just how smelly her feet were.

“Go ahead and enlighten us oh mighty queen.” Ben said in a joking tone as he folded his arms, this he gotta see.

“Yeah, I’d like to see this.” Kevin agreed as well.

Gwen smirked as she sat down on top of a Funhouse as it cracked a bit under the weight of her body as she reached for her shoe clad foot and tugged at the shoe, until she popped it off and dropped it onto the ground.

The air soon turned sour as her rancid foot odor came from her now freed bare feet.

“You know, I don't think I ever took these off except when I go to the beach.” Gwen said teasingly as she wiggled her toes for emphasis, wafting her horrid foot odor into the air.

Ben coughed and fanned the air as he pinched his nose. “Ugh! Gwen, that’s….awful!” He said through his pinched nose. Gwen chuckled, “So you admit deFEET?” She wiggled her toes at him as she pried off her other shoe and dropped it directly on top of the Tilt a’ Whirl, damaging the machinery...along with the riders.

“Ha. ha. Leave the jokes to me, would ya?” Ben rolled his eyes and turned to Kevin, who had a big grin on his face. “What are you smilin’ at?” Ben grumpily demanded, rather off put by Gwen secretly being rank as well.

“I dunno...it’s like I’m seeing your cousin in a new light...those feet are...pretty cool.” Kevin said with a blush as they watched Gwen tauntingly lower her foot over the tilt a whirl and bat the people and ride itself around with her plump toes.

“Is that a fact?” Ben asked with a knowing smile on his face as he watched the people on the ride scream in fright as they were spun around by her dangerously large foot.
132311111111111.title: Continue  1

1323111111111111.content:
Gwen chuckled at the fear she caused in the trapped visitors as she soon gripped the ride with her toes to stop the ride abruptly, making the passengers lurch to a stop, some vomiting a little.

“Oh? Seems some of you got dizzy by my own personal setting for the ride, I suppose I’ll help perk you guys up with my smell.” She taunted as she placed her foot on the center with her ball of her foot touching the ride with her sole exposed as her toxic scent was whisked into people’s noses as they struggled in vain in the locked ride, until they get proper time and focus to remove the harness themselves.

Gwen hummed a tune as she nonchalantly pretended to ignore the trapped bugs as she inflicted her stink upon them.

This caused Kevin and Ben to snicker in cruel laughter as some of the tinies managed to escape their harness and make a break for it. Kevin took the initiative and blocked their path with his own reeking toes.

“Yo, Ben. Let's return these insects to Queen Gwen's mighty feet!” Kevin chuckled. Ben groaned but decided to play along.

Gwen lifted her other foot regally and flexed her toes with her lovely sole facing them. “You may put them between the royal toes, my loyal subjects.” Gwen said smugly.

Ben scoffed in amusement at being regarded as a subject but he’ll indulge her fantasy for the time being and besides, he was for a lack of words, curious.

“Alright your highness.” Ben joked as he plucked the random fleeing citizen that was running by them and hoisted her towards Gwen’s rancid feet.

“We’ll be on it right away.” Kevin agreed with a chuckle as he picked up an unwilling civilian as well, “Here comes the main attraction, Gwen’s stinky toes!” He quipped as they all shared a laugh at how cheesy of a joke it was.

Gwen spread open her toes for Ben to insert her first recipient as she scream in terror at the repugnant odor that infiltrated her senses as she saw nothing but a wall of sweaty flesh and a horrid smell.

“Hehe, looks like your feet are pretty bad to these bugs.” Ben said with a mischievous glint in his eyes. “Put em’ in there already, doofus!” Gwen said impatiently. Ben grumbled and roughly pressed the scared and still screaming tiny between his cousin’s sweat ridden big and second toe. Gwen shivered in pleasure as she enjoyed the runt’s squirming, while Ben shivered in something close to disgust as he felt her sticky, sweaty toe crevice and pulled his finger out, leaving the poor tiny girl adhered to Gwen’s crevice.
