133211.content:
It had been only a few weeks since she had beaten her uncle Unalok, and had banished Vaatu the evil primordial Spirit that had plagued the world with his imminent return, now that she had destroyed his Dark Avatar and gotten rid of his essence.

However it was a matter of time for that to happen for him to return, so for now, Korra relaxed and returned to her duties and finding time to relax.

Though, she didn't realize the potential danger of leaving the spirit portals fully open, in that time, the spiritual energies that flowed out of the portal was potent and permeates the world, as it soon starts to funnel into the singularity that was the Avatar herself.

Korra was busy sleeping in her bed resting for the moment, as the potential energy started to fill her with power, more than ever before, normally her body couldn't maintain such a thing, but her unique position made that a different case.

Her body started to shift under the covers as her body soon started to expand...
133211.title: Korra's Spiritual (And Literal) Growth!

choices: So Tenzin, hows the view from down there (Mischievous)
This... This is perfect! (Happy/Evil if you want to go that route)
1332112.content:
Korra kept on growing and growing, not slowing down and stopping. She grew so much that her legs were entirely off the bed, her giant legs hanging over the side. Korra in a matter of moments hit her feet on the wall, then hit her head on the opposite as well. The impact cracked the wall as she kept pushing through it. Only being able to hold her for so long, the walls bursted open as she kept growing and growing.

Still unaware Korra shifted slightly in her sleep, getting into more a sitting position as she was uncomfortable. This time her head hit the ceiling as she grew. Busting through it just as easy as she did the wall. Korra kept growing and growing until finally she busted through the roof of the place, still asleep and unaware of the events that transpired, but the family wasn't.

Tenzin was training with his family. He believed that the morning is always the perfect time to work. Although his children didn't agree, Jinora of course didn't mind by Ikki and Meelo did. Tenzin was teaching them about expert air bending techniques when they heard a bang from their home.

All four airbenders saw what looked like Korra’s face, resting on the roof. But it was absolutely massive. They couldn't see the rest of her body but they assume that it must be equally big.

“Woah” Meelo said, being the first one to speak.

“Is that Korra! She’s so big” Ikki said amazed at the side.

“Thats, thats not possible” Jinora added, she's heard of many things but giants were no one of them

Tenzin could see her face, she was sleeping currently. Of course that girl wouldn't even wake up when something like this happens. “You all go to the house and check if your mother is okay” Tenzin ordered “Im going to wake up that girl”

All the children listened and ran to the house, making sure to stay a safe distance from Korra. Tenzin ran as well, Airbending his way up to Korra. He landed right in front of her face, on the piece of the roof thats not broken. He looked down and just like he suspected she was fully grown. Still in her sleepwear so this must of happened in her sleep.

“Im sorry Korra, but I'm afraid its time for you to wake up” Tenzin said. Then without warning he gave a hurricane of air right to her face. This woke Korra up instantly as she stood up, collapsing more of the house as Tenzin looked up in awe. She's double the height of their home, maybe even more. Tenzin on the roof was level with her knees

“Tenzin, why did you do that! I told you i don't like waking up with that!” Korra said remember all the times Tenzin woke her up that way.

“Well if you open your eyes, you'd understand why” Korra then opened her eyes just like Tenzin said. Not gazing at her room but the city. She looked down as she couldn't believe it. Tiny Island, Tiny Home, Tiny Tenzin.
 She was giant!

What does she say next?

"Huh, wow, you guys are all so...small." She said with awe in her voice before her disbelief slowly formed into mischievous smile on her face.

"So Tenzin, how's the view down there? I'm pretty huge huh? It almost reminds me of that time I went as a giant Spirit actually." She mused as she had her hands on her hips, she could get use to this sort of size, she'd make for an even better Avatar she bet.

"Korra what happened to have brought this change!?" He asked her in confusion, this situation was very strange to him, he never heard of an Avatar just suddenly growing like that., though these past few weeks were anything but ordinary.

Korra shrugged as she responded to him, "I dunno but I am not really complaining about this, I mean look at me, I'm huge! And I feel like I can run for miles, I can definitely help more with the whole Avatar business." She said with a smile stepping over him to get out of the rubble, giving him a view of her large bare sole, her foot was big enough to cover a whole Satomobile with little effort.

"Where are you going?" He questioned cautiously, knowing that Korra isn't one to be cooped up in one place for too long if she has the energy.

The foot stomped onto the ground as the place shook slightly from her weight, "Well Tenzin, been doing a little bit of thinking about this whole thing." She told him as she went to the courtyard proper as she looked at him with a mischevious smile, that could never be good.

133211221.content:
“Im going to explore Republic City, i wanna see how small everything is to me now”

“What!” Tenzin replied in utter horror. “Korra you cant do that! We need to keep you contained on this island until we have more of an understanding of whats happening.”

“Are you kidding, I'm just exploring. Don't get all grumpy Tenzin on me” Korra joked, turning around to Tenzin following her. Smiling wickedly as she got a cheeky idea.

“Korra, please. You'll frighten them”

“Im the Avatar, they'll adore em. guruntee it” Korra said as Tenzin did not think that for a second. “And since your probably gonna follow me, ive got to stop you. Get ready” Korra said to the tiny Tenzin. Then to his surprise he saw a big ball of spit coming for him. Acting quickly he dodged it as it hit the ground. But Korra was planning for this, She bended it slightly, making it attack Tenzin and hold his body. Then with utter skill she froze it on him. Holding him there as he struggled, head still exposed.

“Wow, Im a giant and i can Bend. Talk about a win win” Korra said happy “And Tenzin don't worry, that will Thaw out in a couple of hours. But Until then I'm gonna have fun. Ill be back later” And with that Korra left. Ignoring the protests from Tenzin behind her.

She got to the edge of her island and spotted her Polar Bear Dog Naga. Getting down on one knee she petted it “Im sorry girl, looks like your out of the business. For today at least. Rest up, okay”

Naga did just that as Korra stood back up. “Hm... i wonder” Korra said getting an idea. Lifting her foot up high she slammed it down onto the earth, shuttering the ground and grass under it. But that wasn't her intention. her intention was to make a walking path all the way from the island to the mainland. And it worked! No only is it a path, but the ground was big enough for her to stand on easily.

This confirmed her theory. her bending is more powerful too, just like her! She wouldn't be able to make a bridge like that unless she was in the Avatar State. Smiling happily she started walking over, ready to be the big girl in the city.
 For the people at the shore line, to say they were surprised would be an understatement. Seeing the Avatar not only make an earth bridge across the water but also be giant sent some people into shock. Most people ran from her as soon as they saw she was coming, while some stayed. Knowing that the Avatar wouldn't hurt them intentionally.

Korra got closer and closer and saw the tiny people. All of them staring at her in shock. She saw the buildings around her as well and although she wasn't taller then the tallest ones, she was bigger then most of them. Stepping off the dirt in her bedtime underwear she stepped onto the street and smiled

This was gonna be good.

Asami rolled over in bed, she doesn't know what Korra wants but frankly she doesn't have time for it. She looks over the window, assuming Korra was on the ground tossing rocks up at it. But it wasn't rocks... it was Korra. Korra’s huge face. Korra’s giant face!

Asami sat up, and rubbed her eyes. Complete disbelief. That was Korra! her giant brown finger banging onto the window.

Bang!. And just like that Korra broke the glass to the window, stopping herself looking down. “Oops, i swear ill get that replaced. You know once i figure out how to Glassbend or something.”
 Asami got out of bed, still in her crimson pyjamas walked up to the window. Korra pulled her hand away letting Asami not only see her giant face but also her giant body crouching down.

“Korra! Why are you so big!” Asami said, looking down.

“Don't know really. Its so cool though! Im huge!” Korra said smiling

“This has to do something with the Tree of Time. Like back then, you turned big didn't you. But that was more of a spiritual Totem then anything else. Maybe some left over spirit energy never left and did this to you. Maybe-”

Asami was cut off, feeling Korra’s strong hands grip her. She gets pulled right through the window and up to Korra’s face, who was now standing loud and proud. She held Asami right in her palm. So this was what it felt like to hold a tiny person. Cool.

“Korra, put me down. I could fall” Asami said scared.

“Wow your just like Tenzin.” Korra cut her off again, feeling like she has the height allowed to do that. “Ill figure out how to go back down. Let me just have fun at this size okay.”

Asami wanted to try to convince her. But hey, how bad could just letting Korra have fun be. “(Sigh) Fine, can you put me down at least”

Korra did put her down. Right onto her shoulder. Asami not feeling safe grabbed Korra’s black hair.

“Hold tight Asami, were going back into the city” Korra said taking a step, only to feel something under her foot. She lifted it and saw Asami’s satomobile squished right under the sole. “Oh.... Thats not working again”

“Korra, please tell me you didn't just-”

“I can replace that too!.” Korra said to her friend. “Although since i don't get paid for saving the world. I guess i cant really”

“Don't worry about it. But this does raise a good point. if you do go have fun in the city at least look where your going, try not to cause damage and try to hold back”

"But Robin, don't you trust me?" She questioned him curiously, surely her size couldn't be that much of a detriment right?
1343311112.title: The Hive Five are causing trouble in the city.

choices: They go to jail and the titans go back with Giant Starfire
13433111121.content:
Robin looked up at Starfire a little bit intimidated by her size but knows that Starfire is the most caring of the team, and he couldn't bring himself to say no. He looked up at her. "Alright, Starfire, but be very careful alright?"

Starfire smiled and quickly grabbed Robin and hugged him against her chest. "Oh thank you Robin, I knew you'd always trust me."

"Star!" Robin said blushing as he's being hugged between her giant breasts, and turning blue from the lack of oxygen. "Your crushing me."

"Oh sorry!" Starfire giggled as she pulled Robin out and held him on the palm of her hand.

(-)-(-)-

In downtown Jump City the High Five were wreaking havoc in the area, Jinx creating all sorts of bad luck as she's taking some clothes from a mall, Gizmo launching missiles at police cars sending them running and Mammoth smashing through a bank carrying bags of money.

"Lets go before those butt munchers get here!" Gizmo yelled.

Jinx rolled her eyes at her smaller companion. "Fine let's-" She stopped midsentince.

"Jinx?" Mammoth looked at her confused.

"What are you gawking at?" Gizmo questioned.

BOOM!

The ground shook, Mammoth barely stood his ground as Jinx and Gizmo fell on their butts, and a huge shadow covered the trio.

They turned around and looked up and gawked with Jinx.

It's Starfire of the teen titans, only she was huge, and she held Robin and Cyborg in her hands. With Raven and Beastboy flying over her shoulders.


Star fire put Cyborg and Robin on the ground by her feet. "Hive Five! Surrender now!" Robin yelled.

For once the Hive Five actually considered surrendering, but like any criminals they stuck to their stubborn instincts.

"RUN!" Gizmo yelled as his jet back took him to fly through the city.

Jinx and Mammoth ran as well.

Starfire merely took a step forward, the weight of her foot made a minor tremor forcing Jinx and Mammoth to trip.

Starfire sees Gizmo and traps him in her giant fist, nothing of him is seen but his screaming and cursing can be heard from his prison.

She looks down to see Mammoth trying to get up next to her foot, she merely lifted up her foot and placed it on his back.

"Gah!" Mammoth yelled trying to get up but she was putting enough of her weight to keep him down.

Beastboy and Raven landed next to Robin.

"Dude! Do we even have to do anything."

Robin was surprised to how Starfire's just catching them without hurting them or the city. "Let's just make sure she doesn't damage anything."

Starfire sees Jinx running and bends over with her right arm outstretching and her finger pointing. Her mere finger tip landed on Jinx's back forcing her to the ground. "Oh not my day."

It was the easiest fight the Titans ever really had, Gizmo's trapped in Starfire's closed fist, Mammoth under Starfire's foot, and Jinx under Starfire's finger.

What happens next?
13433111121.title: Starfire the true Titan! Go!

134331111212.content:
The trio of villains were taken to prison the titans went back to the tower.

Starfire was floating slightly above the island of Titans Tower, the normal size titans were on the roof as Raven explained what spell Starfire used.

"This is the book you touched right?" Raven asked holding it up.

Starfire looks at the tiny book in her hand. "Mhm"

"If it is you must have read this spell." She opened the book and pointed at a spell that read. 'Ezis Wrog'

"Uh, is that even english?" Beasboy asked looking at it.

"It's 'grow size' backwards. Right?" Robin asked.

"Right"

Cyborg cut in. "So can't you just shrink her back?"

"No" Raven stated. "The reverse for this spell is in the next volume."

"Oh wonderful." Starfire said looking happy but she was really upset on the inside, not too upset but she wanted to have fun being this size for a while longer, it was fun easily catching those villains and also she still didn't have her fun with Robin.

"But I don't have it, and these books are really rare." Raven said to the giant starfire. "Sorry Starfire it's going to be a while before I can find the spell turn you back to normal."

"It is the okay, I understand." Starfire said sounding sad but on the inside she was giggling like crazy, she'll have some more time being the Titanic Titan to have more fun.
134331111212.title: Spell Dilemma

1343311112121.content:
"Alright Raven keep looking to see if you can find that book." Robin ordered, Raven nodded and left to her room. "Cyborg see if you can find a way to shrink her."

"Shrinking aint exactly my field but I'll try." He said leaving for his room.

"Hey Cy wait I'll help!" Beastboy chased after Cyborg.

"Heck no! I remembered the last time you 'helped'!' The duo left making Robin sigh.

He looked up at the giant Starfire. "Alright Star, we'll have to find a place where you can sleep."

Starfire looked down at her feet planted in front of Titan's tower on the now tiny island. He was right she can't sleep here, there's barely any room for her to sit with the tower next to her. "That is a good point Robin. So where do I go?"

"Somewhere outside the city, not close enough to cause a panic but far enough so you won't destroy any buildings."

Starfire felt saddened by this. "Very well." She started floating.

Robin saw that she seemed sad. "Starfire what's wrong?"

"It's nothing Robin, I only wish I didn't have to stay so far from my friends." Starfire gloomed but then an idea popped in her head. "Oh I know could you come with me?" She put her hands on the tower's roof, her face so close to Robin her nose pushed Robin on his behind.

Robin didn't expect this. "I uh" He looks up at Starfire's giant sad face, he couldn't say no if she was normal sized how can he say no now? "Ok Star I'll go with you." She smiled. "But only until we- gah!"

Starfire grabbed Robin and helf him against her face giggling like a school girl. "Thank you so much Robin!"

"No problem!" Robin yelled as he was being rubbed against Starfire's right cheek.

Starfire flew holding Robin in her palm, she descended on a wastland with nothing but grass and trees with no one in site.

She sat down and held Robin up to her chest level, she looked down at her cute little leader, she's wanted to do nothing but have fun with him since she grown. "Robin, can you do something for me?"

"What is it Star?"

"Well I'd like-"
1343311112121.title: Starfire has fun with Robin

1343312.content: How about Raven or Terra?
1343312.title: Raven or Terra

13433123.title: Jinx or Black Fire?

choices: Enslave the humans till the Titans get here.
Kill the humans till the Titans get here.
Forget the humans for now, the titans must be defeated.
134331232.content:
Black Fire made it back to earth she staring at Jump City down from the clouds undetected by the titans. "Well sister dear, I did say I won't forget this." She said looking at the T Tower in the ocean past the city. She pulled up a purple crystal. "The Giga Crystal, legend has it that it that whoever crushes it will have power to rival the gods."

Black Fire crushes the crystal turning into a purple powder that surrounds her. "Damn it don't any different. Oh wait ohh" She started expanding.

Her feet fell from the clouds and landed on the ground growing into the size of busses.

Black Fire looked around she was around 60 ft tall. Everything looked toy size.

"Hehehe Ha Ha Ha!" Black Fire rose one foot and stomped it down in causing an earthquake with her enormous size combined with her super strength. "Listen earthlings I am now your new Goddess! And to prove it I will make the titans my prisonors! Hahahaha!" And she'll make Star Fire her slave, the little bitch needs to pay for kicking her out of her planet HER throne. She'll pay it back with this planet, after she takes care of the titans she'll turn the Titans tower into her new throne while her sister rubs her feet and that cute boy Robin will be her love slave.

She chuckles thinking of the idea of Star's boyfriend as her plaything.

Her eyes glowed purple looking down at the humans scurrying around like bugs. Perhaps she'll play with the humans here waiting for them either kill them or enslave them.

What will she do?
134331232.title: Black Fire returns as a bigger sister

134332.content: I have the poweeer to grow?
134332.title: He-Man And the Masters of the Universe?

1343322211.content:
https://statici.behindthevoiceactors.com...

Mordred and his mother Morgan Le Fey walked inside an ancient crypt. Mordred was bored so his attention was focused on his GameBoy.

"How much further, mother? My feet hurt..." The eternally youthful blond Mordred complained brattishly.

Morgan sighed, her son could be such a bother sometimes...no matter, he would soon learn some respect once they had the Amulet of Kings.

They came upon a coffin that held the deceased King who was buried with the Amulet. Morgan wasted no time blasting it open.

Mordred rushed forward and yanked the amulet off the skeleton within's neck, caring not that the head clattered to the floor...after all..he was no stranger to brutality.

The Amulet began to glow with energy...His powers grew to impossible heights, in an instant the Justice League and all adult authority were erased from existence.

Mordred also was imbued with the knowledge that his precious mother had plotted to betray him once she got her hands on this trinket.

“Mordred...what did you do?” Morgan demanded of her son, who merely smirked and said in a pompous tone: “I have no need for costumed heroes who would oppose my rule! Adults are not welcome in my world! However, do not fret mother...despite your treachery I still care for you...and only you I would suffice to say...so you will be spared...however you may not enjoy the conditions.”

With a mere snap of his fingers, Morgan began to dwindle and undergo an extremely painful transformation as her body twisted and was reshaped.

She became a golden ring, her spirit trapped within...and her son towering above looking quite accomplished.

Reaching down a colossal, slender hand..he brought her up to his mirth filled eyes. “You still retain all your senses while your being is trapped within this shape. You did at one point hold my best interests at heart...so I shall keep you close...but...you are not to go on my finger...this is a punishment after all.” Mordred chuckled darkly.

Morgan banged her fists against the glass of the ring to no effect as her magic was currently suppressed by her son, yelling faintly to release her from this prison.

Amused by her attempts at resistance, he placed the ring in his pocket or rather...was about to, “As a matter of fact, I think I have the perfect spot for you.” He decided as he took a seat on his throne and made the ring float in the air as he then raised up his leg and started to pull his shoe off of his right foot.

Morgan began to bang on the glass faster in realization of what he was planning to do, grew weary and nervous of what he was doing.

“I think perhaps instead of a regular ring, you'll make for a perfect toe ring mother.” Mordred taunted her as he pulled off the purple shoe as he wiggled his freed toes in relief, and also to tease his mother.

Morgan clutched her nose and throat, it was a burning acidic stench...he was right...her senses DID work in this strange void of a ring-dimension. Mordred chuckled darkly as he used his magic to slowly float her down to his third toe on his newly unleashed foot.

“I must say I’m quite impressed...I’ve worked up quite an aroma from our travels, so try to appreciate it dearest mother.” He leered at the ring wickedly as he felt it slip onto his toe...Morgan felt and smelled everything...the sticky sweat...the awful stench...a truly kingly smell befitting one so powerful.


He slipped his purple shoe back on without a second thought, the cool golden ring felt good on his toe. “Ohoho...this is where the fun truly begins!” Spreading his arms out, a wickedly dark magic force spread throughout the building….and it transformed into a gigantic gothic looking castle.

“Hmm...I perhaps made it too big.” Mordred said thoughtfully as he looked at his giant surroundings...he was a mere speck on a throne thousands of times too big for him.

He suddenly gained a sly grin, “This is easily fixed.” He instantly began to shoot up in height until he was perfectly comfortable and fitting his purple clad rump in the seat.

Luckily for Morgan...or unluckily….the ring grew with her...but her spirit within remained the same size...making the stench and sweat even worse.

The complete and utter situation she found herself in...began to psychologically break her. She was a prisoner for eternity of a monster she had created and nurtured throughout millenia.

In time...her mind would finally give in and she would see her son as the god he truly was….completely broken and subservient.

“Now that's done, I think I'll take a lay of my lands.” He said, getting an idea to look at the adult-less world that is now his.

He got up to his feet and flexing his toes inside the shoe feeling the ring as Mordred chuckled and walked out across the throne room and through the large doors to see the sight of the outside world.
1343322211.title: Mordred (Justice League)

13433222111.content:
The city was practically in chaos as the sudden disappearance of adults caused numerous crashes and explosions from cars and planes crashing.

The sight made the boy laugh in amusement at the destruction that was being caused by the lack of adults in the world, what fun this is for him!

He walked down the road from his castle that he had made, the ground shook from his footsteps, the pavement cracked as a car was crushed underneath his foot easily as smiled smugly at the city that was now his, and nobody could stop him from his rule.

“Whoa...who’s that?” One of the young teenage girls said as she looked up from her phone at the blond giant. People looked out their windows, juvenile delinquents who were smoking on rooftops that merely came up to Mordred’s waist were now looking up.

Most of them had been shocked that all the adults in the world suddenly vanished, even moreso when a gigantic castle appeared...but given that most of the kids were...well...kids….they thought it was pretty awesome...despite the chaos in the city right now.

Standing in the center of it all, Mordred cleared his throat and declared himself: “Greetings my people! I am the reason all the adults have vanished from the planet! I am your new king...Mordred! No adult shall EVER interrupt our fun ever again!” Mordred declared with his booming voice.

The kids below talked among themselves before cheering his name: “King Mordred!”

He grinned smugly and drank it all in, his ego swelling to even greater heights. “We shall have a celebration! Do what you please!” Mordred boomed as with a mere wave of his hand, an extremely long and spacious table that one one end was big enough for Mordred (whom sat in an ornate chair at the head of the table) and on one end was the right size with enough chairs to accommodate every child and teen in the city.

Mordred sat down in his gargantuan seat and nodded, “Feast to your heart's content! We are free!” He tore off a turkey leg and began chowing down.

It was then that the kids started to get in to the fact that they were being ruled by Mordred as they started to dig in to their meals and talked amongst themselves about these events.

“You know, I might just get use to this whole no adults thing.” One of them mused with a smirk on his face, no rules or anything is the best that could ever happen.

“Yeah but on the other hand, what about all those crashes and stuff?” Another one retorted at him, he was scared half to death when he dodged a bus that sailed into a department store and blew up.

“He does have a point, and what about the things that need adults to maintain?” A girl questioned the delinquent as he waved off her concerns.

“Ah who cares? King Mordred will take care of it I'm sure of it.” He said in defense of how will they address these newfound problems.

“Correct, I will.” Mordred boomed down at the tiny kids. He looked at the dark raven haired young boy and raised an eyebrow, “Hold on a moment...don’t I know you?”

“Billy Batson...I’m uh...Captain Marvel..we had a few run ins in the past...but the Justice League never would accept me as a member so I kinda went my own way.” Billy said sheepishly.

Mordred scoffed, “Perhaps you are not such a goody two-shoes after all. I like that you’ve seen the light, as it were.” Mordred smirked as he reached down suddenly and plucked Billy up.

“H-hey! What are you-!?” Billy yelled as he wriggled around.

“Oh calm down, I am not going to harm you..on the contrary...you will be my second in command….I’m going to grant you some of my power...you will control size..both of yourself and others. You’d like that wouldn’t you?” Mordred smirked as he placed the boy down on the ground before his dining chair.

“Whoa, Billy! You GOTTA say yes!” One of the other kids said in awe.

Meanwhile, the girl who first noticed Mordred..felt her heart throb as she looked up at the impressive mountain of a boy king.

“Think about it, Batson...you’d be even more powerful than normal...you would be able to tower over everyone...do anything with them you wished...you could re-enact a scene from a kaiju film with no repercussions...I would see to that. I currently have my disobedient mother adorning one of my toes...as a ring.” Mordred bragged to his former foe.
13433222111.title: Continue 1

134332221111.content:
Billy went over the pros and cons of going along with this kid, on one hand, he did have the idea of investigating and seeing if he can stop Mordred on account of heroic obligation, but...on the other hand the idea of having fun being a giant and being powerful outside of being Shazam is very alluring, it was rather hard to decide to follow his inner delinquency or do the right thing.

“Well?” Mordred asked expectantly, wanting to do what his mother nagging him about hanging out with others, he raised his eyebrow in curiosity.

Billy then finally came upon a decision, 'Eh, I'll get to stopping him later.’ He thought to himself, satisfying both of his needs and wants as he nods in agreement to Mordred's terms.

“Sure I'll agree to having some of that power.” Billy agreed with a mischievous smirk on his face.

“Excellent, I thought you might.” Mordred smirked and pointed a finger at Billy. It glowed with purple energy which flowed into Billy’s body painlessly and left a dull tingling sensation on his skin.
Suddenly Billy started to feel it...he was getting bigger! Mordred rested his cheek against his fist and grinned smugly as Billy grew before him with an excited childlike look on his face. He could practically see all traces of ‘honorable hero’ evaporating within his eyes...he had his first taste of true power..and he was hooked.

When he was a height to match Mordred, the king snapped his fingers and a chair inscribed with a ‘B’ on it appeared next to his own. “Welcome your new second in command: Billy!” Mordred said with flair, cheers erupting from the kids at the table.

“Hehe, thanks for the intro…” Billy chuckled as he flopped down in his chair.

“It’s the least I could do...we are on the same side now after all.” Mordred said, for once addressing Billy as an equal...a friend.

Billy felt himself feeling less and less like he would ever betray this guy to do some lame hero junk.

Mordred was now his friend...and you don’t screw over friends!

“I never thought I’d say this...but...you’re pretty cool.” Billy said with a mouthful of triple jumbo cheeseburger...crudely spewing burger chunks and mustard from his mouth.

“I thank you Billy, it would serve well to have someone around my size to communicate with.” He told him honestly as he looked over the masses of kids assembled before him.

“Now I think after we finish our feast, we can have some fun causing some destruction to this city.” Mordred mused to himself as he looked over the buildings and stores.

“Yeah, but I thought all the adults were gone though?” Billy questioned him in curiosity, putting down the burger, he did want to show some courtesy to his benefactor after all.

“Ah that is true Billy the adults are gone.” Mordred agreed with a knowing smile on his face before elaborating seeing the confused look on his face.

“That isn't to say we can't make our own military might to fight and test our might against.” He told him with a grin of excitement on his face as Billy shared the same grin.

“Now I'm getting it, this is going to be fun, though it might be a bit hard to see with all this smoke.” He pointed out to him.

Mordred nodded in agreement, it'd be a pain to see the enemy if there is smoke clogging up the view, “Alright, done.” He said and snapped his fingers, and a wave of purple energy spread throughout the city to disperse the smoke from the various wreckage.

“Whoa...is there ANYTHING you can’t do?” Billy asked half joking...half serious. Mordred grinned smugly, “Nothing...I am all powerful.”
134332221111.title: Continue 1

1343322211111.content:
“You’re telling us! You’re amazing!” One of the kids declared, getting others to cheer in agreement. All this praise and acknowledgment was going to make Mordred’s ego grow bigger than even he himself currently was!

Soon the feast finished, and the table was replaced with rows upon rows of what appeared to be movie theater seats. Everyone was ‘magicked’ up a bucket of popcorn and large soda of their favorite type. “Now, let’s give them a show.” Billy smirked and cracked his knuckles.

Mordred nodded, glad to have someone of his size who he could have fun alongside.

Billy waved his hand, and on the horizon...a copy of the full might of the U.S. military appeared. Tanks were rolling down the ruined streets, snipers on rooftops, soldiers on foot, and of course fighter jets flying overhead in formation.

“Perhaps I should go barefoot...they should be honored to get to see my royal feet...and smell them...before I crush them into nothing!” Mordred bragged, getting applause and cheers from his ‘audience’.

Billy smirked cockily, “I ain’t changed my socks in a long time…”

“Ha! How typical, socks? I never wear such things!” Mordred scoffed...this was beginning to sound like a competition!

Leaning down, he whispered to his shoe that contained his ‘ring foot’. “You are in luck, dear mother...you will get some air...though I doubt the quality shall improve...since you are stuck on one of my enormous and quite smelly toes!” Mordred yanked off his purple shoes, unleashing his quite soft and cared for feet...that also emitted practical centuries of foot odor.

Billy had taken off his sneakers, and begun yanking off his crusty old socks. Mordred smirked, “You can’t compete with this smell!”

“Says you!” He retorted teasingly back at him as he then finally took off his socks with a light grunt and placed it next to his sneakers.

He wiggled his toes pleasantly as he felt the cold pavement beneath his bare soles as Billy smiled at the feeling, “This feels pretty cool with the earth beneath my feet.” He said.

Mordred chuckled in amusement at the statement as he sniffed the air and smirked at the smell coming from Billy's feet.

“You call that a smell? It smells like you barely dirty them!” Mordred taunted him as he raised his leg at him and wiggled his toes at him, wafting the odor into Billy's face, making him huff in annoyance at the challenge.

“I don't know about what you do in the old days but with these socks my smell outdoes yours.” He boasted back with a teasing smile on his face.

“We'll see, there's a bit of a nice group of subjects to test our smell on aren't there?” Mordred told him pointing to the military that was coming to attack them, “You got a point, I'll show you that my feet smell the worst.” Billy said not backing down from the challenge.

They then walked towards the group of infantryman that were firing at them ineffectually, their bullets not even piercing their skin.

“Such a weak military.” Mordred mused with a smirk as he stepped on a few with his foot, crushing them under his bare foot.

Billy, not to be outdone, raised his foot above a tank and flexed his toes. He slowly eased his foot down upon the war machine and began applying pressure. “Heh, I feel like Godzilla...awesome.” Billy chuckled as the tank began to buckle with more weight applied.

“Hmph, we are bigger than that lizard.” Mordred scoffed haughtily as he wiggled his toes at some of the soldiers...who clutched their throats and began keeling over..much to the bratty king’s amusement. “Pathetic! Do you see how futile your efforts are, insects? You cannot handle MY foot smell!” He declared proudly.

Billy pouted and grabbed a passing helicopter, sneering in at the passengers as the sniper shot at him...bullets bouncing off of his face. “Stupid bugs.” He opened his mouth and quite literally took a bite out of the front of the chopper...taking the pilot and half the vehicle.

“You’re STILL hungry?” Mordred asked with a raised eyebrow.

Billy swallowed the metal and the pilot, letting out a crude belch. “Nah, but giants eat people...so…” He waved the chomped in half vehicle along with the terrified sniper at Mordred..offering the former villain the rest.


The giant king stroked his chin thoughtfully, that is what giant monsters do don't they? And the metal and blades on this vehicle won't damage his throat thanks to his new powers so might as well.

“Very well I'll try out this idea of yours.” Mordred said agreeing.

Billy nodded, grinning as he tossed the bitten helicopter to Mordred who angled his mouth to catch it with his teeth, as he bit down on the wreckage and started to eat the thing, swallowing it without any complaint.
1343322211111.title: Continue 1

13433222111111.content:
“My that was a bit exciting to do.” He said with a smile on his face, enjoying the sensation of power over these constructs, even if they weren't real, they were the real deal in any other sort of word.

Then several missiles fired on his back getting his attention as he turned around and smirked darkly at the jets that were flying over head, his eyes glowed yellow and fired destructive eye beams that cut clean through the Jets, making them explode in a display of smoke and fire.

“Wow that was so cool!” Billy complimented him as Mordred was soaking in the attention that his friend was giving him, “Yes it was wasn't it?” He asked him with a wry smile.

“Yeah, sucks though that I can't do all that stuff while I'm a kid.” Billy said, slightly disappointed by the conditions.

“What do you mean?” Mordred questioned him with a raised eyebrow, this boy was capable of magic or know of it at the very least? He didn't seem very unfamiliar with his abilities he reasoned.

“I have to transform into my adult form...it’s kind of a downer.” Billy sighed. Mordred smirked, “Not anymore you don’t.”

Billy looked confused at the boy king, Mordred merely gestured to him in response as if to say: ‘Try it out.’

Billy looked up at the sky, took a deep breath and said: “SHAZAM!” A golden lightning bolt was called down from the heavens, striking him and enveloping him in an aura of gold...before vanishing.

Batson looked down at himself..he couldn’t believe it! He was still...himself! But the power coursing through him was as if he had transformed into the hero form!

“Whoa….this is...awesome!” Billy thundered and tossed a lightning bolt at a building..which crumbled into nothingness upon impact.

Mordred chuckled, “I didn’t give you a share of the power for nothing, Billy.”

“Yeah...thanks, man. Now let’s get to that foot stink contest! Right guys?” Billy said over his shoulder to their audience...getting an eruption of cheers.

With themselves being reinvigorated from the crowd of kids cheering them on to cause more destruction, they set out to deal out more damage.

Tanks rolled down the street as they took aim and fired their tank shell munitions at them as it exploded across their bodies, though to little effect, making Billy chuckle in amusement at their attempts at hurting them.

“After you, I want to see more of your abilities.” Mordred allowed him to make the first move as Billy smirked and took a leap into the air and aimed his feet at the group of tanks that were starting to roll back from him.

But it was too slow for them considering the speeds he was approaching at them, they could only see the bare soles of his feet coming at them as they got decimated by the force of his landing, creating a crater in the process.

A lone tank was at the back and therefore not as harmed when it tried to flee away from the rampage before the vehicle was caught by Billy holding it in place with his toes, “And where are you going?” He asked them hauntingly as the smell started to waft into the cockpit of the vehicle, the operators inside cough and choked at the smell as it went inside.

Mordred nodded in approval, “Your king thinks you have what it takes…”

Billy looked up and raised an eyebrow in confusion, “Huh? To do what?”

Mordred snickered, “Eventually gain as much foot smell power as your king!” He roared with childish laughter as Billy pouted and gouged a hole in the tank with his toenail..allowing more of his foot fumes to siphon in and slowly suffocate the people within.

“Ha! My foot stink killed them! Top that!” Billy said smugly.

Mordred scoffed haughtily, “That is nothing! My foot odor is so much that it is considered a POISON!” Grabbing a duo of snipers from a nearby roof, Mordred sat his rump down and spread his toes.

They screamed and struggled in his grip but was unable to break out of the impossible hold over them, he then inserted them in between his toes, his size was big enough that they could fit inside the crevice with room to spare.

The snipers that were placed there started to cry out in horror of the rancid odor that pervaded their senses as the smell went into their nose and practically burned their lungs out from the inside as a matter of fact.

After a waiting of about a few minutes, Mordred could feel their movements slow down and then finally stop as he looked to see that they were twitching from the sensory overload, though they don't seem to be moving other than that.

With that in mind, he smiled teasingly at Billy who looked impressed by the rather unorthodox method of execution, “You were saying something about needing socks again?” He asked him in a teasing tone.

“Uh...forget it.” Billy said sheepishly, causing Mordred to grin smugly. “Indeed…let’s continue to show this so called ‘military’ who’s boss.” Mordred stood up and promptly kicked a tank over, plopping his foot on the underside that was now facing upward.

Gouging a hole in it just like Billy had done, he merely rested his toes over the newly made hole...enjoying the screams and gagging that came from within.

He smirked down at his mother who adorned his toe on his right foot, “Enjoying yourself, Mother? I do hope you’ll learn to appreciate me...and my royal feet.”

“Whoa she’s still conscious and able to smell and stuff? That’s so mean!” Billy laughed.

“Indeed, but I wouldn't call it necessarily mean, its just to make her know her place, but alas, her will is rather hard to break, its only a matter of time before she cease her resistance.” Mordred said haughtily, flexing his toes idly, causing the vehicle to creak from the pressure.
13433222111111.title: Continue 1

134332221111111.content:
“So based on what I think I understand, you're older than you look.” Billy noted curiously, “Of course, the joys of eternal youth and eternal life as they say.” Mordred said amusedly as he walked off to cause some more terror among the military they created.

“Well that's food for thought, I do like to be a kid forever though.” Billy said with a chuckle as he joined him in turn in destroying the army.

A group of armed forces were hauled up in a courtyard area as they began to try to fortify their positions to stand a better chance against them, not that it would help but it's the thought that counts.

A girl around fifteen in appearance, but in truth was far older than that, suddenly emerged from the shadows of the church. A soldier spotted her, and approached.

“You shouldn't be here...its dangerous.” He said sternly. The tough looking girl smirked and blew her long dark hair out of her eyes.

“Maybe for you…” She snarked, eyes starting to glow a wicked looking red.
As Mordred was stomping around, he heard screams and gunfire..but strangely enough it wasn’t aimed at Billy or himself. Turning a corner he saw a birdcage of sorts containing scared looking soldiers of varying rank. “Psst...down here.” A female voice said, Mordred looked down and felt his heart throb at the sight of a very attractive goth girl.

His mouth went dry, this had never happened to him before...mostly because he was always around his own mother...and his mother only. This thought made him clench his toes around the ring, smearing sweat into his mother’s form.

“Uh...h-hello…” Mordred said, a far cry from the confident and cocky boy he usually was.

“So….I found these dorks plotting something and hiding like wimps...I figured I’d give you a gift since you’re the new king. Besides, I needed an excuse to get to meet you so we can talk.” She had her hand on her hip, looking confident.

Billy peeked around the corner and saw the scene, getting the idea of things right away...he decided to just go off somewhere else and leave them to it...quietly hoping he’d get his own hot babe soon.


Twirling a lock of her hair between her fingers she suddenly became rather nervous. This boy was many times bigger than her, and she didn’t want to risk angering him or something. So she just came out and said it.

Mordred at that moment was reminded of a few films he’d seen, and the words came out of both parties mouths before they knew it:

“Would you go out with me?” They said together.

It was a bit of a awkward moment between them, “Sure..if you want to.” Mordred said to her a bit shyly, here he was getting all flustered by someone that barely reached the height of his toes, it was a new experience to say the least.

“Um..I'd love to! But uh, where will we go?” She asked him, he rattled his rather ancient mind in what place could he take this girl for a date, before he blurted out, “How about Camelot?” He suggested, before the girl giggled at the answer.

“You do know that Camelot doesn't exist in this period right? But...we could try Britain.” She said with a nervous smile on her face, unsure if that would help him.

Fortunately it did, “Why yes! Great Britain, silly me, confusing Camelot for Great Britain...so when do you wish to go?” He inquired from her.

“How about in a few hours? You can control the time of day right?” She wondered as he nodded in understanding, “Of course I can, I am all powerful after all.” He said to her.

“Great! I'll see you later then.” She told him as she was about to turn and walk away when Mordred softly said, “Wait!” She turned around back to him with a raised eyebrow with curiosity.

“I must know your name fair maiden, I haven't caught it before.” He implored her to do so.

“Oh right I forgot...I'm Siren, at least that's what my friends call me.” She told him politely.

“Well I must say, your name fits perfectly.” Mordred said before he blushed in embarrassment from the rather cliche line.

Hmm, maybe Billy might have some tips for him.

Mordred walked back to his castle, picking up his purple shoes and placing them back on his feet, his mind too preoccupied to hear the distant screaming from the ring dimension. The kids had apparently started to mull around a bit after the show had started to quiet down.

He looked around for Billy and couldn’t see him, he spotted a young boy eating some of the sweet desserts still left out. “Where did Batson go?” He inquired to the boy.

The kid nodded and pointed to the castle, “He went to the castle, your majesty!” He said politely.

Mordred nodded his thanks, feeling his ego inflate more at the way he was addressed by even average kids.

Opening the front doors, he entered in to see Billy seated on a throne next to his own, he’d placed his sneakers and socks back on...wouldn’t want to spoil his foot odor when not in use.

“Oh, you’re back...so how did it go?” Billy asked with a sly grin.

“I...I think it went well...we’ve arranged to go to Britain on a….date.” Mordred explained shyly as he sat in his own throne next to Billy.

“Ooooh..look at youuu…” Billy teased.


“Sigh….what do I do? I’ve seen a few films and read some books but...I doubt that will be of much use.” Mordred sighed.

“Relax, I’ll help you out.” Billy patted his king and friend on the shoulder.

“You will? You are a fine friend Billy.” Mordred praised him as Billy smiled at the compliment.

“Thanks, now lets see if I can help with your financing.” He declared as he indicated to Mordred to take a seat on the ground as he did the same sitting cross legged.

“Alright, let's start with bringing up things you like so we can see if the girl likes your interests.” Billy started off as he nods in agreement and started to list things off.

“Let's see…I enjoy playing video games like you mortals do, I like ruling over collective mass of subjects, destroying my enemies and torturing those I don't like with my foot odor, having supreme powers over the universe a-” He said about to continue before Billy interjected.

“Okay I think I got the gist of it, I don't think popping a boner on your first date is the proper way to go if she is nervous and stuff.” He told him.

“So what you want me to do lie? A true king doesn't lie to his subjects, it'd make Siren think I'm not being honest.” He retorted back at him slightly indignant of the notion.

“Fine we can think of another thing, maybe she digs those of the intellectual kind.” Billy mused on what could work.

“Well I am rather knowledgeable on all sorts of magic, so maybe we can discuss our magic capabilities?” He wondered in curiosity.

“Yeah that can work find some common ground, if it all comes to worse, just be yourself, that always work.” He reminded him to do.

“Alright….what shall I wear?” Mordred said thoughtfully.

“You’re fine as is.” A voice said, causing Mordred to look up at Billy, who appeared just as confused.

Suddenly skipping into view before the two young colossi was the tiny form of Siren. “Hiiiii.” She said with a wave.

“O-Oh….w-when did you-...” Mordred appeared flustered, “How long have you been here?” Mordred’s face flushed.

“Hmmm...since you started talking with each other.” She grinned, meaning she heard him list off his interests...as well as Billy’s crack about him popping a boner.

Mordred hid his scarlet face as Billy smirked before Siren spoke up:
“You shouldn’t worry about trying to impress me so much, your majesty. I think you’re really awesome...cute too. I love a big powerful guy...especially one who’s got feet like yours.” She winked, which caused Mordred to perk up and uncover his face, both boys were in awe.

“W-wait...really?” Mordred and Billy said at the same time.

“You seem a lot bigger up close like this.” Siren giggled.

He blushed nervously at the statement, he was not use to this feeling, but perhaps in time he will get use to it, “Well, I am pretty huge, I could grow you if you want.” He proposed to her as she giggled a bit at the idea but shook her head.

“Hmm, no thanks, at least, not for the moment, I kinda like this perspective.” She said honestly as Billy then asked her a question.

“Not to sound rude or anything, but I thought you were getting ready for the date?” He asked her as she nodded in understanding.

“Oh I was, just wanted to check in and see how our majesty is doing with getting ready for the date, what with the military disappearing and all that.” She said in a teasing tone.
134332221111111.title: Continue 1

1343322211111111.content:
“Oh, well, after I found no more entertainment from them they disperse into nothing, they aren't real after all.” Mordred explained to her.

“Well, I'll go get ready then..see you back here your highness?” Siren said, blowing Mordred a kiss as she left.

Mordred sat there stunned before Billy nudged him. “Hear that? You're her type! Feet and all!” Billy laughed

Mordred felt his nerves easing and he slipped back into pompous brat mode: “Of course! I am quite a catch after all...though I believe you mortals refer to that she is as a foot fetishist. I am quite fortunate to have a bride and queen who appreciates my royal feet.”

“I can imagine, so what are you going to do with her when you get there?” Billy asked leaning forward a bit with a sly smile on his face, Mordred blushed and shuffled back a bit to get some space as he responded back.

“What else is there to do? We're simply going to dine in the finest restaurants and gaze at the famous landmarks.” He told him folding his arms indignantly.

“Sure you will.” He said chuckling as he started to get up and stretch his arms, making his way out through the doors.

“Where are you going off to now Batson?” Mordred questioned him as he replied to his inquiry.

“Gonna go check out the orphanage, see if there's anyone there and meet up with some friends.” He informed him as he left, closing the doors, Mordred scoffed as he got up from the floor.

“Bah, what would he know, it's just a simple date after all, I'm a king and so making this date a grand experience for Siren should be easy.” He mused to himself, deciding to freshen himself up a bit for this occasion, it is common courtesy after all.

Meanwhile, Billy was concentrating on teleporting to his hometown of Fawcett City, PA. In an instant he found himself towering over the buildings..conveniently he appeared to even be in front of the orphanage.

“Huh...well that was easy.” Billy scratched his dark hair and leaned down to peek into the orphanage windows. Needless to say the place was deserted, save for one kid who was furiously texting on his phone as he sat on his bed with a pair of crutches leaning against the wall.

On cue, Billy felt his phone buzzing in the pocket of his red hoodie...and at that moment the boy inside the building looked up to see a colossal blue eye staring into his window. “WaaAAAah!” Freddy Freeman yelled and went to grab his crutches.

“Relax, Freddy! It’s me!” Billy said, trying to calm his best friend down. Freddy probably didn’t recognize his voice due to the sheer volume and his own terror. Billy sighed and plowed his fingers through the window...and of course the wall itself with no effort in order to scoop up his best buddy into his hand along with his crutches.

Opening up his palm he saw the panicky boy still screaming...until Billy finally said: “Dude, look at me. It’s Billy!”

Freddy stopped screaming and looked up into the familiar face….only a LOT bigger. “B-Billy? What the-.....you’re HUGE! Y-You’re a giant now?!”

“Yup! I didn't think it was possible myself, but I met this guy that grew me and sent away all the adults.” He told his friend.

“Huh? I didn't realize, all I noticed was that the people in charge of the place suddenly vanished and all the news and shows stopped suddenly.” Freddy explained to the giant.

“I...see, hopefully there was no problems.” Billy said in relief as he sat down in the middle of the street, getting himself comfortable.

“For the moment, what are we going to do to fix this?” He asked him only to see the hesitant look from Billy.

“Billy, are you going to let this just go on? A kids-only world is highly unworkable, not to mention the kids with parents are soon going to be miserable.” He pointed out to him.

After a few seconds, Billy awkwardly brought up, “You know Mordred could provide for everyone, how about a week or two tops to enjoy this?” He proposed as he saw Freddy look at him and sigh in resignation, this is going to take a while isn't it?

“Can he fix my legs? I'd like to see the point of this whole thing.” He said putting out his stipulations.

Billy frowned, “You know I can do that right? He gave me some of his power...I don’t need to transform anymore to be badass!” the giant declared.

Freddy raised an eyebrow, “Well...can you fix my-” Suddenly an aura of healing light enveloped little Freddie...he felt his leg beginning to gain feeling again...and soon he was able to stand up in Billy’s palm.

“Y-You….you healed me.” Freddy looked up into Billy’s blue eyes, and he began to have tears in his eyes as he hugged Billy’s cheek. “You’re the best friend I could ever have!! Thank you!!”

Billy blushed and patted Freddy’s head, “No biggie, little guy….all a days work in the job of a giant like me.”

=Meanwhile=

Mordred stepped out of the enormous bubble bath filled tub he’d manifested. He toweled off and with a snap of his fingers he was dry. He stood there in all his kingly nude glory and smirked down at his large bare feet. The appendages were encased in a magical barrier,ensuring they didn’t let the clean water touch them...in fact...the ring that was his mother still adorned his toe.

The barrier had an extra feature as well, it was as if he’d encased his feet in the presence of an electric heater. He grinned wickedly as he saw the sweat beads forming one after another on his feet...it was all for her of course...Siren.

He wanted his feet to truly blow her away...she loved them...he wanted to make sure she REALLY loved them..and him of course.

His mother’s suffering was a mere afterthought..though she truly was suffering.
With a snap of his fingers and a spray of fresh cologne, he was clad in a majestic purple suit and tie. His feet were encased within a pair of loafers..sockless of course, the barrier was dispersed now.

Summoning a mirror, he grinned as his reflection smugly. “Alright, I can do this...this isn’t so hard. ‘Just be yourself’.” He said to his reflection.

A tiny knocking was heard from the front entrance of the castle, it was time to get this thing started.

Walking briskly to the door, he opened it and saw before his feet stood Siren...she was even more breathtaking than before!

“So uh..how do I look?” She asked, clearly not used to dressing up so fancy.

“You look...amazing.” He said honestly, a slight blush on his face,while Siren giggled, she wore a black dress with a shorts and stockings with heels on, with her face touched up a tad bit with eyeshadow and the like.

“Thanks your majesty it means a lot to me.” She said grinning from the compliment given.

“Please, call me Mordred, I do not mind it Siren.” He gently implored her to do so, while it was great to be addressed like that by his subjects, it felt wrong to have her talk to him as if she was the same status as them, even if they were smaller than him.

“Hehe, alright Mordred, I'll do that just for you.” She said teasingly, watching his blush get deeper in tone as she giggled at his face.

He cleared his throat after a moment, trying to regain a handle on the situation, “Ahem, so as I was about to say, shall we be off?” He asked her as he got into one knee and placed his hand on the ground for her to step on.

“Of course, it'll be lots of fun, don't worry too much about it.” She reassured him as she got on to the hand, the surface making it a bit awkward for her to stay steady on these heels but she managed to stabilize herself.

Mordred gingerly lifted her up off the ground as he stood up fully as he then thought to a location in Britain, 'Now where to...ah of course, London!’ He thought in inspiration as he smiled knowingly.

“Hold onto my hand Siren, off we go.” He told her as with a simple mental thought, they blinked out of the area and near instantly transported themselves across the globe in seconds, in a moment, they are now in Europe in London.

Siren’s eyes widened, she’d been clutching on to Mordred’s finger for support, squeezing her eyes shut...until she opened them and gasped at the scene. It was beautiful...and it was clear that Mordred’s influence had spread to other countries as well..given how the streets were filled with children looting and such.

“It’s….amazing...and everyone looks so happy.” She said in awe. Mordred smirked. “So um...where did you want to go first?”

Siren smiled up at him, “I want to see how tall you are compared to Big Ben!” She giggled.

Mordred chuckled, “Alright, we can talk along the way.” He got an idea, and slowly lifted her up until he deposited her on his shoulder.

“I….I like being this close to your cute face.” She said as she snuggled up against his cheek. “My handsome king…”

“Your compliments are appreciated my fair maiden, so let us be on our way then?” He asked her smoothly though internally he was trying hard not to squee at the sensation of her cuddling against his cheek.

“Mhmm, you lead the way.” She said as she watched Mordred started to move forward towards Big Ben, the kids looking up at him as they muttered to themselves in awe and fascination about him and who was on his shoulder.

“Looks like some are staring.” Siren teased him with a light chuckle of amusement as he smirked at the bunch of kids staring at them.

“Let them do so, it is not like they can resist looking upon their king and soon to be queen.” He said trying to play it off as nothing, though he was mentally patting himself on the back.
1343322211111111.title: Continue 1

13433222111111111.content:
It wasn't long till they reached the place, the ground shook with his approach as the lack of guards or passerby made for an easy ticket to get a better look at the object.

“So this is Big Ben huh?” He mused as he came face to face with it, he was around 300ft tall, the structure was 15ft taller than he was, it wasn't a stark difference but it was slightly noticeable.

“Hmmm...I think you should show the people of London what BIG really means.” Siren chuckled and nuzzled his cheek. Mordred smirked devilishly, getting what she was implying. With a mere thought, he grew to 320 ft...he didn’t want to overdo it and lose his future queen after all.

“Hehe, so THIS is supposed to be some form of landmark? Bah!” With a swipe of his hand, he knocked the clocktower in half...sending the upper half crashing down onto the buildings below.

Siren was now having a laughing fit on his shoulder, Mordred smirked in accomplishment...she was enjoying herself after all! And for that matter he was too! He joined her laughter, making his way down the streets...the earth quaking beneath his feet.


Soon after, they came upon a romantic scene, a beautiful lake with kids going around in paddle boats...teenagers and the like on dates.

“So um...about your feet...you don’t mind me liking them?” Siren said shyly.

He looked at her in a warm manner as he sat down by the river side, placing Siren down next to him as gingerly as possible.

“I don't mind at all, none can resist my foot odor smell, though I don't mind of you like them and play with them.” He said to her honestly as he idly flexed his toes in his loafers.

“Really? This is great!” She said in praise of her new boyfriend as Mordred smiled at her, her enthusiasm is rather palpable for him, which isn't a bad thing.

“You know, I got them all nice and sweaty for you, do you want to see them?” He asked with a nervous blush on his face, unsure if that sounded right for his tastes.

Siren smiled widely and nodded, clearly enthusiastic. “Absolutely! I’d love it!”

Mordred grinned and reached down to his loafers, he wiggled his toes and chuckled as he felt how sticky and slick with sweat they were within the shoes. “You are in for a treat, my queen.” Mordred said with a lick of his lips.


Siren giggled and was bouncing up and down excitedly in her heels. His heels were exposed, and already the overwhelmingly powerful and pungent smell of his feet was starting to effect those around him. He pulled off the rest of the shoes with a grunt, followed by a sigh of extreme relief as his feet were now bare...wiggling his plump toes as they spread their funk into the atmosphere and caused those around and even in the paddleboats to flee.

But Siren didn’t flee, in fact she was standing right before his towering soles, taking deep inhales. “Your feet are so BIG and AMAZING! Just like you. Their smell is pure power manifested! You are the King of this entire PLANET!” She gushed.

Mordred blushed from the praise but she wasn't wrong per say, but it did feel good to be acknowledge in that regard, “Thank you for your kind words.” He said to her warmingly.
13433222111111111.title: Continue 1

134332221111111111.content:
He idly wiggled his toes, feeling the wind flowing through the crevices, the ring prison that held Morgan was getting battered by his aroma, making her wheeze at the smell that pervaded the area, though she was able to still see some of the things that he was able to do, perhaps he was doing a fine kingly duty.

“So then.” Siren began as she took a seat near his giant house sized foot and laid a comforting hand against it, making him shiver in delight of her touch, making his toes curl slightly, digging up the dirt.

“Tell me a bit about yourself.” She requested as Mordred gained a thoughtful look that was tinged by nervousness, though he was wanting to be honest with her, so start from the basics.

“Well, I was a heir to the kingdom of Camelot by birthright, but due to the nobles and king Lot deciding that a illegitimate child is better suited to the throne I was cast out with my mother, I knew I can lead but mother always says that I'm not ready, or that I don't have leadership skills, well how about now mother.” He explained glaring at the toe ring on his right foot.

“Well, have you thought that she's just worried about your personality needing to be tweaked to be better suited to ruling.” She suggested to him as he considered her words.

“Perhaps, but she should've trust me more, you've seen what I can do, I can be a great king and protect my subjects.” Mordred replied to her.

“Yeah, you are pretty great I'd say, and I wouldn't change you for anything.” Siren said giggling as Mordred smiled a little, “That's quite nice of you to say Siren, not many have said that to me for as long as I can remember.” He said to her in all honesty.

“Well you’ll be hearing it a LOT now...from everyone...including me! At least they’d BETTER praise you...or else!” She giggled, Mordred wiggled his toes on cue...knowing what she was getting at. Siren breathed in the heavily pungent aroma that was flung out at her, she sighed blissfully which made Mordred grin. “You really are one of a kind, aren’t you? Not many can withstand being so close to my feet...much less breathing it in and not dying.” Mordred stated.

“Well...since this is a date and all...we could play a bit.” Siren wiggled her eyebrows, Mordred flushed red as a tomato.

“W-what do you mean?” Mordred’s nervousness returning..thinking she was rushing things a bit with...that.

“I meaaan we can sort of..roleplay where I’m your puny queen worshiping your feet...it can be good practice for when we rule together and have fun!” Siren giggled.


“O-Oh! ….That sounds fun.” Mordred calmed down, embarrassed that his mind went to such dirty thoughts. Siren giggled, “Alright….prop em’ up! Show off those soles!” She said enthusiastically.

Mordred blushed from how forward she was with her enthusiasm, it was rather cute as a matter of fact, “As you wish my maiden.” He said to her, as he then did as she requested of her.

He raised up his feet and propped them up on his heels, showing the vast sweaty and odorous soles as he flexed his toes at the sight of her swooning at his feet.

“My king what mighty and large feet you have!” She yelled excitedly as Mordred found himself with a slightly haughty smile at how she was taking in their size, even if it was for Roleplay, he can appreciate such a thing for some fun with his queen.

He wiggled and flexed his toes as he wafted his foot odor into the air, that was sure to chase away any kid nearby that wasn't Siren, “As your king Siren, I demand you get to rub my feet.” He ordered her to do so.

She curtsied and replied “It would be an honor, your majesty!” She went up close to the soles and was in stunned awe for a moment.

Seeing this fed into the giant brat's egotistical enjoyment of this game. He wiggled his toes playfully. “Impressive aren't they? I am quite proud of this smell.” He said in a pompous voice.

“They're so much bigger than me.. than anyone!” She placed her hands upon the soft milky white soles…causing their titanic owner to shiver in delight.

“How are you finding my foot odor, little queen?” He asked.

“It's wonderful, and so ravishingly strong.” She praised him, Mordred smiled at this, as her stroking his ego was just as great as the genuine admiration and love for his feet.

“Well my fair maiden, there's more to come from in due time, these will be the biggest pair of feet you'll get to see.” He bragged as he wiggled his toes at her, making her laugh a little.

“Hehe, I can't wait to see how much more we can experience in your world, so shall we continue your rub my king?” Siren asked teasingly rubbing his sole making him shudder in pleasure from her touch.

“But of course...my queen.” He said to her, it was strange for him in all fairness, he never would had expected to find love and rule the world all in one day, and it was due to such fortunate circumstances that brought them together, perhaps...it will be alright after all with her by his side and that is all that matters in the end.
134332221111111111.title: Continue 1

1343322211111111111.content:
It was quite a while for the two lovebirds to be finished with them just sitting there, enjoying the sunset as it wasn't long before Siren felt her eyes getting heavy as she yawned tiredly as she leaned her head against the monstrously large foot as Mordred picked up on her tiredness.

"Ah, feeling fatigued are we?" He asked her gently as she nodded affirmatively as she said, "Yeah, this whole day was pretty fun and draining, having no adults, getting to have a god king for a Boyfriend, whats not to love? But even I must rest ya know?" Siren pointed out teasingly as Mordred chuckled.

"I thank you for the kind words, but I suppose I'll be taking you back to your home now, it is a fair thing to do." He mused as she giggled in amusement, "That would be lovely my king." She agreed as he carefully picked her up and homing in on her home from the energy trails she left behind to get there they dissappeared near instantly.

Over in America in her neighborhood, Mordred appeared on the streets in front of her home as his large bare feet crumpled the abandoned parked cars beneath them as he looked down and lifted his left foot in confusion, seeing flattened pieces of metal stuck to his sole as he groaned in irritation, shrinking himself down to 20ft tall, tall enough to stare into her window.

He looked into his hand to see her peacefully sleeping as he smiled warmly at her as he opened the window and placed her into her bed as careful as possible.

Mordred sighed in relief, that went quite well, perhaps he should rest as well for the night.
1343322211111111111.title: Continue 1

13433222111111111112.content:
Billy Batson had broken in to plenty of places before, he was a delinquent orphan...kind of came with the territory. However, LexCorp was an entirely different ball of wax to stealing beer from the corner store.

However, given that there were no security guards...it was a lot easier than you'd think. Of course there were still the drones and laser grids...but they didn't do anything to the now God of Magic. Billy was curious what kind of goodies the now absent Lex had tucked away.

"This place is creepy...." Billy admitted to himself as he wandered the eerie hallways. The sound of a videogame and cries of frustration met his ears from down the hall. "What the...okay so it's gotta be a kid...but what's a kid doing in here? Other than me of course." Billy thought as he approached the room.

Peeking around the corner, he saw a young boy with dark hair and wearing a leather jacket and a t-shirt with the immediately recognizable 'S' logo of Superman on it. He was sitting amidst piles of junkfood and old chip bags as well as empty soda cans stacked to the ceiling.

In his hands was a controller plugged in to the videogame console set in front of an enormous HD TV.

"Uhh...hi?" Billy said, stepping inside the room.

"Huh? Oh, sup...what are ya doing in here?" Superboy said rudely.

"Uhh...I just came in to explore the place...who are you supposed to be? SuperKid?" Billy asked.

SuperBoy's eye twitched in annoyance, "SuperBOY! Er....SuperMAN! Uh...Superboy I guess...since all the adults are gone and I guess I'm here. Ain't you that 'shablam' kid?"

"It's ShaZAM." Billy frowned. "Yeah yeah whatevs...Lexy-poo just up and vanished along with all his cronies...so I guess I'm on my own...nobody to tell me what to do or how I should act." SuperBoy chugged a coke and belched loudly.

"Huh...so you're a bad guy who works with Lex?" Billy asked curiously.

"Nah, more like a clone of Supes that he liked to boss around. But not anymore!" Superboy grinned widely and dove his hand into a bag of Doritos to grab a handful.

"So uh....you wanna join me and Mordred? We kinda are running things now...and you seem pretty cool and might get a kick out of being a giant god or whatever." Billy suggested.
13433222111111111112.title: Meeting Superboy

choices: Billy gives him the ability to grow.
No dice, looks like they need to go to Mordred.
134332221111111111121.content:
"Running things now? What the heck happened?" Superboy asked him curiously, it was strange too, he didn't see Lex or the scientists trying to come and detain him or something.

"Well actually Mordred took care of that, banished all the adults from this world, so now only kids I guess under 18 are left." Billy said musing as Superboy raised an eyebrow in curiosity.

"Giant god? Well you don't certainly look giant in any way." He pointed out with a chuckle as Billy pouted a bit, "Okay you have a point there but..." He trailed off as he grew in size quickly as the Kryptonian Clone balked in surprise, he stopped at 10ft tall when the ceiling was brushing his hair as he looked down with a smug look on his face.

"See?" Billy said to him, as Superboy snapped out of his amazement as he looked more excited at the prospect.

"Well you got my attention now, and what you're talking about sounds more fun than sitting in a lab playing games and eating from the snack machine anyways." He reasoned with a smile as Billy shrank back down to normal.

"Alright then, welcome aboard, I guess since I was empowered by him I think I can do the same to you?" He wondered as Superboy hummed in thought, looking off to the side for a moment before looking back to Billy with a hopeful look.

"Wouldn't hurt to try." He said to him as Billy nodded and concentrated on Superboy to see if he can do the same.
134332221111111111121.title: SuperBoy is Intrigued

1343322211111111111211.content:
Superboy's body suddenly began tingling and just like that, he started to increase in height. "Whoa-hey! It's working!" He cheered before his head hit the ceiling with a clunk.

"Ow! Hey...it ain't stopping! ...Not that I'm complaining!" Superboy snickered as Billy smiled in accomplishment...looks like they've got a new recruit.

The ceiling cracked as Superboy continued to grow, "Hey uh...you might wanna stop..." Billy advised as he dodged a falling chunk of ceiling.

"It ain't like I'm doing it on purpose! ...How do I stop any-OW!-way?" Superboy's head got hit by another chunk of the building as he soon was bursting through the top of the LexCorp tower.

Billy had the foresight to teleport outside as the building collapsed around the colossal clone. "Whoa...I'm huge! BADASS!" Superboy bellowed enthusiastically.

"You're getting bigger! Just focus and try to stop!" Billy said.

When Superboy was a satisfying 150 ft in height, he concentrated and the growth slowed to a stop. "Wow...thanks for that! Where are you?" Superboy's voice boomed and rattled windows all around.

"Right here!" Billy flew up in front of Superboy's eyes. "Whoa-ho! You're sooo small!" Superboy said in a somewhat smug tone.

Billy sighed, "Y'know...me and Mordred usually have fun using our feet to torment little runts with our sweat and smell."
1343322211111111111211.title: Giant Superboy

choices: He decides to go and see Mordred.
He decides to play as giant a bit more before going.
13433222111111111112111.content:
"Sweat and smell huh? Well I can say I like the sound of that sort of thing." Superboy said with a smirk on his face, folding his arms, since he just got out he hasn't been on the upkeep with showers, though he's kinda sure he doesn't necessarily sweat since Kryptonians don't apparently, then again with magic anything is possible.

"Well that's the general idea, we can also summon up imaginary armies to fight as we want to, and how tough we can make them if we're bored." Billy said with a smirk.

Superboy knelt down to get a closer look at Billy as he replied, "Sounds like fun, so...what do we do now?" He asked him as the other boy thought about it.

"Well since you are like me I guess we should take you to Mordred to tell him about you, I dont think he's one for surprises after all, or on the other hand we could have some fun with your powers see if you would like to get the chance." He proposed to him.

"Hmmm...." Superboy considered the possibilities as he did want to see who his other friend is, but he also want to act like a giant with something, decisions...decisions...

134332223.title: others

info.brief_description: Your favorite characters at a larger size!
info.description:
Well its an interactive, something I haven't done since Writing allowed you to put Interactives for free, but anyways.

Its a bunch of fictional stuff in which your favorite boy or girl goes through several growth changes.

Rules:

1) Details, I want at the very least 500 words about what action is happening.

2)No constant choice chapters when they arent needed, you're a writer not a Robot raking in free gift points, things like these will be deleted.

3) I don't mind any sort of kinks you add to the story plot lines, as long as they are properly nuanced and not like your checking off lists of what fetish to add in bulk.

4) Have fun with it.
